GSP29nysvbh1u:2606: vidhārake hi vāyvabhrasaṃyoge gurutvād apāṃ patanakarma na bhavatīti//1//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2612: pramāṇāntaraṃ ca manyamānena pratiṣedha ucyate/ so 'yam---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2621: vākyārthasampratyayenānabhihitasyārthasya pratyanīkabhāvād grahaṇam arthāpattir anumānam eva/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2622: avinābhāvavṛttyā ca sambaddhayoḥ samudāyasamudāyinoḥ samudāyenetarasya grahaṇaṃ sambhavaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2623: % vṛttyā ca sambaddhayoḥ samudāyasamudāyinoḥ samudāyenetarasya grahaṇaṃ sambhavaḥ,] p.577
GSP29nysvbh1u:2625: asmin satīdaṃ nopapadyata iti virodhitve prasiddhe kāryānupapattyā kāraṇasya pratibandhakam anumīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2630: satyam etāni pramāṇāni na tu pramāṇāntarāṇīty uktam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2634: asatsu megheṣu vṛṣṭir na bhavatīti satsu bhavatīty etad arthād āpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2642: asati kāraṇe kāryaṃ notpadyata iti vākyāt pratyanīkabhūto 'rthaḥ sati kāraṇe kāryam utpadyata ity arthād āpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2644: so 'yaṃ kāryotpādaḥ sati kāraṇe 'rthād āpadyamāno na kāraṇasya sattāṃ vyabhicarati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2645: na khalv asati kāraṇe kāryam utpadyate tasmān nānaikāntikī/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2646: yat tu sati kāraṇe nimittapratibandāt kāryaṃ notpadyata iti kāraṇadharmo 'sau na tv arthāpatteḥ prameyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2648: sati kāraṇe kāryam utpadyata iti yo 'sau kāryotpādaḥ kāraṇasya sattāṃ na vyabhicatati tad asyāḥ prameyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2649: evaṃ tu saty anarthāpattāv arthāpattyabhimānaṃ kṛtvā pratiṣedha ucyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2650: % saty anarthāpattāv arthāpattyabhimānaṃ kṛtvā pratiṣedha ucyata iti/] p.580
GSP29nysvbh1u:2654: arthāpattir na pramāṇam anaikāntikatvād iti vākyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2657: anaikāntikatvād apramāṇenānena na kaścid arthaḥ pratiṣidhyata iti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2661: atha manyase niyataviṣayeṣv artheṣu svaviṣaye vyabhicāro bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2662: na ca pratiṣedhasya sadbhāvo viṣayaḥ? evaṃ tarhi---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2664: arthāpatter api kāryotpādena kāraṇasattāyā avyabhicāro viṣayaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2665: na ca kāraṇadharmo nimittapratibandhāt kāryānutpādakatvam iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2669: abhāvasya tarhi pramāṇabhāvābhyanujñā nopapadyate/ katham iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2671: abhāvasya bhūyasi prameye lokasiddhe vaiyātyād ucyate nābhāvaprāmāṇyaṃ prameyāsiddher iti//7//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2679: katham? lakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu anupādeyeṣv upādeyānām alakṣitānām alakṣaṇalakṣitatvād lakṣaṇābhāvena lakṣitatvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2680: ubhayasannidhāv alakṣitāni vāsāṃsy ānayeti prayukto yeṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣaṇāni na bhavanti tāni lakṣaṇābhāvena pratipadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2685: NyS_2,2.9: asaty arthe nābhāva iti cen nānyalakṣaṇopapatteḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2686: yatra bhūtvā kiñcin na bhavati tatra tasyābhāva upapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2687: na cālakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣitāni bhūtvā na bhavanti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2690: nānyalakṣaṇopapatteḥ---yathāyam anyeṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣaṇānām upapattiṃ paśyati naivam alakṣiteṣu/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2691: so 'yaṃ lakṣaṇābhāvaṃ paśyann abhāvenārthaṃ pratipadyata iti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2696: teṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣiteṣu siddhir vidhyamānatā yeṣāṃ bhavati na teṣām abhāvo lakṣaṇānām/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2697: yāni ca lakṣiteṣu vidyante lakṣaṇāni teṣām alakṣiteṣv abhāva ity ahetuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2698: yāni khalu bhavanti teṣām abhāvo vyāhata iti//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2702: na brūmo yāni lakṣaṇāni bhavanti teṣām abhāva iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2703: kin tu keṣucil lakṣaṇāny avasthitāni anavasthitāni keṣucit,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2704: apekṣamāṇo yeṣu lakṣaṇānāṃ bhāvaṃ na paśyati tāni lakṣaṇābhāvena pratipadyata iti//11//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2709: abhāvadvaitaṃ khalu bhavati prāk cotpatter avidyamānatā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2711: tatrālakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu prāg utpatter avidyamānatālakṣaṇo lakṣaṇānām abhāvo netara iti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2715: ``āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ'' iti pramāṇabhāve viśeṣaṇaṃ bruvatā nānāprakāraḥ śabda iti jñāpyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2718: ākāśaguṇaḥ śabdao vibhur nityo 'bhivyaktidharmaka ity eke/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2720: gandhādisahavṛttir dravyeṣu sanniviṣṭo gandhādivad avasthito 'bhivyaktidharmaka ity apare/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2721: ākāśaguṇaḥ śabda utpattinirodhadharmako buddhivad ity apare/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2722: mahābhūtasaṃkṣobhajaḥ śabdo 'nāśrita utpattidharmako nirodhadharmaka ity anye/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2723: ataḥ saṃśayaḥ kim atra tattvam iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2726: NyS_2,2.13: ādhimattvād aindriyakatvāt kṛtakavad upacārāc ca //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2727: ādir yoniḥ kāraṇam ādīyate asmād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2729: saṃyogavibhāgajaś ca śabdaḥ kāraṇavattvād anitya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2730: kā punar iyam arthadeśanā kāraṇavattvād iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2732: anityaḥ śabda iti---bhūtvā na bhavati vināśadharmaka iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2736: kim ayaṃ vyañjakena samānadeśo 'bhivyajyate rūpādivat atha saṃyogajāc chabdāc chabdasantāne sati śrotrapratyāsanno gṛhyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2737: saṃyoganivṛttau śabdagrahaṇāt na vyañjakena samānadeśasya grahaṇam---dāruvraścane dāruparaśusaṃyoganivṛttau dūrasthena śabdo gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2741: utpādake tu saṃyoge saṃyogajāc chabdāc chabdasantāne sati śrotrapratyāsannasya grahaṇam iti yuktaṃ saṃyoganivṛttau śabdasya grahaṇam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2743: itaś ca śabda utpadyate nābhivyajyate---kṛtakavad upacārāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2745: tīvraṃ sukhaṃ mandaṃ sukhaṃ tīvraṃ duḥkhaṃ mandaṃ duḥkham iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2746: upacaryate ca tīvraḥ śabdo mandaḥ śabda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2748_0: vyañjakasya tathābhāvād grahaṇasya tīvramandatā rūpavad iti ced na abhibhavopapatteḥ---saṃyogasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2748_1: vyañjakasya tīvramandatayā śabdagrahaṇasya tīvramandatā bhavati na tu śabdo bhidyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:2750: evam abhibhavopapatteḥ---tīvro bherīśabdo mandaṃ tantrīśabdam abhibhavati na mandaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2756: abhibhavānupapattiś ca vyañjakasamānadeśasyābhivyaktau prāptyabhāvāt---vyañjakena samānadeśe 'bhivyajyate śabda ity etasmin pakṣe nopapadyate 'bhibhavaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2757: na hi bherīśabdena tantrīsvanaḥ prāpta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2759: aprāpte 'bhibhava iti cet śabdamātrābhibhavaprasaṅgaḥ---atha manyeta asatyām prāptāv abhibhavo bhavatīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2760: evaṃ sati yathā bherīśabdaḥ kañcit tantrīsvanam abhibhavati evam antikasthopādānam iva davīyaḥstho pādānān api tantrīsvanān abhibhaved aprāpter aviśeṣāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2761: tatra kvacid eva bheryāṃ praṇāditāyāṃ sarvalokeṣu samānakālās tantrīsvanā na śrūyeran iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2762: nānābhūteṣu śabdasantāneṣu satsu śrotrapratyāsattibhāvena kasyacic chabdasya tīvreṇa mandasyābhibhavo yukta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2770: NyS_2,2.14: na ghaṭābhāvasāmānyanityatvān nityeṣv apy anityavad upacārāc ca //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2777: yo 'sau kāraṇavibhāgebhyo na bhavati na tasyābhāvo bhāvena kadācin nivartyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2783: nityeṣv anityavad upacāro dṛṣṭaḥ---tathā hi bhavati vṛkṣasya pradeśaḥ kambalasya pradeśaḥ evam ākāśasya pradeśaḥ ātmanaḥ pradeśa iti bhavatīti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2788: nityam ity atra kiṃ tāvat tattvam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2791: bhāktaṃ tu bhavati yat tatrātmānam ahāsīd yad bhūtvā na bhavati na jātu tat punar bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2792: tatra nitya iva nityo ghaṭābhāva ity ayaṃ padārtha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2793: tatra yathājātīyakaḥ śabdo na tathājātīyakaṃ kāryaṃ kiṃcin nityaṃ dṛśyata ity avyabhicāraḥ//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2797: yad api sāmānyanityatvād itīndriyapratyāsattigrāhyam aindriyakam iti---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2801: kiṃ tarhi indriyapratyāsattigrāhyatvāt santānānumānaṃ tenānityatvam iti //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2804: yad api nityeṣv apy anityavad upacārād iti/ na---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2807: evam ākāśapradeśaḥ ātmapradeśa iti nātrākāśātmanoḥ kāraṇadravyam abhidhīyate yathā kṛtakasya/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2811: saṃyogasyāvyāpyavṛttitvam---paricchinnena dravyenākāśasya saṃyogo nākāśaṃ vyāpnoti avyāpya vartata iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2813: na hy āmalakayoḥ saṃyoga āśrayaṃ vyāpnoti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2814: sāmānyakṛtā ca bhaktir ākāśasya pradeśa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2817: parīkṣitā ca tīvramandatā śabdatattvaṃ na bhaktikṛteti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2819: kasmāt punaḥ sūtrakārasyāsminn arthe sūtraṃ na śrūyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2820: śīlam idaṃ bhavgavataḥ sūtrakārasya bahuṣv adhikaraṇeṣu dvau pakṣau na vyavasthāpayati tatra śāstrasiddhāntāt tattvāvadhāraṇaṃ pratipattum arhatīti manyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2821: śāstrasiddhāntas tu nyāyasamākhyātam anumataṃ bahuśākham anumānam iti//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2825: athāpi khalv idam asti idaṃ nāstīti kuta etat pratipattavyam iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2828: NyS_2,2.18: prāg uccāraṇād anupalabdher āvaraṇādyanupalabdheś ca //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2832_0: kasmāt? āvaraṇādīnām anupalabdhikāraṇānām agrahaṇāt---anenāvṛtaḥ śabdo nopalabhyata
GSP29nysvbh1u:2832_1: asannikṛṣṭaś cendriyavyavadhānād ity evamādi anupalabdhikāraṇaṃ na gṛhyata iti so
GSP29nysvbh1u:2833: uccāraṇam asya vyañjakaṃ tadabhāvād prāg uccāraṇād anupalabdhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2835: vivakṣājanitena prayatnena koṣṭhyasya vāyoḥ preritasya kaṇṭhatālvādipratighātaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2836: % prayatnena koṣṭhyasya vāyoḥ preritasya kaṇṭhatālvādipratighātaḥ,] p.615
GSP29nysvbh1u:2842: so 'yam uccāryamāṇaḥ śrūyate śrūyamāṇaś cābhūtvā bhavatīti anumīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2843: ūrdhvaṃ coccāraṇān na śrūyate sa bhūtvā na bhavati abhāvān na śrūyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2848: evaṃ ca sati tattvaṃ pāṃśubhir ivāvakirann idam āha---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2851: āvaraṇānupalabdhir api tarhy anupalambhāt nāstīti tasyā abhāvād apratiṣiddham āvaraṇam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2852: kathaṃ punar jānīte bhavān nāvaraṇānupalabdhir upalabhyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2854: kim atra jñeyaṃ pratyātmavedanīyatvāt samānam---ayaṃ khalv āvaraṇam anupalambhamānaḥ pratyātmam eva saṃvedayate nāvaraṇam upalabha iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2855: yathā kuḍyenāvṛtasyāvaraṇam upalabhamānaḥ pratyātmam eva saṃvedayate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2857: evaṃ ca saty apahṛtaviṣayam uttaravākyam astīti//16//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2862: NyS_2,2.20: anupalambhād apy anupalabdhisadbhāvān nāvaraṇānupapattir anupalambhāt //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2863_0: yathānupalambhamānāpy āvaraṇānupalabdhir asti evam anupalabhyamānam apy āvaraṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:2863_1: astīti yady abhyanujānāti bhavān anupalabhyamānāvaraṇānupalabdhir astīti abhyanujñāya
GSP29nysvbh1u:2863_2: ca vadati nāsty āvaraṇam anupalambhād iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2864: etasminn apy abhyanujñāvāde pratipattiniyamo nopapadyata iti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2872: upalabdhyabhāvaś cānupalabdhir iti seyam abhāvatvān nopalabhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2873: sac ca khalv āvaraṇaṃ tasyopalabdhyā bhavitavyaṃ na copalabhyate tasmān nāstīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2874: % khalv āvaraṇaṃ tasyopalabdhyā bhavitavyaṃ na copalabhyate tasmān nāstīti/] p.619
GSP29nysvbh1u:2875: tatra yad uktaṃ nāvaraṇānupapattir anupalambhād ity ayuktam iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2878: atha śabdasya nityatvaṃ pratijānānaḥ kasmād dhetoḥ pratijānīte---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2881: asparśam ākāśaṃ nityaṃ dṛṣṭam iti tathā ca śabda iti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2906: sampradīyamāno 'hy avasthitaḥ sampradātur apaiti sampradānaṃ ca prāpnotīty avarjanīyam etat//26//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2917: kim ācāryasthaḥ śabdo 'ntevāsinam āpadyate tad adhyāpanam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2926: pañcakṛtvaḥ paśyatīti rūpam avasthitaṃ punaḥ punar dṛśyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2928: tasmād avasthitasya punaḥ punar uccāraṇam abhyāsa iti//29//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2933: anavasthāne 'py abhyāsasyābhidhānaṃ bhavati dvir nṛtyatu bhavān trir nṛtyatu bhavān iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2934: dvir anṛtyat trir anṛtyad dvir agnihotraṃ juhoti dvir bhuṅkte//30//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2937: evaṃ vyabhicārāt pratiṣiddhahetāv anyaśabdasya prayogaḥ pratiṣidhyate---
GSP29nysvbh1u:2938: NyS_2,2.31: anyad anyasmād ananyatvād ananyad ity anyatābhāvaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2939: yad idam anyad iti manyase tat svārthenānanyatvād anyan na bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2941: tatra yad uktam anyatve 'py abhyāsopacārād iti etad ayuktam iti//31//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2946: NyS_2,2.32: tadabhāve nāsty ananyatā tayor itaretarāpekṣasiddheḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2948: upapādya cānyat pratyācaṣṭe ananyad iti ca śabdam anujānāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2951: yadi cātrottaraṃ padaṃ nāsti kasyāyaṃ pratiṣedhena saha samāsaḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:2952: tasmāt tayor anyānanyaśabdayor itaro 'nanyaśabda itaram anyaśabdam apekṣamāṇaḥ sidhyatīti tatra yad uktam anyatāyā abhāva iti etad ayuktam iti//32//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2958: yad anityaṃ tasya vināśaḥ kāraṇād bhavati yathā loṣṭasya kāraṇadravyavibhāgāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2959: śabdaś ced anityas tasya vināśo yasmāt kāraṇād bhavati tad upalabhyeta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2965: yathā vināśakāraṇānupalabdher avināśaprasaṅga evam aśravaṇakāraṇānupalabdheḥ satataṃ śravaṇaprasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2968: atha vidyamānasya nirnimittam aśravanam iti vidyamānasya nirnimitto vināśa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2969: samānaś ca dṛṣṭavirodho nimittam antareṇa vināśe cāśravaṇe ceti//34//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2973: anumānāc copalabhyamāne śabdasya vināśakāraṇe vināśakāraṇānupalabdher asattvād ity anapadeśaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2974: yathā yasmād viṣāṇī tasmād aśva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2977: upapāditaḥ śabdasantānaḥ saṃyogavibhāgajāc chabdāc chabdāntaraṃ tato 'ntat tato 'py anyad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2978: tatra kāryaḥ śabdaḥ kāraṇaśabdaṃ niruṇaddhi pratighātidravyasaṃyogas tv antyasya śabdasya nirodhakaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2979: % pratighātidravyasaṃyogas tv antyasya śabdasya nirodhakaḥ/] p.629
GSP29nysvbh1u:2980: dṛṣṭaṃ hi tiraḥpratikuḍyam antikasthenāpy aśravaṇaṃ śabdasya śravaṇaṃ dūrasthenāpy asati vyavadhāne iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2982: ghaṇṭāyām abhihanyamānāyāṃ tāras tārataro mando mandatara iti śrutibhedān nānāśabdasantāno 'vicchedena śrūyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2983: tatra nitye śabde ghaṇṭāstham anyagataṃ vāvasthitaṃ santānavṛtti vābhivyaktikāraṇaṃ vācyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2985: yena śrutisantāno bhavatīti śabdabhede vāsati śrutibheda upapādayitavya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2986: anitye tu śabde ghaṇṭāsthaṃ santānavṛtti saṃyogasahakāri nimittāntaraṃ saṃskārabhūtaṃ paṭu mandam anuvartate tastānuvṛttyā śabdasantānānuvṛttiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2995: pāṇikarmaṇā pāṇighaṇṭāpraśleṣo bhavati tasmiṃś ca sati śabdasantāno notpadyate ataḥ śravaṇānupapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2997: tatra pratighātidravyasaṃyogaḥ śabdasya nimittāntaraṃ saṃskārabhūtaṃ niruṇaddhīty anumīyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:2999: anutpattau śrutivicchedo yathā pratighātidravyasaṃyogād iṣoḥ kriyāhetau saṃskāre niruddhe gamanābhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3007: yadi yasya vināśakāraṇaṃ nopalabhyate tad avatiṣṭhate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3009: evaṃ yāni khalv imāni śabdaśravaṇāni śabdābhivyaktaya iti matam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3011: anupapādanād avasthānam avasthānāt teṣāṃ nityatvaṃ prasajyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3013: na tarhi vināśakāraṇānupalabdheḥ śabdasyāvasthānān nityatvam iti//37//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3017: vaiyadhikaraṇye hi pratighātidravyapraśleṣāt samānādhikaraṇasyaivoparamaḥ syād iti---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3020: yad idaṃ nākāśaguṇaḥ śabda iti pratiṣidhyate ayam anupapannaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3022: rūpādisamānadeśasyāgrahaṇe śabdasantānopapatter asparśavyāpidravyāśrayaḥ śabda iti jñāyate na kampasamānāśraya iti//38//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3026: pratidravyaṃ rūpādibhiḥ saha sanniviṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ samānadeśo vyajyata iti nopapadyate/ katham?---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3030_0: yadi rūpādayaḥ śabdāś ca pratidravyaṃ samastāḥ samuditāḥ samuditās tasmin samāse
GSP29nysvbh1u:3030_1: samudāye yo yathājātīyakaḥ sanniviṣṭas tasya tathā jātīyasyaiva grahaṇena bhavitavyaṃ śabde rūpādivat /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3031_0: tatra yo 'yaṃ vibhāga ekadravye nānārūpā bhinnaśrutayo vidharmāṇaḥ śabdā abhivyajyamānāḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3031_1: śrūyante yac ca vibhāgāntaraṃ sarūpāḥ samānaśrutayaḥ sadharmāṇaḥ śabdās tīvramandadharmatayā
GSP29nysvbh1u:3032: nānābhūtānām utpadyamānānām ayaṃ dharmo naikasya vyajyamānasyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3033: % bhūtānām utpadyamānānām ayaṃ dharmo naikasya vyajyamānasyeti/] p.638
GSP29nysvbh1u:3035: tena vibhāgopapatter manyāmahe na pratidravyaṃ rūpādibhiḥ saha śabdaḥ sanniviṣṭo vyajyata iti//39//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3038: dvividhaś cāyaṃ śabdo varṇātmako dhvanimātraś ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3041: dadhy atreti kecit ikāra itvaṃ hitvā yatvam āpadyata iti vikāraṃ manyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3042: kecid ikārasya prayoge viṣayakṛte yad ikāraḥ sthānaṃ jahāti tatra yakārasya prayogaṃ bruvate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3043: saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye ikāro na prayujyate tasya sthāne yakāraḥ prayujyate sa ādeśa iti ubhayam idam upadiśyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3044: tatra na jñāyate kiṃ tattvam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3047: vikāropadeśe hy anvayasyāgrahaṇād vikārānanumānam---saty anvaye kiñcin nivartate kiñcid upajāyata iti śakyeta vikāro 'numātum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3048: na cānvayo gṛhyate tasmād vikāro nāstīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3049: bhinnakaraṇayoś ca varṇayor aprayoge prayogopapattiḥ---vivṛtakaraṇa ikāra īṣatspṛṣṭakaraṇo yakāraḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3058: yatra ca vikārabhūtau iṣṭyā dadhy āhareti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3059: ubhayatra prayoktur aviśeṣo yatnaḥ śrotuś ca śrutir ity ādeśopapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3062: na khalv ikāraḥ prayujyamāno yakāratām āpadyamāno gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3063: kiṃ tarhi? ikārasya prayoge yakāraḥ prayujyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3067: na caitasmin pakṣe śabdānvākhyānasyāsambhave yena varṇavikāraṃ pratipadyemahīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3069: na hi ikārād yakāra utpadyate yakārād vā ikāraḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3070: pṛthaksthānaprayatnotpādyā hīme varṇāḥ teṣām anyonyasya sthāne prayujyata iti yuktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3071: etāvac caitat pariṇāmo vā vikāraḥ syāt kāryakāraṇabhāvo vā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3072: ubhayaṃ ca nāsti tasmāt na santi varṇavikārāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3073_1: vacir'' iti yathā varṇasamudāyasya dhātulakṣaṇasya kvacid viṣaye varṇāntarasamudāyo
GSP29nysvbh1u:3073_2: na pariṇāmo na kāryaṃ śabdāntarasya sthāne śabdāntaraṃ prayujyate tathā varṇasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3080: yakāre hrasvadīrghānuvidhānaṃ nāsti yena vikāratvam anumīyata iti//41//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3085: dravyavikārā nyūnāḥ samāḥ adhikāś ca gṛhyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3086: tadvad ayaṃ vikāro nyūnaḥ syād iti//42//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3089: NyS_2,2.43: dvividhasyāpi hetor abhāvād asādhanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3090: atra nodāharaṇasādharmyād dhetur asti na vaidharmyāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3091: anupasaṃhṛtaś ca hetunā dṛṣṭānto na sādhaka iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3093: yathānuḍuhaḥ sthāne 'śvo voḍhuṃ niyukto na tadvikāro bhavati evam ivarṇasya sthāne yakāraḥ prayukto na vikāra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3094: na cātra niyamahetur asti---dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhako na pratidṛṣṭānta iti//43//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3100: atulyānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ prakṛtibhāvo vikalpate vikārāś ca prakṛtīr anuvidhīyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3108: evaṃ varṇābhāvena tulyāyāḥ prakṛter vikāravikalpa iti//45//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3113: yadātmakaṃ dravyaṃ mṛd vā suvarṇaṃ vā tasyātmano 'nvaye pūrvo vyūho nivartate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3116: na varṇasāmānye kaścic chabdātmā 'nvayī ya itthaṃ jahāti yatvaṃ cāpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3117: tatra yathā sati dravyabhāve vikāravaiṣamye nānaḍuho 'śvo vikāro vikāradharmānupapatteḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3118: evam ivarṇasya na yakāro vikāro vikāradharmānupapatter iti//46//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3126: ikāro yakāratvam āpannaḥ punar ikāro bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3127: na punar ikārasya sthāne yakārasya prayogo 'prayogaś cety atrānumānaṃ nāsti//47//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3133: suvarṇaṃ kuṇḍalatvaṃ hitvā rucakatvam āpadyate rucakatvaṃ hitvā punaḥ kuṇḍalatvam āpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3134: evam ikāro 'pi yakāratvam āpannaḥ punar ikāro bhavatīti//48//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3138: vyabhicārād ananumānam yathā payo dadhibhāvam āpannaṃ punaḥ na payo bhavati kim evaṃ varṇānāṃ na punarāpattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3139: atha suvarṇavat punarāpattir iti suvarṇodāharaṇopapattiś ca---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3141: avasthitaṃ suvarṇaṃ hīyamānena dharmeṇa upajāyamānena ca dharmi bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3142: naivaṃ kaścic chabdātmā hīyamānena itvenopajāyamānena yatvena dharmī gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3146: varṇavikārā api varṇatvaṃ na vyabhicaranti yathā suvarṇavikāraḥ suvarṇatvam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3150: varṇatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ na tasyemau dharmau bhavitum arhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3151: na ca nivartamāno dharma upajāyamānasya prakṛtis tatra nivartamāna ikāro na yakārasyopajāyamānasya prakṛtir iti//49//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3156: nityā varṇā ity etasmin pakṣe ikārayakārau varṇau ity ubhayor nityatvād vikārānupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3163: utpadya niruddhe ikāre yakāra utpadyate yakāre cotpadya niruddhe ikāra utpadyata iti kaḥ kasya vikāraḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3164: tad etad avagṛhya sandhāne sandhāya cāvagrahe veditavyam iti//50//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3168: NyS_2,2.51: nityānām atīndriyatvāt taddharmavikalpāc ca varṇavikārāṇām apratiṣedhaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3169: nityā varṇā na vikalpanta iti vipratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3170: yathā nityatve sati kiñcid atīndriyaṃ kiñcid indriyagrāhyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3172: evaṃ nityatve sati kiñcin na vikriyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3176: nityaṃ nopajāyate nāpaity anupajanāpāyadharmakaṃ nityam anityaṃ punar upajanāpāyayuktam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3187: yathānavasthāyināṃ varṇānāṃ śravaṇaṃ bhavaty evam eṣāṃ vikāro bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3188: asambandhād asamarthā arthapratipādikā varṇopalabdhiḥ na vikāreṇa sambandhād asamarthā yā gṛhyamāṇā varṇavikāram anumāpayed iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3189: tatra yādṛg idaṃ yathā gandhaguṇā pṛthivy evaṃ śabdasukhādiguṇāpīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3193: na ca varṇopalabdhir varṇanivṛttau varṇāntaraprayogasya nivartikā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3194: yo 'yam ivarṇanivṛttau yakārasya prayogo yady ayaṃ varṇopalabdhyā nivartate tadā tatropalabhyamānā ivarṇo yatvam āpadyate iti gṛhyeta/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3198: NyS_2,2.53: vikāradharmitve nityatvābhāvāt kālāntare vikāropapatteś cāpratiṣedhaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3200: na khalv vikāradharmakaṃ kiñcin nityam upalabhyata iti varṇopalabdhivad iti na yuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3201: avagrahe hi dadhi atreti prayujya ciraṃ sthitvā tataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ prayuṅkte dadhy atreti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3202: % prayujya ciraṃ sthitvā tataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ prayuṅkte dadhy atreti/] p.651
GSP29nysvbh1u:3203: ciranivṛtte cāyam ivarṇe yakāraḥ prayujyamānaḥ kasya vikāra iti pratīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3204: kāraṇābhāvāt kāryābhāva iti anuyogaḥ prasajyata iti//53//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3209: ikārasthāne yakāraḥ śrūyate yakārasthāne khalv ikāro vidhīyate vidhyatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3217: yo 'yaṃ prakṛter aniyama uktaḥ sa niyato yathāviṣayaṃ vyavasthito niyatatvān niyama iti bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3226: anujñātaniṣiddhayoś ca vyāghātād anarthāntaratvaṃ na bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3227: aniyamaś ca niyatatvāt niyamo na bhavatīti nātrārthasya tathābhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3228: kiṃ tarhi? tathābhūtasyārthasya niyamaśabdenābhidhīyamānasya niyatatvān niyamaśabda evopapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3229: so 'yaṃ niyamād aniyame pratiṣedho na bhavatīti//56//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3233: na ceyaṃ varṇavikāropapattiḥ pariṇāmāt kāryakāraṇabhāvād vā/ kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3248: ete ced vikārā upapadyante tarhi varṇavikārā iti//57//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3254: yathādarśanaṃ vikṛtā varṇā vibhaktyantāḥ padasaṃjñā bhavanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3260: yathādarśanaṃ vikṛtā varṇā vibhaktyantāḥ padasaṃjñā bhavanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3264: upasarganipātās tarhi na padasaṃjñāḥ lakṣaṇāntaraṃ vācyam iti;
GSP29nysvbh1u:3265: śiṣyate ca khalu nāmikyā vibhakter avyayāl lopaḥ tayoḥ padasaṃjñārtham iti//58//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3271: gaur iti padaṃ khalv idam udāharaṇaṃ tadarthe ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3275: avinābhāvena vartamānāsu vyaktyākṛtijātiṣu gaur iti prayujyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3276: tatra na jñāyate kim anyatamaḥ padārthaḥ utaitat sarvam iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3285: yā gaus tiṣṭhati yā gaur niṣaṇṇeiti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3289: gavāṃ samūha iti bhedād dravyābhidhānaṃ na jāter abhedāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3290: vaidyāya gāṃ dadatīti dravyasya tyāgo na jāter amūrtatvāt pratikramānukramānupapatteeś ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3295: saṅkhyā --- daśa gāvo viṃśatir gāva iti bhinnaṃ dravyaṃ saṅkhyāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3297: vṛddhiḥ kāraṇavato dravyasyāvayavopacayaḥ avardhata gaur iti;
GSP29nysvbh1u:3300: varṇaḥ --- śuklā gauḥ kapilā gaur iti;
GSP29nysvbh1u:3305: tadutpattidharmatvād dravye yuktaṃ na jātau viparyayād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3314: yāśabdaprabhṛtibhir yo viśeṣyate sa gośabdārtho yā gaus tiṣṭhati yā gaur niṣaṇṇeti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3321: yadi na vyaktiḥ padārthaḥ kathaṃ tarhi vyaktāv upacāra iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3326: atadbhāve 'pi tadupacāra iti atacchabdasya tena śabdenābhidhānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3330: sthānāt --- mañcāḥ krośantīti mañcasthāḥ puruṣā abhidhīyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3331: tādarthyāt --- kaṭārtheṣu vīraṇeṣu vyuhyamāneṣu kaṭaṃ karotīti bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3332: vṛtāt --- yamo rājā kubero rājeti tadvadvartata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3333: mānāt --- āḍhakena mitāḥ saktavaḥ āḍhakasaktava iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3334: dhāraṇāt --- tulāyāṃ dhṛtaṃ candanaṃ tulācandanam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3335: sāmīpyāt --- gaṅgāyāṃ gāvaś carantīti deśo 'bhidhīyate sannikṛṣṭaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3336: yogāt --- kṛṣṇena rāgeṇa yuktaḥ śāṭakaḥ kṛṣṇa ity abhidhīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3338: ādhipatyāt --- ayaṃ puruṣaḥ kulam ayaṃ gotram iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3339: tatrāyaṃ sahacaraṇād yogād vā jātiśabdo vyaktau prayjyata iti//62//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3343: yadi gaur ity asya padasya na vyaktir arthaḥ, astu tarhi ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3347: sattvāvayavānāṃ tadavayavānāṃ ca niyato vyūha ākṛtiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3348: tasyāṃ gṛhyamāṇāyāṃ sattvavyavasthānaṃ sidhyaty ayam gaur ayaṃ aśva iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3350: yasya grahaṇāt sattvavyavasthānaṃ sidhyati taṃ śabdo 'bhidhātum arhati so 'syārtha iti//63//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3353: tad upapadyate yasya jātyā yogas tad atra jātiviśiṣṭam abhidhīyate gaur iti/na
GSP29nysvbh1u:3360: NyS_2,2.64: vyaktyākṛtiyukte 'py aprasṅgāt prokṣādīnāṃ mṛdagavake jātiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3362: kasmāt? vyaktyākṛtiyukte 'pi mṛdgavake prokṣaṇādīnām aprasaṅgād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3363: gāṃ prokṣaya gām ānaya gāṃ dehīti naitāni mṛdgavake prayujyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3366: asti hi tatra vyaktiḥ asty ākṛtiḥ yadabhāvāt tatrāsampratyayaḥ sa padārtha iti//64//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3372: nāgṛhyamāṇāyām ākṛtau vyaktau ca jātimātraṃ śuddhaṃ gṛhyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:3376: na vai padārthena na bhavituṃ śakyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3383: yadā hi bhedavivakṣā viśeṣagatiś ca tadā vyaktiḥ pradhānam aṅgaṃ tu jātyākṛtī/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3385: tadā jātiḥ pradhānam aṅgaṃ tu vyaktyākṛtī/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3391: kathaṃ punar jñāyate nānā vyaktyākṛtijātaya iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3396: vyajyata iti vyaktir indriyagrāhyeti na sarvaṃ dravyaṃ vyaktiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3397: yo guṇaviśeṣāṇāṃ sparśāntānāṃ gurutvaghanatvadravatvasaṃskārāṇām avyāpinaḥ parimāṇasyāśrayo yathāsambhavaṃ tad dravyaṃ mūrtiḥ mūrcchitāvayavatvād iti//67//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3402: yayā jātir jātiliṅgāni ca prakhyāyante tām ākṛtiṃ vidyāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3403: sā ca nānyā sattvāvayavānāṃ tadavayavānāṃ ca niyatād vyūhād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3407: niyate ca sattvāvayavānāṃ vyūhe sati gotvaṃ prakhyāyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3408: anākṛtivyaṅgyāyāṃ jātau mṛtsuvarṇaṃ rajatam ity evamādiṣv ākṛtir nivartate jahāti padārthatvam iti//68//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3413: yā samānaṃ buddhiṃ prasūte bhinneṣv adhikaraṇeṣu,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3414: yayā bahūnīteretarato na vyāvartante yo 'rtho 'nekatra pratyayānuvṛttinimittaṃ tat sāmānyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3415: yac ca keṣāñcid abhedaṃ kutaścid bhedaṃ karoti tat sāmānyaviśeṣo jātir iti//69//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3416: iti vātsyāyanīye nyāyabhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3425: kiṃ dehendriyamanobuddhivedanāsaṅghātamātram ātmā āhosvit tadvayatirikta iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3435: asti cāyaṃ vyapadeśaḥ cakṣuṣā paśyati manasā vijānāti buddhyā vicārayati śarīreṇa sukhaduḥkham anubhavatīti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3436: tatra nāvadhāryate kim avayavena samudāyasya dehādisaṅghātasya,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3441: darśanena kaścid artho gṛhītaḥ sparśanenāpi so 'rtho gṛhyate --- yam aham adrākṣaṃ cakṣuṣā taṃ sparśanenāpi spṛśāmīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3442: yaṃ cāspārkṣaṃ sparśanena taṃ cakṣuṣā paśyāmīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3447: tad yo 'sau cakṣuṣā tvagindriyeṇa caikārthasya grahītā bhinnanimittāv anyakartṛkau pratyayau samānaviṣayau pratisandadhāti so 'rthāntarabhūta ātmā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3450: indriyaṃ khalu svasvaviṣayagrahaṇam ananyakartṛkaṃ pratisandhātum arhati nendriyāntarasya viṣayāntaragrahaṇam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3452: ekaḥ khalv ayaṃ bhinnanimittau svātmakartṛkau paryayau pratisaṃhitau vedayate na saṅghātaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3453: kasmāt? anivṛttaṃ hi saṅghāte pratyekaṃ viṣayāntaragrahaṇasyāpratisandhānam indriyāntareṇeveti//1//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3460: cakṣuṣy asati rūpaṃ na gṛhyate sati ca gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3461: yac ca yasminn asati na bhavati sati bhavati tasya tad iti vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3466: tānīndriyāṇīmāni svasvaviṣayagrahaṇāc cetanāni indriyāṇāṃ bhāvābhāvayor viṣayagrahaṇasya tathābhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3468: sandhigdhatvād ahetuḥ --- yo 'yam indriyāṇāṃ bhāvābhāvayor viṣayagrahaṇasya tathābhāvaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3477: yadi khalv ekam indriyam avyavasthitaviṣayaṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvaviṣayagrāhi cetanaṃ syāt kas tato 'nyaṃ cetanam anumātuṃ śaknuyāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3478: yasmāt tu vyavasthitaviṣayāṇīndriyāṇi tasmāt tebhyo 'nyaś cetanaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvaviṣayagrāhī viṣayavyavasthitam atīto 'numīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3480: rūpadarśī khalv ayaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ vā pūrvagṛītam anuminoti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3486: tad evam aniyataparyāyaṃ sarvaviṣayagrahaṇam ekacetanādhikaraṇam ananyakartṛkaṃ pratisandhatte,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3488: pratyakṣānumānāgamasaṃśayān pratyayāṃś ca nānāviṣayān svātmakartṛkān pratisandhāya vedayate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3490_0: artham aviṣayabhūtaṃ śrotrasya kramabhāvino varṇān śrutvā padavākyabhāvena pratisandhāya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3490_1: śabdārthavyavasthāṃ ca budhyamāno 'nekaviṣayam arthajātam agrahaṇīyam ekaikenendriyeṇa gṛhṇāti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3491: seyaṃ sarvajñasya jñeyāvyavasthānupadaṃ na śakyā parikramitum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3493: tatra yad uktam indriyacaitanye sati kim aneya cetanena tad ayuktaṃ bhavati //3//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3501: prāṇibhūtaṃ śarīraṃ dahataḥ prāṇihiṃsākṛtapāpaṃ pātakam ity ucyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:3505: śarīrendriyabuddhivedanāprabandhe khalv anyaḥ saṅghāta utpadyate anyo nirudhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3509: evaṃ ca sati yo dehādisaṅghātaḥ prāṇibhūto hiṃsāṃ karoti nāsau hiṃsāphalena sambadhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3510: yaś ca sambadhyate na tena hiṃsā kṛtā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3511: tad evaṃ sattvabhede kṛtahānam akṛtābhyāgamaḥ prasajyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3512: sati ca sattvotpāde sattvanirodhe cākarmanimittaḥ sattvasarsargaḥ prāpnoti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3514: tad yadi dehādisaṅghātamātraṃ sattvaṃ syāt śarīradāhe pātakaṃ na bhavet,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3521: yasyāpi nityenātmanā sātmakaṃ śarīraṃ dahyate tasyāpi śarīradāhe pātakaṃ na bhaved dagdhuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3524: na jātu kaścin nityaṃ hiṃsitum arhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3527: seyam ekasmin pakṣe hiṃsā niṣphalā anyasmiṃs tv anupapanneti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3532: na brūmo nityasya sattvasya badho hiṃsā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3533_0: api tv anucchittidharmakasya sattvasya kāryāśrayasya śarīrasya svaviṣayopalabdheś
GSP29nysvbh1u:3533_1: ca kartṛṇām indriyāṇām upaghātaḥ pīḍā vaikalyalakṣaṇaḥ prabandhocchedo vā pramāpaṇalakṣaṇo vā vadho hiṃseti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3534: kāryaṃ tu sukhaduḥkhasaṃvedanaṃ tasyāyatanam adhiṣṭhānam āśrayaḥ śarīram,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3536: kāryāśrayasya śarīrasya svaviṣayopalabdheś ca kartṛṇām indriyāṇāṃ badho hiṃsā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3538: tatra yad uktam --- ``tadabhāvaḥ sātmakapradāhe 'pi tannityatvād'' ity etad ayuktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3539: yasya sattvocchedo hiṃsā tasya kṛtahānam akṛtābhyāgamaś ceti doṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3540: etāvac caitat syāt --- sattvocchedo vā hiṃsā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3549: tasyādhiṣṭhānam āśrayaḥ tadāyatanaṃ tad bhavati na tato 'nyad iti sa eva kartā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3550: tannimittā hi sukhaduḥkhasaṃvedanasya nivṛttiḥ na tam antareṇeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3551: tasya vadha upaghātaḥ pīḍā pramāpaṇam vā hiṃsā na nityatvenātmocchedaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3552: tatra yad uktam --- ``tadabhāvaḥ sātmakapradāhe 'pi tannityatvāt'' etan neti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3558_0: pūrvaparayor vijñānayor ekaviṣaye pratisandhijñānaṃ pratyabhijñānam --- tam evaitarhi
GSP29nysvbh1u:3558_1: paśyāmi yam ajñāsiṣam sa evāyam artha iti savyena cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭasyetareṇāpi cakṣuṣā
GSP29nysvbh1u:3558_2: pratyabhijñānād yam adrākṣaṃ tam evaitarhi paśyāmīti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3560: indriyacaitanye tu nānyadṛṣṭam anyaḥ pratyabhijānātīti pratyabhijñānupapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3561: asti tv idaṃ pratyabhijñanam tasmād indriyavyatiriktaś cetanaḥ//7//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3566: ekam idaṃ cakṣur madhye nāsāsthivyavahitaṃ tasyāntau gṛhyamāṇau dvitvābhimānaṃ prayojayato madhyavyavahitasya dīrghasyeva//8//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3571: ekasminn upahate coddhṛte vā cakṣuṣi dvitīyam avatiṣṭhate cakṣuḥviṣayagrahaṇaliṅgam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3577: kasmāt? vṛkṣasya hi kāsucic chākhāsu chinnāsūpalabhyate eva vṛkṣaḥ//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3582: na kāraṇadravyasya vibhāge kāryadravyam avatiṣṭate nityatvaprasaṅgāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3583: bahuṣv avayaviṣu yasya kāraṇāni vibhaktāni tasya vināśaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3586: mṛtasya hi śiraḥkapāle dvāv avaṭau nāsāsthivyavahitau cakṣuṣaḥ sthāne bhedena gṛhyete na caitad ekasmin nāsāsthivyavahite sambhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3587: atha vā ekavināśasyāniyamād dvāv imāv arthau,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3588: tau ca pṛthagāvaraṇopaghātau anumīyete vibhinnav iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3590: avapīḍanāc caikasya cakṣuṣo raśmiviṣayasannikarṣasya bhedād dṛśyabheda iva gṛhyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:3599_0: kasyacid amlaphalasya gṛhītatadrasasāhacarye rūpe gandhe vā kenacid indriyeṇa gṛhyamāṇe
GSP29nysvbh1u:3599_1: rasanasyendriyāntarasya vikāraḥ rasānusmṛtau rasagardhivartito dantodakasaṃplavabhūto gṛhyate /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3612: tasyā ātmaguṇatve sati sadbhāvād apratiṣedha ātmanaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3614: evaṃ sati smṛtir upapadyate nānyad dṛṣṭam anyaḥ samaratīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3617: ekas tu cetano 'nekārthadarśī bhinnanimittaḥ pūrvadṛṣṭam artham smaratīti ekasyānekārthadarśino darśanapratisandhānāt smṛter ātmaguṇatve sati sadbhāvaḥ viparyaye cānupapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3621: aparisaṅkhyānāś ca smṛtiviṣayasya --- aparisaṅghyāya ca smṛtiviṣayam idam ucyate ``na smṛteḥ smartavyaviṣayatvād'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3622: yeyaṃ smṛtir agṛhyamāṇe 'rthe ajñāsiṣam aham amum artham iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3627: asminn arthe mama jñānam abhūd iti caturvidham etadvākyaṃ smṛtiviṣayajñāpakaṃ samānārtham/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3628: sarvatra khalu jñātā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ ca gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3629: atha pratyakṣe 'rthe yā smṛtis tayā trīṇi jñānāni ekasminn arthe pratisandhīyante samānakartṛkāṇi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3632: adrākṣam amum arthaṃ yam evaitarhi paśyāmi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3634: na khalv asaṃvidite sve darśane syād etad adrakṣam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3637: evam eko 'rthas tribhir jñānair yujyamāno nākartṛko na nānākartṛkaḥ kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3640: so 'yaṃ smṛtiviṣayo 'parisaṅkhyāyamāno vidyamānaḥ prajñāto 'rthaḥ pratiṣidhyate --- nāsty ātmā smṛteḥ smartavyaviṣayatvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3641: na cedaṃ smṛtimātraṃ smartavyamātraviṣayam vā idaṃ khalu jñānapratisandhānavat smṛtipratisandhānam ekasya sarvaviṣayatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3642_0: eko 'yaṃ jñātā sarvaviṣayaḥ svāni jñānāni pratisandhatte amum arthaṃ jñāsyāmi amum
GSP29nysvbh1u:3642_1: artham vijānāmy amum artham ajñāsiṣam amum arthaṃ jijñāsamānaś ciram ajñātvādhyavasyaty ajñāsiṣam iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3643: evaṃ smṛtim api trikālaviśiṣṭāṃ suṣmūrṣāviśiṣṭāṃ ca pratisandhatte/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3644: saṃskārasantatimātre tu sattve utpadyotpadya saṃskārās tirobhavanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3645: sa nāsty eko 'pi saṃskāro yas trikālaviśiṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ smṛtiṃ cānubhavet/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3646: na cānubhavam antareṇa jñānasya smṛteś ca pratisandhānam ahaṃ mameti cotpadyate dehāntaravat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3647: ato 'numīyate asty ekaḥ sarvaviṣayaḥ pratidehaṃ svajñānaprabandhaṃ smṛtiprabandhaṃ ca pratisandhatta iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3648: yasya dehāntareṣu vṛtter abhāvān na pratisandhānaṃ bhavatīti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3654: kasmāt? ātmapratipattihetūnāṃ manasi sambhavāt ---``darśanasparśanābhyām ekārthagrahaṇād'' ity evamādīnām ātmapratipādakānāṃ hetūnāṃ manasi sambhavo yataḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3660: jñātuḥ khalu jñānasādhanāny upapadyante --- cakṣuṣā paśyati ghrāṇena jighrati sparśanena spṛśati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3661: evaṃ mantuḥ sarvaviṣayasya matisādhanam antaḥkaraṇabhūtaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ vidyate yenāyaṃ manyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3662: evaṃ sati jñātary ātmasaṃjñā na mṛṣyate manaḥsaṃjñābhyanujñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3663: manasi ca manaḥsaṃjñā na mṛṣyate matisādhanaṃ tv abhyanujñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3664: tad idaṃ saṃjñābhedamātraṃ nārthe vivāda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3667: atha mantuḥ sarvaviṣayasya matisādhanaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ pratyākhyāyate nāstīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3668: evaṃ rūpādiviṣayagrahaṇasādhanāny api na santīti sarvendriyavilopaḥ prasajyata iti//16//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3676: nātrānumānam asti yena niyamaṃ pratipadyāmaha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3677: rūpādibhyaś ca viṣayāntaraṃ sukhādayas tadupalabdhau karaṇāntarasadbhāvaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3678: yathā cakṣuṣā gandho na gṛhyata iti karaṇāntaraṃ ghrāṇam evaṃ cakṣur ghrāṇābhyāṃ raso na gṛhyata iti karaṇāntaraṃ rasanam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3680: tathā cakṣurādibhiḥ sukhādayo na gṛhyanta iti karaṇāntareṇa bhavitavyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3683: yac ca sukhādyupalabdhau karaṇaṃ tac ca jñānāyaugaoadyaliṅgaṃ tasyendriyam indriyaṃ prati sannidher asannidheḥ ca na yugapaj jñānāny utpadyanta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3684: tatra yad uktam ``ātmapratipattihetūnāṃ manasi sambhavāt'' iti tad ayuktam//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3688: kiṃ punar ayaṃ dehādisaṅghātād anyo nityaḥ utānitya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3691: vidyamānam ubhayathā bhavati nityam anityaṃ ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3694: ātmasadbhāvahetubhir evāsya prāg dehabhedād avasthānaṃ siddham ūrddhvam api dehabhedād avatiṣṭhate/ kutaḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3696: jātaḥ khalv ayaṃ kumārako 'smin janmany agṛhīteṣu harṣabhayaśokahetuṣu harṣabhayaśokān pratipadyate liṅgānumeyān/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3698: smṛtyanubandhaś ca pūrvābhyāsam antareṇa na bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3700: nānyatheti sidhyaty etat avatiṣṭhate 'yam ūrdhvaṃ śarīrabhedād iti//18//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3705: yathā padmādiṣv anityeṣu prabodhaḥ sammīlanaṃ vikāro bhavati evam anityasyātmano harṣabhayaśokasampratipattir vikāraḥ syāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3706_0: hetvabhāvād ayuktam --- anena hetunā padmādiṣu prabodhasammīlanavikāravad anityasyātmano
GSP29nysvbh1u:3706_1: harṣādisampratipattir iti nātrodāharaṇasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetur na vaidharmyād
GSP29nysvbh1u:3706_2: asti hetvabhāvāt asambaddhārthakam apārthakam ucyata iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3708: dṛṣṭāntāc ca harṣādinimittasyānivṛttiḥ --- yā ceyam āseviteṣu viṣayeṣu harṣādisampratipattiḥ smṛtyanubandhakṛtā pratyātmanaṃ gṛhyate seyaṃ padmādisammīlanadṛṣṭāntena na nivartate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3709: yathā ceyaṃ na nivarttate tathā jātasyāpīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3712: evaṃ ca sati kiṃ dṛṣṭāntena pratiṣidhyate//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3715: atha nirnimittaḥ padmādiṣu prabodhasammīlanavikāra iti matam evam ātmano 'pi harṣādisampratipattir iti/ tac ca ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3717: uṣṇādiṣu satsu bhāvād asatsv abhāvāt tannimittāḥ pañcabhūtānugraheṇa nivṛttānāṃ padmādīnāṃ prabodhasammīlanavikārā iti na nirnimittāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3718: evaṃ harṣādayo 'pi vikārā nimittad bhavitum arhanti na nimittam antareṇa/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3732: dṛśyate hi śarīriṇāṃ kṣudhā pīḍyamānānām āhārābhyāsakṛtāt smaraṇānubandhād āhārābhilāṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3736: sa khalv ayam ātmā pūrvaśarīrāt pretya śarīrāntaram āpannaḥ kṣutpīḍitaḥ pūrvābhyastam āhāram anusmaran stanyam abhilaṣati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3737: tasmān na dehabhedād ātmā bhidyate bhavaty evorddhvaṃ dehabhedād iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3742: evam āhārābhyāsam antareṇa bālaḥ stanyam abhilaṣati//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3746: kim idam ayaso 'yaskāntābhisarpaṇaṃ nirnimittam atha nimittād iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3758: na ca stanyābhilāṣaliṅgam anyad āhārābhyāsakṛtāt smaraṇāubandhāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3762: na ca dṛṣṭānto dṛṣṭam abhilāṣahetuṃ bādhate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3764: ayasaḥ khalv api nānyatra pravṛttir bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3769: evaṃ bālasyāpi niyataviṣayo 'bhilāṣaḥ kāraṇaniyamād bhavitum arhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3770: tac ca kāraṇam abhyastasmaraṇam anyad veti dṛṣṭena viśiṣyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3771: dṛṣṭo hi śarīriṇām abhastasmaraṇād āhārābhilāṣa iti//23//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3779: pūrvānubhavaś ca viṣayāṇām anyasmin janmani śarīram antareṇa nopapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3781: so 'yam ātmā pūrvaśarīrānubhūtān viṣayān anusmaran teṣu teṣu rajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3783: evaṃ pūrvaśarīrasya pūrvatareṇa pūrvatarasya pūrvatamenetyādinānādiś cetanasya śarīrayogaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3784: anādiś ca rāgānubandha iti siddhaṃ nityatvam iti//24//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3788: kathaṃ punar jñāyate pūrvānubhūtaviṣayānucintanajanito jātasya rāgaḥ, na punaḥ ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3790: athotpattidharmakasya dravyasya guṇāḥ kāraṇata utpadyante tathotpattidharmakasyātmano rāgaḥ kutaścid utpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3795: na khalu saguṇadravyotpattivad utpattir ātmano rāgasya ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3797: ayaṃ khalu prāṇināṃ viṣayān āsevamānānāṃ saṅkalpajanito rāgo gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3800: ātmotpādādhikaraṇāt tu rāgotpattir bhavantī saṅkalpād anyasmin rāgakāraṇe sati vācyā kāryadravyaguṇavat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3801: na cātmotpādaḥ siddho nāpi saṅkalpād anyad rāgakāraṇam asti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3802: % nāpi saṅkalpād anyad rāgakāraṇam asti/] p.751
GSP29nysvbh1u:3803: tasmād ayuktaṃ saguṇadravyotpattivat tayor utpattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3804: athāpi saṅkalpād anyad rāgakāraṇaṃ dharmādharmalakṣaṇam adṛṣṭam upādīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3806: tatra hi tasya nirvṛttiḥ nāsmin janmani/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3808: viṣayābhyāsaḥ khalv ayaṃ bhāvanāhetuḥ tanmayatvam ucyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3810: karma khalv idaṃ jātiviśeṣanirvartakaṃ tādarthyāt tācchabdyaṃ vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3811: tasmād anupapannaṃ saṅkalpād anyad rāgakāraṇam iti//26//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3817: tat parīkṣyate --- kiṃ ghrāṇādivad ekaprakṛtikam uta nānāprakṛtīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3820: pṛthivyādīni bhūtāni saṅkhyāvikalpena śarīraprakṛtir iti pratijānata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3828: na tv idam abādibhir asampṛktayā pṛthivyārabdhaṃ ceṣṭendriyārthāśrayabhāvena kalpate ity ataḥ pañcānāṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃyoge sati śarīraṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3829: bhūtasaṃyogo hi mithaḥ pañcānāṃ na niṣiddha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3830: āpyataijasavāyavyāni lokāntare śarīrāṇi teṣv api bhūtasaṃyogaḥ puruṣārthatantra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3831: sthālyādidravyaniṣpattāv api niḥsaṃśayo nābādisaṃyogam antarena niṣpattir iti//27//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3838: ta ime sandigdhā hetava ity upekṣitavān sūtrakāraḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3840: sati ca prakṛtibhāve bhūtānāṃ dharmopalabdhir asati ca saṃyogāpratiṣedhāt sannihitānām iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3842: tad idam anekabhūtaprakṛti śarīram agandham arasam arūpam asparśaṃ ca prakṛtyanuvidhānāt syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3843: % -m arūpam asparśaṃ ca prakṛtyanuvidhānāt syāt,] p.755
GSP29nysvbh1u:3850: ``sūryaṃ te cakṣurgacchatād'' ity atra mantre ``pṛthivīṃ te śarīram'' iti śrūyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3851: tad idaṃ prakrtau vikārasya pralayābhidhānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3853: ``sūryaṃ te cakṣuḥ spṛṇomi'' ity atra mantrāntare ``pṛthivīṃ te śarīraṃ spṛṇomīti'' śrūyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3854: seyaṃ kāraṇād vikārasya spṛtir abhidhīyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3855: sthālyādiṣu ca tulyajātīyānām ekakāryārambhadarśanād bhinnajātīyānām ekakāryārambhānupapattiḥ//31//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3858: athedānīm indriyāṇi prameyakrameṇa vicāryante --- kim āvyaktikāny āhosvid bhautikānīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3861: NyS_3,1.32: kṛṣṇasāre saty upalambhād vyatiricya copalambhāt saṃśayaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3863: tasminn anupahate rūpopalabdhiḥ upahate cānupalabdhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3864: vyatiricya kṛṣṇasāram avasthitasya viṣayasya upalambho na kṛṣṇasāraprāptasya/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3874: mahad iti mahattaraṃ mahattamaṃ copalabhyate yathā nyagrodhaparvatādi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3875: aṇv iti aṇutaram aṇutamaṃ ca gṛhyate yathā nyagrodhadhānādi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3877: bhautikaṃ hi yāvat tāvad eva vyāpnoti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3882: na mahadaṇugrahaṇamātrād abhautikatvaṃ vibhutvaṃ cendriyāṇāṃ śakyaṃ pratipattum/ idaṃ khalu ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3884: tayor mahadaṇvor grahaṇaṃ cakṣūraśmer arthasya ca sannikarṣaviśeṣād bhavati yathā pradīparaśmer arthasya ceti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3887: cākṣuṣo hi raśmiḥ kuḍyādibhir āvṛtam arthaṃ na prakāśayati yathā pradīparaśmir iti//34//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3894: mahattvād anekadravyavattvād rūpavattvāc copalabdhir iti pradīpavat pratyakṣata upalabhyeta cākṣuṣo raśmir yadi syād iti//35//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3898: sannikarṣapratiṣedhārthenāvaraṇena liṅgenānumīyamānasya raśmer yā pratyakṣato 'nupalabdhir nāsāv abhāvaṃ pratipādayati yathā candramasaḥ parabhāgasya prthivyāś cādhobhāgasya//36//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3903: bhinnaḥ khalv ayaṃ dravyadharmo guṇadharmaś ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3904: mahadanekadravyavac ca viṣaktāvayavam āpyaṃ dravyaṃ pratyakṣato nopalabhyate sparśas tu śīto gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3905: tasya dravyasyānubandhād hemantaśiśirau kalpyete tathāvidham eva ca taijasaṃ dravyam anudbhūtarūpaṃ saha rūpeṇa nopalabhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3907: sparśas tv asyoṣṇa upalabhyate tasya dravyasyānubandhād grīṣmavasantau kalpyete//37//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3912: tatra rūpaṃ ca dravyaṃ ca tadāśrayaḥ pratyakṣata upalabhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3913: rūpaviśeṣas tu yadbhāvāt kvacid rūpopalabdhiḥ yadabhāvāc ca dravyasya kvacid anupalabdhiḥ sa rūpadharmo 'yam udbhava samākhyāta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3919: udbhūtarūpam anudbhūtasparśaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ yathā pradīparaśmayaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3925: yathā cetanasyārtho viṣayopalabdhibhūtaḥ sukhaduḥkhopalabdhibhūtaś ca kalpyate tathendriyāṇi vyūḍhāni,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3929: sarvadravyāṇāṃ viśvarūpo vyūha indriyavat karmakāritaḥ puruṣārthatantraḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3933: yaś cātvaraṇopalambhād indriyasya dravyaviśeṣe pratighātaḥ sa bhautikadharmo na bhūtāni vyabhicarati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3935: apratighātas tu vyabhicārī bhautikābhautikayoḥ samānatvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3940: kasmāt? yasmād bhautikam api na pratihanyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3948: yathā ``anekadravyeṇa samavāyād rūpaviśeṣāc copalabdhir'' iti saty upalabdhikāraṇe madhyandinolkāprakāśo nopakabhyate ādityaprakāśenābhibhūtaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3949: evaṃ mahadanekadravyavattvād rūpaviśeṣāc copalabhir iti saty upalabdhikāraṇe cākṣuṣo raśmir nopalabhyate nimittāntarataḥ//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3950: tac ca vyākhyātam anudbhūtarūpasparśasya dravyasya pratyakṣato 'nupalabdhir iti//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3954: yo hi bravīti loṣṭaprakāśo madhyandine ādityaprakāśābhibhavān nopalabhyata iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3960: na tv evaṃ cakṣuṣo raśmir iti//41//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3966: sati ca prakāśānugrahe śītasparśopalabdhau ca satyāṃ tadāśrayasya dravyasya cakṣuṣā 'grahaṇaṃ rūpasyānudbhūtatvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3969: tatra yad uktaṃ ``tadanupalabdher ahetur'' iti etad ayuktam//42//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3972: kasmāt punar abhibhavo 'nupalabdhikāraṇaṃ cākṣuṣasya raśmer nocyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3975: yad rūpam abhivyaktam udbhūtaṃ bāhyaprakāśānugrahaṃ ca nāpekṣate tadviṣayo 'bhibhavaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3977: anudbhūtarūpatvāc cānupalabhyamānaṃ bāhyaprakāśānugrahāc copalabhyamānaṃ nābhibhūyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3979: evam upapannam asti cākṣuṣo raśmir iti//43//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3984: dṛśyante hi naktaṃ nayanaraśmayo naktañcarāṇāṃ vṛṣadaṃśaprabhṛtīnām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3987: dharmabhedamātraṃ cānupapannam āvaraṇasya prātipratiṣedhārthasya darśanād iti//44//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3993: tṛṇādi sarpad dravyaṃ kāce abhrapaṭale vā pratihataṃ dṛṣt'm,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3994: avyavahitena sannikṛṣyate vyāhanyate vai prāptir vyavadhāneneti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3995: yadi ca raśmyarthasannikarṣo grahaṇahetuḥ syāt na vyavahitasya sannikarṣa ity agrahaṇaṃ syāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3996: asti ceyaṃ kācābhrapaṭalasphaṭikāntaritopalabdhiḥ sā jñāpayati aprāpyakārīṇīndriyāṇi ata evābhautikāni,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4007: na ca kāco 'bhrapaṭalaṃ vā nayanaraśmiṃ viṣṭabhnāti so 'pratihanyamānaḥ sannikṛṣyata iti//47//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4011: yaś ca manyate na bhautikasyāpratighāta iti tan na ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4015: avighātād iti ca padābhisambandhād vākyabheda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4019: prāptau hi dravyāntaraguṇasya uṣṇasya sparśasya grahaṇaṃ tena ca śītasparśābhibhava iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4022: bharjanakapālādisthaṃ ca dravyam āgneyena tejasā dahyate tatrāvighātāt prāptiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4023: prāptau tu dāho nāprāpyakāri teja iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4025: avighātād iti ca kevalaṃ padam upādīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4027: avyuhyamānāvayavena vyavadhāyena dravyeṇa sarvato dravyasyāviṣṭhmbhaḥ kriyāhetor apratibandhaḥ prāpter apratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4028: dṛṣṭaṃ hi kalaśaniṣaktānām apāṃ bahiḥ śītasparśasya grahaṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4031: tatra kācābhrapaṭalādibhir nayanaraśmer apratighātād vibhidyārthena saha sannikarṣād upapannaṃ grahaṇam iti//48//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4037: kuḍyādivad vā kācābhrapaṭalādibhiḥ pratighāta iti prasajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4042: ādarśodakayoḥ prasādo rūpaviśeṣaḥ svo dharmo niyamadarśanāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4044: yathā ādarśapratihatasya parāvṛttasya nayanaraśmeḥ svena mukhena sannikarṣe sati svamukhopalambhanaṃ pratibimbagrahaṇākhyam ādarśarūpānugrahāt tannimittaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4047: kuḍyādiṣu ca pratibimbagrahaṇaṃ na bhavati evaṃ kācābhrapaṭalādibhir avighātaś cakṣūraśmeḥ kuḍyādibhiś ca pratighāto dravyasvabhāvaniyamād iti//50//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4052: na khalu bhoḥ parīkṣamāṇena dṛṣṭānumitā arthāḥ śakyā niyoktum evaṃ bhavateti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4055: na hīdam upapadyate rūpavad gandho 'pi cākṣuṣo bhavatv iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4056: gandhavad vā rūpaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ mā bhūd iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4058: udakāpratipattivad vā dhūmenāgnipratipattir api mā bhūd iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4060: yathā khalv arthā bhavanti ya eṣāṃ svo bhāvaḥ svo dharma iti tathābhūtāḥ pramāṇena pratipadyanta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4062: imau khalu niyogapratiṣedhau bhavatā deśitau kācābhrapaṭalādivad vā kuḍyādibhir apratighāto bhavatu kuḍyādivad vā kācābhrapaṭalādibhir apratighāto mā bhūd iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4070: athāpi khalv ekam idam indriyaṃ bahūnīndriyāṇi vā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4072: NyS_3,1.52: sthānānyatve nānātvād avayavinānāsthānatvāc ca saṃśayaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4083: na tvacā kiñcid indriyādhiṣṭhānaṃ na prāptam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4084: na cāsatyāṃ tvaci kiñcid viṣayagrahaṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4085: yayā satvendriyasthānāni vyāptāni yasyāṃ ca satyāṃ viṣayagrahaṇaṃ bhavati sā tvag ekam indriyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4087: sparśopalabdhilakṣaṇāyāṃ satyāṃ tvaci gṛhyamāṇe tvagindriyeṇa sparśe indriyāntarārthā rūpādayo na gṛhyante andhādibhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4088: na sparśagrāhakāt indriyād indriyāntaram astīti sparśavad andhādibhir gṛhyeran rūpādayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4089: na ca gṛhyante tasmān naikam indriyaṃ tvag iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4092: yathā tvaco 'vayavaviśeṣaḥ kaścic cakṣuṣi sannikṛṣṭo dhūmasparśaṃ gṛhṇāti nānyaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4093: evaṃ tvaco 'vayavaviśeṣā rūpādigrāhakās teṣām upaghātād andhādibhir na gṛhyante rūpādaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4095: tvagavyatirekād ekam indriyam ity uktvā ``tvag avayavaviśeṣeṇa dhūmopalabdhivad rūpādyupalabdhir'' ity ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4096: evaṃ ca sati nānābhūtāni viṣayagrāhakāṇi viṣayavyavasthānāt tadbhāve viṣayagrahaṇasya bhāvāt tadupaghāte cābhāvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4097: tathā ca pūrvo vāda uttareṇa vādeṇa vyāhanyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4100: na ca teṣv asatsu viṣayagrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4101: tasmān na tvag anyad vā sarvaviṣayam ekam indriyam iti//53//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4110: na ca yugapad rūpādayo gṛhyante tasmān naikam indriyaṃ sarvaviṣayam astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4111: asāhacaryāc ca viṣayagrahaṇānāṃ naikam indriyaṃ sarvaviṣayakam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4116: NyS_3,1.55: vipratiṣedhāc ca na tvag ekā //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4117: na khalu tvag ekam indriyaṃ vyāghātāt --- tvacā rūpāṇy aprāptāni gṛhyanta ity aprāpyakāritve sparśādiṣv apy evaṃ prasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4118: sparśādīnāṃ ca prāptānāṃ grahaṇād rūpādīnāṃ prāptānāṃ grahaṇam iti prāptam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4122: athāpi manyeta prāptāḥ sparśādayas tvacā gṛhyante rūpāṇi tv aprāptānīti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4124: āvaraṇānupapatteś ca rūpamātrasya grahaṇaṃ vyavahitasya cāvyavahitasya ceti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4126: aprāptaṃ tvacā gṛhyate rūpam iti dūre rūpasyāgrahaṇam antike ca grahaṇam ity etan na syād iti//55//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4129: pratiṣedhāc ca nānātvasiddhau sthāpanāhetur apy upādīyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4133: sparśanenendriyeṇa sparśagrahaṇe sati na tenaiva rūpaṃ gṛhyata iti rūpagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ cakṣur anumīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4134: % tenaiva rūpaṃ gṛhyata iti rūpagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ cakṣur anumīyate/] p.788
GSP29nysvbh1u:4135: sparśarūpagrahaṇe ca tābhyām eva na gandho gṛhyata iti gandhagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ ghrāṇam anumīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4136: trayāṇāṃ grahaṇe na tair eva raso gṛhyata iti rasagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ rasanam anumīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4137: na ca caturṇāṃ grahaṇe tair eva śabdaḥ śrūyata iti śabdagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ śrotram anumīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4151: tad yasyendriyārthapañcatvāt pañcendriyāṇi tasyendriyārthabahutvād bahūni indriyāṇi prasajyanta iti//57//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4155: gandhatvādibhiḥ svasāmānyaiḥ kṛtavyavasthānāṃ gandhādīnāṃ yāni gandhādigrahaṇāni tāny asamānasādhanasādhyatvād grāhakāntarāṇi na prayojayanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4158: arthaikadeśaṃ cāśritya viṣayapañcatvamātraṃ bhavān pratiṣedhati tasmād ayukto 'yaṃ pratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4159: kathaṃ punar gandhatvādibhiḥ svasāmānyaiḥ kṛtavyavasthā gandhādaya iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4160: sparśaḥ khalv ayaṃ trividhaḥ śīta uṣṇo 'nuṣṇāśītaś ca sparśatvena svasāmānyena saṃgṛhītaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4161: gṛhyamāṇe ca śītasparśe noṣṇasyānuṣṇāśītasya vā sparśasya grahaṇaṃ grāhakāntaraṃ prayojayati sparśabhedānām ekasādhanasādhyatvād yenaiva śītasparśo gṛhyate tenaivetarāv apīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4173: viṣayatvena hi sāmānyena gandhādayaḥ saṅgṛhītā iti//59//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4178: na khalu viṣayatvena sāmānyena kṛtavyavasthā viṣayā grāhakāntaranirapekṣā ekasādhanagrāhyā anumīyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4179: anumīyante ca pañca gandhādayo gandhatvādibhiḥ svasāmānyaiḥ kṛtavyavasthā indriyāntaragrāhyāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4183: tad etat ``indriyārthapañcatvāt'' ity etasmin sūtre kṛtabhāṣyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4194: kṛṣṇasāropanibaddhaṃ cakṣur bahirniḥsṛtya rūpādhikaraṇāni dravyāṇi prāpnoti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4195: sparśanādīni tv indriyāṇi viṣayā evāśrayopasarpaṇāt pratyāsīdanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4197: ākṛtiḥ khalu parimāṇam iyattā sā pañcadhā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4201: tac ca vibhu śabdamātrānubhavānumeyaṃ puruṣasaṃskāropagrahaṇāc cādhiṣṭhānaniyamena śabdasya vyañjakam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4214: pārthivaṃ kiñcid dravyaṃ kasyacid dravyasya gandhavyañjakam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4215: asti cāyam indriyāṇāṃ bhūtaguṇaviśeṣopalabdhiniyamaḥ tena bhūtaguṇaviśeṣopalabdher manyāmahe bhūtaprakṛtīnīndriyāṇi nāvyaktaprakṛtīnīti//61//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4219: gandhādayaḥ pṛthivyādiguṇā ity uddiṣṭam uddeśaś ca pṛthivyādīnām ekaguṇatve cānekaguṇatve ca samāna ity ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4230: uddeśasūtre hi sparśaparyantebhyaḥ paraḥ śabda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4231: tantraṃ vā sparśasya vivakṣitatvāt --- sparśaparyanteṣu niyukteṣu yo 'nyas taduttaraḥ śabda iti//62-63//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4237: kasmāt? yasya bhūtasya ye guṇā na te tadātmakenendriyeṇa sarve upalabhyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4238: pārthivena hi ghrāṇena sparśaparyantā na gṛhyante gandha eva eko gṛhyate evaṃ śeṣeṣv apīti//64//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4243: gandhādīnām ekaiko yathākramaṃ pṛthivyādīnām ekaikasya guṇaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4246: ghrāṇena rasarūpasparśānāṃ rasanena rūpasparśayoḥ cakṣuṣā sparśasyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4247: kathaṃ tarhy anekaguṇāni bhūtāni gṛhyanta iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4249: abādisaṃsargāc ca pṛthivyāṃ rasādayo gṛhyante evaṃ śeṣeṣv apīti//65//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4253: niyamas tarhi na prāpnoti saṃsargasyāniyamāt caturguṇā pṛthivī triguṇā āpo dviguṇaṃ teja ekaguṇo vāyur iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4256: pṛthivyādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvam uttareṇottareṇa viṣṭam ataḥ saṃsarganiyama iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4263: kasmāt? pārthivasya dravyasyāpy asya ca pratyakṣaṭvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4264: mahatvānekadravyatvād rūpāc copalabdhir iti taijasam eva dravyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syāt na pārthivam āpyaṃ vā rūpābhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4265: taijasavat tu pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt na saṃsargād anekaguṇagrahaṇaṃ bhūtānām iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4266: bhūtāntararūpakṛtaṃ ca pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ bruvataḥ pratyakṣo vāyuḥ prasajyate niyame vā kāraṇam ucyatām iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4268: rasayor vā pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt --- pārthivo rasaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4272: saṃsarge hi vyañjakam eva rūpaṃ na vyaṅgyam astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4276: na caitad ekaguṇānāṃ saṃsarge saty upapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4282: na caitad ekaguṇānām anuṣṇāśītasparśena vāyunā saṃsargeṇopapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4283: atha vā pārthivāpyayor dravyayor vyvasthitaguṇayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4284: caturguṇaṃ pārthivaṃ dravyaṃ triguṇam āpyaṃ pratyakṣam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4286: tasya kāryaṃ liṅgaṃ kāraṇabhāvād dhi kāryabhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4287: evaṃ taijasavāyavyayor dravyayoḥ pratyakṣatvād guṇavyavasthāyāḥ tatkāraṇe dravye vyavasthānumānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4289: pārthivaṃ dravyam abādibhir viyuktaṃ pratyakṣato gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4294: niranumānaṃ tu ``viṣṭaṃ hy aparaṃ pareṇa'' ity etad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4295: nātra liṅgam anumāpakaṃ gṛhyata iti yenaitad evaṃ pratipadyemahi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4296: yac coktaṃ viṣṭaṃ hy aparaṃ pareṇeti bhūtasṛṣṭau veditavyaṃ na sāmpratam iti niyamakāraṇābhāvād ayuktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4297: dṛṣṭaṃ ca sāmpratam aparaṃ pareṇa viṣṭam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4301: vāyunā ca viṣṭatvāt sparśavat tejo na tu tejasā viṣṭatvād rūpavān vāyur iti niyamakāraṇaṃ nāstīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4302: dṛṣṭaṃ ca taijasena sparśena vāyavyasya sparśasyābhibhavād agrahaṇam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4306: tad evaṃ nyāyaviruddhaṃ pravādaṃ pratiṣidhya ``na sarvaguṇānupalabdher'' iti coditaṃ samādhīyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4309: ghrāṇādīnāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ gandhāder guṇasyotkarṣāt tat tat pradhānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4314: yathā bāhyānāṃ pārthivāpyataijasānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ caturguṇatriguṇadviguṇānāṃ na sarvaguṇavyañjakatvaṃ gandharasarūpotkarṣāt tu yathākramaṃ gandharasarūpavyañjakatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4316: evaṃ ghrāṇa rasanacakṣuṣā.ṃ caturguṇatriguṇadviguṇānāṃ na sarvaguṇagrāhakatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4318: tasmād ghrāṇādibhir na sarveṣāṃ guṇānām upalabdhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4319: yas tu pratijānīte gandhaguṇatvād ghrāṇaṃ gandhasya grāhakam evaṃ rasanādiṣv apīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4320: tasya yathāguṇayogaṃ ghrāṇādibhir guṇagrahaṇaṃ prasajyata iti//68//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4324: kiṃkṛtaṃ punar vyavasthānam --- kiñcit pārthivam indriyaṃ na sarvāṇi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4327: arthanirvṛttisamarthasya pravibhaktasya dravyasya saṃsargaḥ puruṣasaṃskārakārito bhūyastvam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4329: yathā prakṛṣṭo viṣayo bhūyān ity ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4330: yathā pṛthagarthakriyāsamarthāni puruṣasaṃskāravaśād viṣauṣadhimaṇiprabhṛtīni dravyāṇi nirvartyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4332: evaṃ pṛthagviṣayagrahaṇasamarthāni ghrāṇādīni nirvartyante na sarvaviṣayagrahaṇasamarthānīti//69//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4342: ghrāṇaṃ svena gandhena samānārthakāriṇā saha bāhyaṃ gandhaṃ gṛhṇāti tasya svagandhagrahaṇaṃ sahakārivaikalyān na bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4346: yadi punar gandhaḥ sahakārī ca syād ghrāṇasya grāhyaś cety ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4350: yo brūte --- yathā bāhyaṃ dravyaṃ cakṣuṣā (corr.; cakṣaṣā, ed.)
GSP29nysvbh1u:4351: gṛhyate tathā tenaiva cakṣuṣā tad eva cakṣur gṛhyatām iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4352: tādṛṅ idam; tulyo hy ubhayatra pratipattihetvabhāva iti//71//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4356: svaguṇān nopalabhanta indriyāṇīti etan na bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4362: na śabdena guṇena saguṇam ākāśam indriyaṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4375: asti cedaṃ śrotram ākāśaṃ ca śiṣyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4387: asparśavattvaṃ tābhyāṃ samāno dharma upalabhyate buddhau,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4389: viparyayaś ca yathāsvam anityanityayos tasyāṃ buddau nopalabhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4394: sarvaśarīriṇāṃ hi pratyātmavedanīyā anityā buddhiḥ sukhādivat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4396: bhavati ca saṃvittiḥ --- jñāsyāmi jānāmi ajñāsiṣam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4398: tataś ca traikālyavyakter anityā buddhir ity etat śiddham/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4403: evaṃ hi paśyantaḥ pravadanti sāṅkhyāḥ --- puruṣasyāntaḥkaraṇabhūtā nityā buddhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4408: yaṃ pūrvam ajñāsiṣam arthaṃ tam imaṃ jānāmīti jñānyoḥ samāne 'rthe pratisandhijñānaṃ pratyabhijñānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4410: nānātve tu buddhibhedeṣūtpannāpavargiṣu pratyabhijñānānupapattiḥ nānyajñātam anyaḥ pratyabhijānātīti//2//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4414: yathā khalu nityatvaṃ buddheḥ sādhyam evaṃ pratyabhijñānam apīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4417: puruṣadharmaḥ khalv ayaṃ jñānaṃ darśanam upalabdhir bodhaḥ pratyayaḥ adhyavasāya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4421: karaṇacaitanyābhyupagame tu cetanasvarūpaṃ vacanīyaṃ nānirdiṣṭasvarūpam ātmāntaraṃ śakyam astīti pratipattum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4422: jñānaṃ ced buddher antaḥkaraṇasyābhyupagamyate cetanasyedānīṃ kiṃ svarūpaṃ ko dharmaḥ kiṃ tattvam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4423: jñānena ca buddhau vartamānenāyaṃ cetanaḥ kiṃ karotīti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4425: jñānād arthāntaravacanam --- puruṣaś cetayate buddhir jānātīti nedaṃ jñānād arthāntaram ucyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4426: cetayate jānīte buddhyate paśyati upalabhate ity eko 'yam artha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4427: buddhir jñpayatīti cet addhā --- jānīte puruṣo buddhir jñāpayatīti satyam etat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4428: evaṃ cābhyupagame jñānaṃ puruṣasyeti siddhaṃ bhavati na buddher antaḥkaraṇasyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4431: yaś ca pratijānīte --- kaścit puruṣaś cetayate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4435: puruṣāntarāṇi khalv imāni cetano boddhopalabdhā draṣṭeti naikasyaite dharmā iti atra kaḥ pratiṣedhahetur iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4437: abhinnārthā ete śabdā iti tatra vyavasthānupapattir ity evaṃ cen manyase,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4438: samānaṃ bhavati --- puruṣaś cetayate buddhir jānīte ity atrāpy artho na bhidyate tatrobhayoś cetanatvād anyataralopa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4439: yadi punar budhyate 'nayeti bodhanaṃ buddhiḥ mana evocyate tac ca nityam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4443: dṛṣṭaṃ hi karaṇabhede jñātur ekatvāt pratyabhijñānaṃ `savyadṛṣṭasyetareṇa pratyabhijñānād' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4447: tasmāj jñātur ayaṃ nityatve hetur iti//3//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4450: yac ca manyate buddher avasthitāyā yathāviṣayaṃ vṛttayo jñānāni niścaranti vṛttiś ca vṛttimato nānyeti, tac ca ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4452: vṛttivṛttimator ananyatve vṛttimato 'vasthānād vṛttīnām avasthānam iti yānīmāni viṣayagrahaṇāni tāny avatiṣṭanta iti yugapad viṣayāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ prasajyata iti//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4457: atīte ca pratyabhijñāne vṛttimān apy atīta ity antaḥkaraṇasya vināśaḥ prasajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4461: avibhu caikaṃ manaḥ paryāyeṇendriyaiḥ saṃyujyata iti ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4470: anupalabdhiś ca kasyācid arthasya viṣayāntaravyāsakte manasy upapadyate vṛttivṛttimator nānātvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4479: gatyabhāvāc ca pratiṣiddhaṃ vibhuno 'ntaḥkaraṇasyāyugapadgrahaṇaṃ na liṅgāntareṇānumīyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4480: yathā cakṣuṣo gatiḥ pratiṣiddhā sannikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭayos tulyakālagrahaṇāt pāṇicandramasor vyavadhānena pratīghāte so'numīyata iti so 'yaṃ nāntaḥ karaṇe vivādo na tasya nityatve/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4481: % karaṇe vivādo na tasya nityatve] p.819
GSP29nysvbh1u:4486: ekaṃ cāntaḥkaraṇaṃ nānā caitā jñānātmakā vṛttayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4492: kenacid indriyeṇa sannidhiḥ kenacid asannidhir ity ayaṃ tu vyāsaṅgo 'nujñāyate manasa iti//8//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4500: yathā dravyāntaropahite sphaṭike anyatvābhimāno nīlo lohita iti;
GSP29nysvbh1u:4504: sphaṭikānyatvābhimānavad ayaṃ jñāneṣu nānātvābhimāno gauṇo na punar gandhādyanyatvābhimānavad iti hetur nāsti hetvabhāvād anupapanna iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4505: samāno hetvabhāva iti cet na jñānānāṃ krameṇopajanāpāyadarśanāt --- krameṇa hīndriyārtheṣu jñānāny upajāyante cāpayanti ceti dṛśyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4507: tasmād gandhādyanyatvābhimānavad ayaṃ jñāneṣu nānātvābhimāna iti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4511: sphaṭikānyatvābhimānavad ity etad amṛṣyamāṇaḥ kṣaṇikavādy āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4512: NyS_3,2.10: sphaṭike 'py aparāparotpatteḥ kṣaṇikatvād vyaktīnām ahetuḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4516: sphaṭike 'pi anyā vyaktaya utpadyante anyā nirudhyanta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4519: kathaṃ punar gamyate kṣaṇikā vyaktaya iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4521: paktinirvṛttasyāhārarasasya śarīre rudhirādibhāvenopacayo 'pacayaś ca prabandhena pravarttate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4524: evaṃ ca saty avayavapariṇāmabhedena vṛddhiḥ śarīrasya kālāntare gṛhyate iti so 'yaṃ vyaktiviśeṣadharmo vyaktimātre veditavya iti//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4529: sarvāsu vyaktiṣu upacayāpacayaprabandhaḥ śarīravad iti nāyaṃ niyamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4531: nātra pratyakṣam anumānaṃ vā pratipādakam astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4537: yatra yatra na dṛśyate tatra tatra pratyākhyāyate yathā grāvaprabhṛtiṣu/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4540: yathā cārkasya kaṭukimnā sarvadravyāṇāṃ kaṭukimānām āpādayet tādṛg etad iti//11//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4543: yaś cāśeṣanirodhenāpūrvotpādaṃ niranvayaṃ dravyasantāne kṣaṇikatāṃ manyate tasyaitat ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4548: yasya tv anapacitāvayavaṃ nirudhyate anupacitāvayavaṃ cotpadyate tasyāśeṣanirodhe niranvaye vāpūrvotpāde na kāraṇam ubhayatrāpy upalabhyate iti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4552: NyS_3,2.13: kṣīravināśe kāraṇānupalabdhivad dadhyutpattivac ca tadupapattiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4553: yathānupalabhyamānaṃ kṣīravināśakāraṇaṃ dadhyutpattikāraṇaṃ cābhyanujñāyate tathā sphaṭike parāparāsu vyaktiṣu vināśakāraṇam utpādakāraṇaṃ cābhyanujñeyam iti//13//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4558: kṣīravināśaliṅgaṃ kṣīravināśakāraṇaṃ dadhyutpattiliṅgaṃ dadhyutpattikāraṇaṃ ca gṛhyate 'to nānupalabdhiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4559: viparyayas tu sphaṭikādiṣu dravyeṣu aparāparotpattau vyaktīnāṃ na liṅgam astīty anutpattir eveti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4565: payasaḥ pariṇāmo na vināśa ity eka āha/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4566: pariṇāmaś cāvasthitasya dravyasya pūrvadharmanivṛttau dharmāntarotpattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4568: satā dravyasya pūrvaguṇanivṛttau guṇāntaram utpadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4575: saṃmūrchanalakṣaṇād avayavavyūhād dravyāntare dadhni utpanne gṛhyamāṇe pūrvaṃ payodravyam avayavavibhāgebhyo nivṛttam ity anumīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4576: yathā mṛdavayavānāṃ vyūhāntarād dravyāntare sthālyām utpannāyāṃ pūrvaṃ mṛtpiṇḍadravyaṃ mṛdavayavavibhāgebhyo nivarttate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4577: mṛdvac cāvayavānvayaḥ payodadhnor nāśeṣanirodhe niranvayo dravyāntarotpādo ghaṭata iti//16//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4581: abhyanujñāya ca niṣkāraṇaṃ kṣīravināśaṃ dadhyutpādaṃ ca pratiṣedha ucyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4582: NyS_3,2.17: kvacid vināśakāraṇānupalabdheḥ kvacic copalabdher anekāntaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4583: kṣīradadhivan niṣkāraṇau vināśotpādau sphaṭikavyaktīnām iti nāyam ekānta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4585: nātra hetur asti akāraṇau vināśotpādau sphaṭikādivyaktīnāṃ kṣīradadhivat,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4586: na punar yathā vināśakāraṇabhāvāt kumbhasya vināśa utpattikāraṇabhāvāc cotpattiḥ evaṃ sphaṭikādivyaktīnāṃ vināśotpattikāraṇabhāvād vināśotpattibhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4589: gṛhyamāṇayor vināśotpādayoḥ sphaṭikādiṣu syād ayam āśrayavān dṛṣṭāntaḥ kṣīravināśakāraṇānupalabdhivad dadhyutpattivac ceti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4592: abhyanujñāya ca sphaṭikasyotpādavināśau yo 'tra sādhakas tasyābhyanujñānād apratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4593: kumbhavan na niṣkāraṇau vināśotpādau sphaṭikādīnām ity anujñeyo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratiṣeddham aśakyatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4594: kṣīradadhivat tu niṣkāraṇau vināśotpādāv iti śakyo 'yaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ kāraṇato vināśotpattidarśanāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4595: kṣīradadhnor vināśotpattī paśyatā tatkāraṇam anumeyaṃ kāryaliṅgaṃ hi kāraṇam iti//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4600: idaṃ tu cintyate kasyeyaṃ buddhir ātmeindriyamano 'rthānāṃ guṇa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4601: prasiddho 'pi khalv ayam arthaḥ parīkaṣāśeṣaṃ pravarttayāmīti prakriyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4602: so 'yaṃ buddhau sannikarṣotpatteḥ saṃśayaḥ viśeṣasyāgrahaṇād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4605: nendriyāṇām vā guṇo jñānaṃ teṣāṃ vināśo 'pi jñānasya bhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4606: bhavati khalv idam indriye 'rthe ca vinaṣṭe jñānam adrākṣam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4607: na ca jñātari vinaṣthe jñānaṃ bhavitum arhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4608: anyat khalu vai tad indriyārthasannikarṣajaṃ jñānaṃ yad indriyārthavināśe na bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4612: smṛtiḥ khalv iyam adrākṣam iti pūrvadṛṣṭaviṣayā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4613: na ca vijñātari naṣṭe pūrvopalabdheḥ smaraṇaṃ yuktam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4615: na ca manasi jñātary abhyupagamyamāne śakyam indriyārthayor jñātṛtvaṃ pratipādayitum//18//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4619: NyS_3,2.19: yugapaj jñeyānupalabdheś ca na manasaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4621: tatra yugapaj jṇeyānupalabdhyā yad anumīyate antaḥkaraṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4628: ghrāṇādisādhanasya ca jñātur gandhādijñānabhāvād anumīyate antaḥkaraṇasādhanasya sukhādijñānaṃ smṛtiś ceti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4629: tatra yaj jñānaguṇaṃ manaḥ sa ātmā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4630: yat tu sukhādyupalabdhisādhanam antaḥkaraṇaṃ manas tad iti saṃjñābhedamātraṃ nārthabheda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4632: yugapaj jñeyopalabdheś ca yogina iti vā cārthaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4633: yogī khalu ṛddhau prādurbhūtāyāṃ vikaraṇadharmā nirmāya sendriyāṇi śarīrāntarāṇi teṣu yugapaj jñeyāny upalabhate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4634: tac caitad vibhau jñātary upapadyate nāṇau manasīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4636: vibhu ca manastadantaḥkaraṇabhūtam iti tasya sarvendriyair yugapat saṃyogād yugapaj jñānāny utpadyerann iti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4640: vibhur ātmā sarvendriyaiḥ saṃyukta iti yugapaj jñānotpattiprasaṅga iti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4662: virodhī ca buddher guṇo na gṛhyate --- tasmād ātmaguṇatve sati buddher nityatvaprasaṅgaḥ//23//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4666: NyS_3,2.24: anityatvagrahād buddher buddhyantarād vināśaḥ śabdavat //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4667: anityā buddhir iti sarvaśarīriṇāṃ pratyātmavedanīyam etat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4668: gṛhyate ca buddhisantānaḥ tatra buddher buddhyantaraṃ virodhī guṇa ity anumīyate yathā śabdasantāne śabdaḥ śabdāntaravirodhīti//24//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4672_0: asaṅkhyeyeṣu jñānakāriteṣu saṃskāreṣu smṛtihetuṣv ātmasamaveteṣv ātmamanasoś ca sannikarṣe
GSP29nysvbh1u:4672_1: samāne smṛtihetau sati na kāraṇasyāyaugapadyam astīti yugapat smṛtayaḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4674: NyS_3,2.25: jñānasamavetātmapradeśasannikarṣān manasaḥ smṛtyutpatter na yugapadutpattiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4675: jñānasādhanaḥ saṃskāro jñānam ity ucyate jñānasaṃskṛtair ātmapradeśaiḥ paryāyeṇa manaḥ sannikṛṣyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4681: sadehasyātmano manasā saṃyogo vipacyamānakarmāśayasahito jīvanam iṣyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4682: tatrāsya prāk prāyaṇād antaḥśarīre vartamānasya manasaḥ śarīrād bahirjñānasaṃskṛtair ātmapradeśaiḥ saṃyogo nopapadyata iti//26//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4688: evaṃ ca sati sādhyam antaḥśarīravṛttitvaṃ manasa iti//27//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4692: susmūrṣayā khalv ayaṃ manaḥ praṇidadhānaś cirād api kaṃcid arthaṃ smarati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4694: ātmamanaḥsannikarṣajaś ca prayatno dvividhaḥ --- dhārakaḥ prerakaś ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4695: niḥsṛte ca śarīrād bahir manāsi dhārakasya prayatnasyābhāvād gurutvāt patanaṃ syāt śarīrasya smarata iti//28//0
GSP29nysvbh1u:4700: āśugati manaḥ tasya bahiḥśarīrātmapradeśena jñānasaṃskṛtena sannikarṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4701: pratyāgatasya ca prayatnotpādanam ubhayaṃ yujyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4702: utpādya vā dhārakaṃ prayatnaṃ śarīrān niḥsaraṇaṃ manasaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4709: tadā susmūrṣayā manasi dhāryamāṇe cintāprabandhe sati kasyacid arthasya liṅgabhūtasya cintanam ārādhitaṃ smṛtihetur bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4711: śarīrasaṃyogānapekṣaś cātmamanaḥsaṃyogo na smṛtihetuḥ śarīrasya bhogāyatanatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4713: upabhogāyatanaṃ puruṣasya jñātuḥ śarīraṃ na tato niścaritasya manasa ātmasaṃyogamātraṃ jñānasukhādīnām utpattau kalpate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4718: ātmapreraṇena vā manaso bahiḥ śarīrāt saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4724: yadi tāvad ātmā amuṣyārthasya smṛtihetuḥ saṃskāraḥ amuṣminn ātmadeśe samavetas tena manaḥ saṃyujyatām iti manaḥ prerayati tadā smṛta evāsāv artho bhavati na smartavyaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4727: susmūrṣayā cāyaṃ manaḥ praṇidadhānaś cirād api kañcid arthaṃ smarati nākasmāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4728: jñatvaṃ ca manaso nāsti jñānapratiṣedhād iti//31//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4734: yadā khalv ayaṃ vyāsaktamanāḥ kvacid deśe śarkarayā kaṇṭakena vā pādavyathanam āpnoti tadā ātmamanaḥ saṃyogaviśeṣa eṣitavyaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4737: yadṛcchayā tu na viśeṣo nākasmikī kriyā nākasmikaḥ saṃyoga iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4738: karmādṛṣṭam upabhogārthaṃ kriyāhetur iti cet samānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4739: karmādṛṣṭaṃ puruṣasthaṃ puruṣopabhogārthaṃ manasi kriyāhetuḥ evaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasaṃvedanaṃ ca sidhyatīty evaṃ cen manyase,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4740: samānam --- smṛtihetāv api saṃyogaviśeṣo bhavitum arhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4741: tatra yad uktam ``ātmapreraṇayadṛcchājñatābhiś ca na saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ'' ity ayam apratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4746: kaḥ khalv idānīṃ kāraṇayaugapadyasadbhāve yugapad asmaraṇasya hetur iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4748: yathā khalv ātmamanasoḥ sannikarṣaḥ saṃskāraś ca smṛtihetur evaṃ praṇidhānaṃ liṅgādijñānāni tāni ca na yugapadbhavanti tatkṛtā smṛtīnāṃ yugapad anutpattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4750: yat khalv idaṃ prātibham iva jñānaṃ praṇidhānādyanapekṣaṃ smārttam utpadyate kadācit tasya yugapadutpattiprasaṅgo hetvabhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4752: bahvarthaviṣaye vai cintāprabandhe kaścid evārthaḥ kasyacit smṛtihetuḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4753: % cintāprabandhe kaścid evārthaḥ kasyacit smṛtihetuḥ,] p.864
GSP29nysvbh1u:4755: na cāyaṃ smartā sarvaṃ smṛtihetuṃ saṃvedayate evaṃ me smṛtir utpanneti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4756: asaṃvedanāt prātibham iva jñānam idaṃ smārtam iti abhimanyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4757: na tv asti praṇidhānādyanapekṣaṃ smārtam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4758: prātibhe katham iti cet puruṣakarmaviśeṣād upabhogavan niyamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4759: prātibham idānīṃ jñānaṃ yugapat kasmān notpadyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4760: yathopabhogārthaṃ karma yugapadupabhogaṃ na karoti evaṃ puruṣakarmaviśeṣaḥ pratibhāhetur na yugapad anekaṃ prātibhaṃ jñānam utpādayati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4763: ``upabhogavan niyama'' ity asti dṛṣṭānto hetur nāstīti cen manyase?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4765: naikasmin jñeye yugapad anekaṃ jñānam utpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4767: tad idaṃ dṛṣṭena pratyayaparyāyeṇānumeyaṃ karaṇasāmarthyam itthambhūtam iti na jñātuḥ vikaraṇadharmaṇo dehanānātve pratyayayaugapadyād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4768: % pratyayaparyāyeṇānumeyaṃ karaṇasāmarthyam itthambhūtam iti na jñātuḥ vikaraṇadharmaṇo dehanānātve pratyayayaugapadyād iti/] p.865
GSP29nysvbh1u:4770: avasthitaśarīrasya cānekajñānasamavāyād ekapradeśe yugapad anekārthasmaraṇaṃ syāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4771: kvacid deśe 'vasthitaśarīrasya jñātur indriyārthaprabandhena jñānam anekam ekasminn ātmapradeśe samavaiti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4772: tena yadā manaḥ saṃyujyate tadā jñātapūrvasyānekasya yugapat smaraṇaṃ prasajyate pradeśasaṃyogaparyāyābhāvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4775: śabdasantāne tu śrotrādhiṣṭhānapratyāsattyā śabdaśravaṇavat saṃskārapratyāsattyā manasaḥ smṛtyutpatter na yugapad utpattiprasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4776: pūrva eva tu pratiṣedho nānekajñānasamavāyād ekapradeśe yugapat smṛtiprasaṅga iti//33//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4779: puruṣadharmo jñānam antaḥkaraṇasyecchādveṣaprayatnasukhaduḥkhāni dharmā iti kasyacid darśanam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4783: ayaṃ khalu jānāti tāvad idaṃ me sukhasādhanam idaṃ me duḥkhasādhanam iti jñātvā svasya sukhasādhanam āptum icchati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4790: ārambhanivṛttyoś ca pratyagātmani dṛṣṭatvāt paratrānumānaṃ veditavyam iti//34//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4796_0: ārambhanivṛttiliṅgāv icchādveṣāv iti yasyārambhanivṛttī tasyecchādveṣau tasya jñānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:4796_1: iti prāptaṃ pārthivāpy ataijasavāyavīyānāṃ śarīrāṇām ārambhanivṛttidarśanād icchādveṣajñānair
GSP29nysvbh1u:4801: ārambhanivṛttidarśanād icchādveṣajñānair yoga iti prāptaṃ paraśvādeḥ karaṇasyārambhanivṛttidarśanāc caitanyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4804: na tarhy ayaṃ hetuḥ pārthivāpy ataijasavāyavīyānāṃ śarīrāṇām ārambhanivṛttidarśanād icchādveṣajñānair yoga iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4806: ayaṃ tarhy anyo 'rthaḥ --- talliṅgatvād icchādveṣayoḥ pārthivādyeṣv apratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4807: pṛthivyādīnāṃ bhūtānām ārambhas tāvat trasasthāvaraśarīreṣu tadavayavavyūhaliṅgaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ loṣṭādiṣu ca liṅgābhāvāt pravṛttiviśeṣābhāvo nivṛttiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4808: ārambhanivṛttiliṅgāv icchādveṣāv iti pārthivādyeṣv aṇuṣu taddarśanād icchādveṣayogas tadyogāj jñānayoga iti siddhaṃ bhūtacaitanyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4812: na ca mṛtsikatānām ārambhanivṛttidarśanād icchādveṣaprayatnajñānair yogaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4813: tasmāt talliṅgatvād icchādveṣayor ity ahetur iti//36//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4821: tatra prayujyamāneṣu bhūteṣu pravṛttinivṛttī staḥ na sarveṣv ity aniyamopapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4822: yasya tu jñatvād bhūtānām icchādveṣanimitte ārambhanivṛttī svāśraye tasya niyamaḥ syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4823: yathā bhūtānāṃ guṇāntaranimittā pravṛttir guṇapratibandhāc ca nivṛttir bhūtamātre bhavati niyamena,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4824: evaṃ bhūtamātre jñānecchādveṣanimitte pravṛttinivṛttī svāśraye syātām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4825: na tu bhavataḥ tasmāt prayojakāśritā jñānecchādveṣaprayatnāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4829: bhūtacaitanikasyaikaśarīre bahūni bhūtāni jñānecchādveṣaprayatnaguṇānīti jñātṛbahutvaṃ prāptam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4834: dṛṣṭaś ca anyaguṇanimittaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣo bhūtānāṃ so 'numānam anyatrāpi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4835: dṛṣṭaḥ karaṇalakṣaṇeṣu bhūteṣu paraśvādiṣu upādānalakṣaṇeṣu ca mṛtprabhṛtiṣv anyaguṇanimittaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4838: sa ca guṇaḥ prayatnasamānāśrayaḥ saṃskāro dharmādharmasamākhyātaḥ sarvārthaḥ puruṣārthārādhanāya prayojako bhūtānāṃ prayatnavad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4839: ātmāstitvahetubhir ātmanityatvahetubhiś ca bhūtacaitanyapratiṣedhaḥ kṛto veditavyaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4840: ``nendriyārthayos tadvināśe 'pi jjānāvasthānād''iti ca samānaḥ pratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4841: kriyāmātraṃ kriyoparamamātraṃ cārambhanivṛttī ity abhipretyoktam ``talliṅgatvād icchādveṣayoḥ pārthivādyeṣv apratiṣedhaḥ''/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4850: NyS_3,2.38: yathoktahetutvāt pāratantryād akṛtābhyāgamāc ca na manasaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4851: ``icchādveṣaprayatnasukhaduḥkhajñānāny ātmano liṅgam''ity ataḥ prabhṛti yathoktaṃ saṅgṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4853: pāratantryāt --- paratantrāṇi bhūtendriyamanāṃsi dhāraṇapreraṇavyūhanakriyāsu prayatnavaśāt pravarttante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4856: akṛtābhyāgamāc ca --- ``pravṛttir vāgbuddhiśarīrārambha''iti caitanye bhūtendriyamanasāṃ parakṛtaṃ karma puruṣeṇopabhujyata iti syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4857: acaitanye tu tatsādhanasya svakṛtakarmaphalopabhogaḥ puruṣasyety upapadyata iti//38//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4865: bhūtendriyamanasāṃ pratiṣedhe dravyāntaraṃ na prasajyate śiṣyate cātmā tasya guṇo jñānam iti jñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4866: yathoktahetūpapatteś ceti ``darśanasparśanābhyām ekārthagrahaṇād''ityevamādīnām ātmapratipattihetūnām apratiṣedhād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4868: atha vā upapatteś ceti hetvantaram evedam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4870: yasmād ekasmin śarīre dharmaṃ caritvā kāyasya bhedāt svarge deveṣūpapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4874: buddhiprabandhamātre tu nirātmake nirāśrayā nopapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4877: buddhisantatimātre tv ekasattvānupapatter na kaścid dīrgham adhvānaṃ sandhāvati na kaścic charīraprabandhād vimucyata iti saṃsārāpavargānupapattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4878: buddhisantatimātre ca sattvabhedāt sarvam idaṃ prāṇivyavahārajātam apratisaṃhitam avyāvṛttam apariniṣṭhaṃ ca syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4879: % -jātam apratisaṃhitam avyāvṛttam apariniṣṭhaṃ ca syāt,] p.876
GSP29nysvbh1u:4881: smaraṇaṃ ca khalu pūrvajñātasya samānena jñātrā grahaṇam ajñāsiṣam amum arthaṃ jñeyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4882: so .yam eko jñātā pūrvajñātam arthaṃ gṛhṇāti tac cāsya grahaṇaṃ smaraṇam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4891: jña iti asya svabhāvaḥ svo dharmaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4892: ayaṃ khalu jñāsyati jānāti ajñāsīd iti trikālaviṣayeṇānekena jñānena sambadhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4894: tac cāsya trikālaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ jñāsyāmi jānāmi ajñāsiṣam iti varttate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4895: tad yasyāyaṃ svo dharmas tasya smaraṇaṃ na buddhiprabandhamātrasya nirātmakasyeti//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4898: smṛtihetūnām ayaugapadyād yugapad asmaraṇam ity uktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4902: susmūrṣayā manaso dhāraṇaṃ praṇidhānaṃ susmūrṣitaliṅgacintanaṃ cārthasmṛtikāraṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4904: ekagranthopayatāḥ khalv arthā anyonyasmṛtihetava ānupūrvyeṇetarathā vā bhavantīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4906: dhāraṇaśāstrakṛto vā prajñāteṣu vastuṣu smartavyānām upanikṣepo nibandha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4907: abhyāsas tu samāne viṣaye jñānānām abhyāvṛttiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4910: liṅgaṃ punaḥ saṃyogi samavāyy ekārthasamavāyi virodhi ceti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4918: parigrahāt svena vā svāmī svāminā vā svaṃ smaryate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4925: viyogād yena viyujyate tadviyogapratisaṃvedī bhṛśaṃ smarati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4929: prāpteḥ yato 'nena kiṃcit prāptam āptavyaṃ vā bhavati tam abhīkṣṇaṃ smarati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4933: icchādveṣābhyāṃ yam icchati yaṃ ca dveṣṭi taṃ smarati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4937: rāgād yasyāṃ striyāṃ rakto bhavati tām abhīkṣṇaṃ smarati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4940: na caiteṣu nimitteṣu yugapat saṃvedanāni bhavantīti yugapad asmaraṇam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4941: nidarśanaṃ cedaṃ smṛtihetūnāṃ na parisaṅkhyānam iti//41//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4945: anityāyāṃ ca buddhāv utpannāpavargitvāt kālāntarāvāsthānāc ca anityānāṃ saṃśayaḥ kim utpatpannāpavargiṇī buddhiḥ śabdavat āhosvit kālāntarāvasthāyinī kumbhavad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4950: pratyarthaniyamāc ca buddhīnāṃ kriyāsantānavad buddhisantānoupapattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4952: avasthite ca kumbhe gṛhyamāṇe santānenaiva buddhir vartate prāg vyavadhānāt tena vyavahite pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ nivartate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4955: kālāntarāvasthāne tu buddher dṛśyavyavadhāne 'pi pratyakṣam avatiṣṭheteti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4956: smṛtiś cāliṅgaṃ buddhyavasthāne saṃskārasya buddhijasya smṛtihetutvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4957: yaś ca manyeta avatiṣṭhate buddhiḥ dṛṣṭā hi buddhiviṣaye smṛtiḥ sā ca buddhāv anityāyāṃ kāraṇābhāvān na syād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4959: kasmāt? buddhijo hi saṃskāro guṇāntaraṃ smṛtihetur na buddhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4963: yāvad avatiṣṭhate buddhis tāvad asau boddhavyārthiḥ pratyakṣaḥ pratyskṣe ca smṛtir anupapanna iti//42//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4967: yady utpannāpavargiṇī buddhiḥ prāptam avyaktaṃ boddhavyasya grahaṇam,
