GSP29nysvbh1u:4968: yathā vidyutsampāte vaidyutasya prakāśasyānavasthānād avyaktaṃ rūpagrahaṇam iti;
GSP29nysvbh1u:4969: vyaktaṃ tu dravyāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ tasmād ayuktam etad iti//43//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4973: utapannāpavargiṇī buddhir iti pratiṣeddhavyaṃ tad eva abhyanujñāyate vidyutsampāte rūpāvyaktagrahaṇavad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4977: yad idaṃ kvacid avyaktaṃ kvacid vyaktaṃ grahaṇam ayaṃ vikalpo grahaṇahetuvikalpāt yatrānavasthito grahaṇahetuḥ tatrāvyaktaṃ grahaṇam yatra avasthitas tatra vyaktam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4979: kasmāt? arthagrhaṇaṃ hi buddhiḥ yat tadarthagrahaṇam avyaktaṃ vyaktaṃ vā buddhiḥ sā iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4980: viśeṣāgrahaṇe ca sāmānyagrahaṇamātram avyaktagrahaṇaṃ tatra viṣayāntare buddhyanatarānutpattir nimittābhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4981: yatra samānadharmayuktaś ca dharmī gṛhyate viśeṣadharmayuktaś ca tad vyaktam grahaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4982: yatra tu viśeṣe 'gṛhyamāṇe sāmānyagrahaṇamātraṃ tad avyaktaṃ grahaṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4984: tatra yad grahaṇaṃ na bhavati tad grahaṇanimittābhāvād na buddher anavasthānād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4986: yathāviṣayaṃ ca grahaṇaṃ vyaktam eva pratyarthaniyatatvāc ca buddhīnām/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4987: sāmānyaviṣayaṃ ca grahaṇaṃ svaviṣayaṃ prati vyaktaṃ viśeṣaviṣayaṃ ca grahaṇaṃ svaviṣayaṃ prati vyaktaṃ pratyarthaniyatā hi buddhayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4988: tad idam avyaktagrahaṇaṃ deśitaṃ kva viṣaye buddhyanavasthānakāritaṃ syyad iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4989: dharmiṇas tu dharmabhede buddhinānātvasya bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ tadupapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4990: dharmiṇaḥ khalv arthasya samānāś ca dharmā viśiṣṭāś ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4992: tā ubhayo yadi dharmiṇi vartante tadā vyakataṃ grahaṇaṃ dharmiṇam abhipretya/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4993: yadā tu sāmānyagrahaṇamātraṃ tadāvyaktaṃ grahaṇam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4994: evaṃ dharmiṇam abhipretya vyaktāvyakatayor grahaṇayor upapattir iti//44//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4998: na cedam avyaktaṃ grahaṇaṃ budder boddhavyasya vānavasthāyitvād upapadyate iti/ idaṃ hi ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5000: anavasthāyitve 'pi buddhes teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ vyaktaṃ pratipattavyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5002: pradīpārciṣāṃ santatyā vartamānānāṃ grahaṇānavasthānaṃ grāhyānavasthānaṃ ca pratyarthaniyatatvād buddhīnāṃ yāvanti pradīpārcīṃṣi tāvatyo buddaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5003: dṛśyate cātra vyaktaṃ pradīpārciṣām grahaṇam iti//45//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5007: cetanā śarīraguṇaḥ sati śarīre bhāvād asati ca abhāvād iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:5012: tenāyaṃ saṃśayaḥ kiṃ śarīraguṇaś cetanā śarīre gṛhyata atha dravyāntaraguṇa iti//46//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5017: na rūpādihīnaṃ śarīraṃ gṛhyate cetanāhīnan tu gṛhyate yathoṣṇatāhīnā āpaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5021: yathāvidhe dravye saṃskāraḥ tathāvidha evoparamo na,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5023: yathāvidhe śarīre cetanā gṛhyate tathāvidhe evātyantoparamaś cetanāyā gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5029: śarīrasthena kadācic cetanotpadyate kadācin neti niyame hetur nāstīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5030: dravyāntarasthena ca śarīra eva cetanotpadyate na loṣṭādiṣv ity atra na niyame hetur astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5031: ubhayasthasya nimittatve śarīrasamānajātīyadravye cetanā notpadyate śarīra eva cotpadyate iti niyame hetur nāstīti//47//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5035: yac ca manyeta sati śyāmādiguṇe dravye śyāmādyuparamo dṛṣṭaḥ evaṃ cetanoparamaḥ syād iti ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5038: śyāme rūpe nivṛtte pākajaṃ guṇāntaraṃ raktaṃ rūpam utpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5045: yāvatsu dravyeṣu pūrvaguṇapratidvandvisiddhis tāvatsu pākajotpattir dṛśyate pūrvaguṇaiḥ saha pākajānām avasthānasyāgrahaṇāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5046: na ca śarīre cetanāpratidvandvisiddhau sahānavasthāyi guṇāntaraṃ gṛhyate yenānumīyeta tena cetanāyā virodhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5047: tasmād apratiṣiddhā cetanā yāvac charīraṃ varteta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5055: śarīraṃ śarīrāvayavāś ca sarve cetanotpattyā vyāptā iti na kvacid anutpattiś cetanāyāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5056: śarīravac charīrāvayavāś cetanā iti prāptaṃ cetanabahutvam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5057: tatra yathā pratiśarīraṃ cetanabahutve sukhaduḥkhajñānānāṃ vyavasthā liṅgam evam ekaśarīre 'pi syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5062: yad uktaṃ na kvacic charīrāvayave cetanāyā anutpattir iti sā ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5064: keśeṣu nakhādiṣu cānutpattiś cetanāyā iti anupapannaṃ śarīravyāpitvam iti//51//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5087: yathā itaretaravidharmāṇo rūpādayo na śarīraguṇatvaṃ jahaty evaṃ rūpādivaidharmyāc cetanā śarīraguṇatvaṃ na hāsyatīti//54//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5093: yathetaretaravidharmāṇo rūpādayo na dvaividhyam ativartante tathā rūpādivaidharmyāc cetanā na dvaividhyam ativarteta yadi śarīraguṇaḥ syād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5096: bhūtendriyamanasāṃ jñānapratiṣedhāt siddhe saty ārambho viśeṣajñāpanārthaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5103: tat kiṃ pratiśarīram ekam anekam iti vicāre ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5105: asti khalu vai jñānāyaugapadyam ekaikasyendriyasya yathāviṣayam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5108: yat tu khalv idam indriyāntarāṇāṃ viṣayāntareṣu jñānāyaugapadyam iti tal liṅgam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5109: kasmāt? sambhavati khalu vai bahuṣu manaḥsv indriyamanaḥsaṃyogayaugapadyam iti jñānayaugapadyaṃ syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5116: ayaṃ khalv adhyāpako 'dhīte vrajati kamaṇḍaluṃ dhārayati panthānaṃ paśyati śṛṇoty āraṇyajān śabdān bibhyad vyālaliṅgāni bubhutsate smarati ca gantavyaṃ sthānīyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5117: kramasyāgrahaṇād yugapad etāḥ kriyā iti prāptaṃ manaso bahutvam iti//57//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5121: āśusañcārād alātasya bhramato vidyamānaḥ kramo na gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5124: tathā buddhīnāṃ kriyāṇāṃ cāśuvṛttitvād vidyamānaḥ kramo na gṛhyate kramasyāgrahaṇād yugapat kriyā bhavanntīty abhimāno bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5126: atha yugapadbhāvād eva yugapadanekakriyopalabdhir iti nātra viśeṣapratipatteḥ kāraṇam ucyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5127: uktam indriyāntarāṇāṃ viṣayāntareṣu paryāyeṇa buddhayo bhavantīti tac cāpratyākhyeyam ātmapratyakṣatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5128: athāpi dṛṣṭaśrutān arthān cintayataḥ krameṇa buddhayo vartante na yugapad anenānumātavyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5130: katham? vākyastheṣu khalu varṇeṣūccaratsu prativarṇaṃ tāvac chravaṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5131: śrutaṃ varṇam ekam anekaṃ vā padabhāvena sa pratisandhatte,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5135: sambaddhāṃś ca padārthān gṛhītvā vākyārthaṃ pratipadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5136: na cāsāṃ krameṇa vartamānānāṃ buddhīnām āśuvṛttitvāt kramo gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5138: na cāsti muktasaṃśayā yugapad utpattir buddhīnāṃ yayā manasāṃ bahutvam ekaśarīre 'numīyeta iti//58//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5143: aṇu mana ekaṃ ceti dharmasamuccayo jñānāyaugapadyāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5144: mahattve manasaḥ sarvendriyasaṃyogād yugapad viṣayagrahaṇaṃ syād iti//59//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5147: manasaḥ khalu bhoḥ sendriyasya śarīre vṛttilābho nānyatra śarīrāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5148: jñātuś ca puruṣasya śarīrāyatanā buddhyādayo viṣayopabhogo jihāsitahānam īpsitāvāptiś ca sarve ca śarīrāśrayā vyavahārāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5149: tatra khalu vipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ --- kim ayaṃ puruṣakarmanimittaḥ śarīrasarga āhosvid bhūtamātrād akarmanimitta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5153: pūrvaśarīre yā pravṛttir vāgbuddhiśarīrārambhalakṣaṇā tat pūrvakṛtaṃ karmoktam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5159: yad adhiṣṭhāno 'yam ātmā 'yam aham iti manyamāno yatrābhiyukto yatropabhogatṛṣṇayā viṣayānupalabhamāno dharmādharmau saṃskaroti tad asya śarīram,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5160: tena saṃskāreṇa dharmādharmalakṣaṇena bhūtasahite patite 'smin śarīra uttaraṃ niṣpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5162: puruṣasya ca pūrvaśarīravat pravṛttir iti karmāpekṣebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ śarīrasarge saty etad upapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5163: % pravṛttir iti karmāpekṣebhyo ... upapadyata iti/] p.901
GSP29nysvbh1u:5164: dṛṣṭā ca puruṣaguṇena prayatnena prayuktebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ puruṣārthkriyāsamarthānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ rathaprabhṛtīnām utpattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5165: tathānumātavyaṃ śarīram api puruṣārthakriyāsamartham utpadyamānaṃ puruṣasya guṇāntarāpekṣebhyo bhūtebhya utpadyata iti//60//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5171_1: puruṣārthakāritvād upādīyante tathā karmanirapekṣebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ śarīram utpannaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5175_1: apy akarmanimittaḥ sargaḥ sādhyaḥ sādhyasamatvād asādhanam iti ``bhūtebhyo mūrtyupādānavad''
GSP29nysvbh1u:5181: kasmāt? nirbījā imā mūrtaya utpadyante bījapūrvikā tu śarīrotpattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5183: tatra sattvasya garbhavāsānubhavanīyaṃ karma pitroś ca putraphalānubhavanīye karmaṇī mātur garbhāśraye śarīrotpattiṃ bhūtebhyaḥ prayojayantīty upapannaṃ bījānuvidhānam iti//63//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5189: bhuktaṃ pītam āhāraḥ tasya paktinirvṛttaṃ rasadravyaṃ mātṛśarīre copacīyate bīje garbhāśayasthe bījasamānapākam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5190: mātrayā copacayo bīje yāvad vyūhasamarthaḥ sañcaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5191: sañcitaṃ ca kalalārbudamāṃsapeśīkaṇḍarāśiraḥpāṇyādinā ca vyūhenendriyādhiṣṭhānabhedena vyuhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5192: vyūhe ca garbhanāḍyāvatāritaṃ rasadravyam upacīyate yāvat prasavasamartham iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5193: na cāyam annapānasya sthālyādigatasya kalpata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5194: etasmāt kāraṇāt karmanimittatvaṃ śarīrasya vijñāyata iti//64//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5199: na sarvo dampatyoḥ saṃyogo garbhādhānahetur dṛśyate tatrāsati karmaṇi na bhavati sati ca bhavatīty anupapanno niyamābhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5200: karmanirapekṣeṣu bhūteṣu śarīrotpattihetuṣu niyamaḥ syāt na hy atra kāraṇābhāva iti//65//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5206_0: yathā khalv idaṃ śarīraṃ dhātuprāṇasaṃvāhinīnāṃ nāḍīnāṃ śukrāntānāṃ dhātūnāṃ ca snāyutvagasthiśirāpeśīkalalakaṇḍarāṇāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5206_1: ca śirobāhūdarāṇāṃ sakthnāṃ ca koṣṭhagānāṃ vātapittakaphānāṃ ca mukhahṛdayāmāśayapakvāśayādhaḥsrotasāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5206_2: ca paramaduḥkhasampādanīyena sanniveśena vyūhanam aśakyaṃ pṛthivyādibhiḥ karmanirapekṣair
GSP29nysvbh1u:5206_3: utpādayitum iti karmanimittā śarīrotpattir iti vijñāyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:5207_0: evaṃ ca pratyātmaniyatasya nimittasyābhāvān niratiśayair ātmabhiḥ sambandhāt sarvātmanāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5207_1: ca samānaiḥ pṛthivyādibhir utpāditaṃ śarīraṃ pṛthivyādigatasya ca niyamahetor abhāvāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:5208: yat tu pratyātmaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate tatra śarīrotpattinimittaṃ karma vyavashtāhetur iti vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5209: paripacyamāno hi pratyātmaniyataḥ karmāśayo yasminn ātmani vartate tasyaivopabhogāyatanaṃ śarīram utpādya vyavasthāpayati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5210: tad evaṃ ``śarīrotpattinimittavat saṃyoganimittaṃ karma'' iti vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5211: pratyātmavyavasthānaṃ tu śarīrasyātmanā saṃyogaṃ pracakṣmaha iti//66//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5216: yo .yam akarmanimitte śarīrasarge saty aniyama ity ucyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5217: ayaṃ ``śarīrotpattinimittavat saṃyogotpattinimittaṃ karma'' iti anena pratyuktaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5220: yathaikasyātmanaḥ śarīraṃ tathā sarveṣām iti niyamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5221: anyasyānyathānyasyānyathety aniyamo bhedo vyāvṛttir viśeṣa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5222: % -ty aniyamo bhedo vyāvṛttir viśeṣa iti/] p.909
GSP29nysvbh1u:5223: dṛṣṭā ca janmavyāvṛttir uccābhijano nikṛṣṭābhijana iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5233: asati karmabhede pratyātmaniyate niratiśayatvād ātmanāṃ samānatvāc ca pṛthivyādīnāṃ pṛthivyādigatasya niyamahetor ahbāvāt sarvaṃ sarvātmanāṃ prasajyeta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5237: karmanimitte śarīrasarge tena śarīreṇātmano viyoga upapannaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5239_0: upapadyate khalu karmakṣayaḥ samyagdarśanāt prakṣīṇe mohe vītarāgaḥ punarbhavahetukarma
GSP29nysvbh1u:5239_1: kāyavāṅmanobhir na karotīty uttarasyānupacayaḥ pūrvopacitasya vipākapratisaṃvedanāt prakṣayaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:5240: evaṃ prasavahetor abhāvāt patire 'smin śarīre punaḥ śarīrāntarānupapatter apratisandhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5241: akarmanimitte tu śarīrasarge bhūtakṣayānupapattes tadviyogānupapattir iti//67//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5245: NyS_3,2.68: tad adṛṣṭakāritam iti cet punas tatprasaṅgo 'pavarge //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5246: adarśanaṃ khalv adṛṣṭam ity ucyata adṛṣṭakāritā bhūtebhyaḥ śarīrotpattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5247: na jātv anutpanne śarīre draṣṭā nirāyatano dṛśyaṃ paśyati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5248: tac cāsya dṛśyaṃ dvividhaṃ viṣayaś ca nānātvaṃ cāvyaktātmanaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5250: tasminn avasite caritārthāni bhūtāni na śarīram utpādayantīty upapannaḥ śarīraviyoga ity evaṃ cen manyase,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5251: ``punas tat prasaṅgo 'pavarge'' --- punaḥ śarīrotpattiḥ prasajyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5252_0: yā cānutpanne śarīre darśanānutpattir adarśanābhimatā yā cāpavarge śarīranivṛttau
GSP29nysvbh1u:5252_1: darśanānutpattir adarśanabhūtā naitayor adarśanayoḥ kvacid viśeṣa ity adarśanasyānivṛtter
GSP29nysvbh1u:5254: caritārthatā viśeṣa iti cet na karaṇākaraṇayor ārambhadarśanāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5255: caritārthāni bhūtāni darśanāvasānān na śarīrāntaram ārabhanta ity ayaṃ viśeṣa evaṃ ced ucyate; na,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5256_1: punaḥ punaḥ śarīrārambho dṛśyate prakṛtipuruṣayor nānātvadarśanasyākaraṇān nirarthakaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5257: tasmād akarmanimittāyāṃ bhūtasṛṣṭau na darśanārthā śarīrotpattir yuktā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5258: yuktā tu karmanimitte sarge darśanārthā śarīrotpattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5262_0: kasyacid darśanam adṛṣṭaṃ nāma paramāṇūnāṃ guṇaviśeṣaḥ kriyāhetus tena preritāḥ paramāṇavaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5262_1: sammūrcchitāḥ śarīram utpādayantīti tan manaḥ samāviśati svaguṇenādṛṣṭena preritaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5263: etasmin vai darśane guṇānucchedāt punas tatprasaṅgo 'pavarge/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5269: manoguṇenādṛṣṭena samāveśite manasi saṃyogavyucchedo na syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5270: tac ca kiṃkṛtaṃ śarīrād apasarpaṇaṃ manasa iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5271: karmāśayakṣaye tu karmāśayāntarād vipacyamānād apasarpaṇopapattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5272: adṛṣṭād evāpasarpaṇam iti cet --- yo 'dṛṣṭaḥ śarīropasarpaṇahetuḥ sa evāpasarpaṇahetur apīti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5273: na, ekasya jīvanaprāyaṇahetutvānupapatteḥ --- evaṃ ca saty ekam adṛṣṭaṃ jīvanaprāyaṇayor hetur iti prāptam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5281: bhūtamātrāt tu karmanirapekṣāc charīrotpattau kasya kṣayāc charīrapātaḥ prāyaṇam iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5287: punas tatprasaṅgo 'pavarga ity etat samādhitsur āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5289: yathāṇoḥ śyāmatā nityā agnisaṃyogena pratiṣiddhā na punar utpadyata evam adṛṣṭakāritaṃ śarīram apavarge punar notpadyata iti// 71 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5298: tasmān nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto na pratyakṣaṃ na cānumānaṃ kiṃcid ucyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5299: tad idaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyasamatvam abhidhīyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5302: akṛte sukhaduḥkhahetau karmaṇi puruṣasya sukhaṃ duḥkham abhyāgacchatīti prasajyeta/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5305: pratyakṣavirodhas tāvat --- bhinnam idaṃ sukhaduḥkhaṃ pratyātmavedanīyatvāt pratyakṣaṃ sarvaśarīriṇām/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5306: ko bhedaḥ? tīvraṃ mandaṃ ciram āśu nānāprakāram ekaprakāram ity evam ādir viśeṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5309: karmanimitte tu sukhaduḥkhayoge karmaṇāṃ tīvramandatopapatteḥ karmasañcayānāṃ cotkarṣāpakarṣabhāvāt nānāvidhaikavidhabhāvāc ca karmaṇāṃ sukhaduḥkhabhedopapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5310: so 'yaṃ hetubhedābhāvād dṛṣṭaḥ sukhaduḥkhabhedo na syād iti pratyakṣavirodhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5312: yaḥ khalu cetanāvān sādhananirvartanīyaṃ sukhaṃ buddhvā tad īpsan sādhanāvāptaye prayatate sa sukhena yujyate na viparītaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5313: yaś ca sādhananirvartanīyaṃ duḥkhaṃ buddhvā taj jihāsuḥ sādhanaparivarjanāya yatate sa ca duḥkhena tyajyate na viparītaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5314: asti cedaṃ yatnam antareṇa cetanānāṃ sukhaduḥkhavyavasthānaṃ tenāpi cetanaguṇāntaravyavasthākṛtena bhavitavyam ity anumānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5316: tad etad akarmanimitte sukhaduḥkhayoge virudhyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5317: tac ca guṇāntaram asaṃvedyatvād adṛṣṭaṃ vipākakālāniyamāc cāvyavasthitam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5319: athāgamavirodhaḥ --- bahu khalv idam ārṣam ṛṣīṇām upadeśajātam anuṣṭhānaparivarjanāśrayam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5322: tac cobhayam etasyāṃ dṛṣṭau ``nāsti karma sucaritaṃ duścaritaṃ vā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5324: seyaṃ pāpiṣṭhānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ --- akarmanimittā śarīrasṛṣṭir akarmanimittaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoga iti//72//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5327: iti śrīvātsyāyanīye nyāyabhāṣye tṛtīyādhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam// 2 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5341: pravṛttyanantarās tarhi doṣāḥ parīkṣyantām ity ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5354: te kasmān nopasaṅkhyāyante ity ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5356: teṣāṃ doṣāṇāṃ trayo rāśayas trayaḥ pakṣāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5357: rāgapakṣaḥ --- kāmo matsaraḥ spṛhā tṛṣṇā lobha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5358: dveṣapakṣaḥ --- krodha īrṣyā asūyā droho 'marṣa iti/ mohapakṣo
GSP29nysvbh1u:5369: etat pratyātmavedanīyaṃ sarvaśarīriṇām --- vijānāty ayaṃ śarīrī rāgam utpannam ``asti me 'dhyātmaṃ rāgadharma'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5370: virāgaṃ ca vijānāti ---``nāsti me 'dhyātmaṃ rāgadharma'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5372: mānerṣyāsūyāprabhṛtayas tu trairāśyam anupatitā iti nopasaṅkhyāyante//3//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5378: kasmāt? ekapratyanīkabhāvāt --- tattvajñānaṃ samyaṅmatir āryaprajñā sambodha ity ekam idaṃ pratyanīkaṃ trayāṇām iti//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5393: amūḍhasya rāgadveṣā notpadyante mūḍhasya tu yathāsaṅkalpam utpattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5396: ubhaye ca saṅkalpā na mithyāpratipattilakṣaṇatvān mohād anye,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5398: tattvajñānāc ca mohanivṛttau rāgadveṣānutpattir ity ekapratyanīkabhāvopapattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5399: evaṃ ca kṛtvā tattvajñānād ``duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānānām uttarottarāpāye tadanantarābhāvād apavarga'' iti vyākhyātam iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5405: anyad dhi nimittam anyac ca naimittikam iti doṣanimittatvād adoṣo moha iti//7//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5409: pravarttanālakṣaṇā doṣā ity anena doṣalakṣaṇenāvarudhyate doṣeṣu moha iti//8//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5414: dravyāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ vānekavidhavikalpo nimittanaimittikabhāve tulyajātīyānāṃ dṛṣṭa iti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5418: tasyāsiddhir ātmano nityatvāt --- na khalu nityaṃ kiṃcij jāyate mriyate vā iti janmamaraṇayor nityatvād ātmano 'nupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5419: ubhayaṃ ca pretyabhāva iti tatrāyaṃ siddhānuvādaḥ ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5421: nityo 'yam ātmā praiti pūrvaśarīraṃ jahāti mriyate iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5425: tac caitad ubhayaṃ ``punar utpattiḥ pretyabhāvaḥ'' ity atroktaṃ pūrvaśarīraṃ hitvā śarīrāntaropādānaṃ pretyabhāvaḥ iti tac caitannityatve sambhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5426: yasya tu sattvotpādaḥ sattvanirodhaḥ pretyabhāvaḥ tasya kṛtahānam akṛtābhyāgamaś ca doṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5433: kena prakāreṇa kiṃdharmakāt kāraṇād vyaktaṃ śarīrādy utpadyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5434: vyaktād bhūtasamākhyātāt pṛthivyāditaḥ paramasūkṣmān nityād vyaktaṃ śarīrendriyaviṣayopakaraṇādhāraṃ prajñātaṃ dravyam utpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5435: vyaktaṃ ca khalv indriyagrāhyaṃ tatsāmānyāt kāraṇam api vyaktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5437: rūpādiguṇayogaḥ rūpādiguṇayuktebhyaḥ pṛthivyādibhyo nityebhyo rūpādiguṇayuktaṃ śarīrādy utpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5439: pratyakṣaprāmāṇyāt --- dṛṣṭo hi rūpādiguṇayuktebhyo mṛtprabhṛtibhyas tathābhūtasya dravyasyotpādaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5446: idam api pratyakṣam --- na khalu vyaktād ghaṭād vyakto ghaṭa utpadyamāno dṛśyate iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5447: vyaktād vyaktasyānutpattidarśanān na vyaktaṃ kāraṇam iti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5452: na brūmaḥ sarvaṃ sarvasya kāraṇam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5453: kin tu yad utpadyate vyaktaṃ dravyaṃ tat tathābhūtād evotpadyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5454: vyaktaṃ ca tanmṛddravyaṃ kapālasaṃjñakaṃ yato ghaṭa utpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5455: na caitannihnuvānaḥ kvacid abhyanujñāṃ labdhum arhatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5462: asataḥ sad utpadyate ity ayaṃ pakṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5465: na ced vījopamardo 'ṅkurakāraṇam anupamarde 'pi bījasyāṅkurotpattiḥ syād iti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5470: upamṛdya prādurbhāvād ity ayuktaḥ prayogo vyāghātāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5471: yad upamṛdnāti na tad upamṛdya prādurbhavitum arhati vidyamānatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5472: yac ca prādurbhavati na tenāprādurbhūtenāvidyamānenopamarda iti//15//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5484: ajātāḥ putrāḥ pitaraṃ tāpayantīti bahulaṃ bhāktāḥ prayogā dṛśyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5488: prādurbhaviṣyann aṅkura upamṛdnātīti bhāktaṃ kartṛtvam iti//16//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5493: na vinaṣṭād bījād aṅkura utpadyate iti tasmān nābhāvād bhāvotpattir iti//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5499: sa khalv abhāvād bhāvotpatter hetur nirdiśyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:5501: vyāhatavyūhānām avayavānāṃ pūrvavyūhanivṛttau vyūhāntarād dravyaniṣpattir nābhāvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5502: bījāvayavāḥ kutaścin nimittāt prādurbhūtakriyāḥ pūrvavyūhaṃ jahati vyūhāntaraṃ cāpadyante vyūhāntarād aṅkura utpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5504: na cānivṛtte pūrvavyūhe bījāvayavānāṃ śakyaṃ vyūhāntareṇa bhavitum ity upamardaprādurbhāvayoḥ paurvāparyaniyamaḥ kramaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5507: na cānyad bījāvayavebhyo 'ṅkurotpattikāraṇam ity upapadyte bījopādānaniyama iti//18//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5512: puruṣo 'yaṃ samīhamāno nāvaśyaṃ samīhāphalaṃ prāpnoti tenānumīyate parādhīnaṃ puruṣasya karmaphalārādhanam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5519: īśvarādhīnā cet phalaniṣpattiḥ syād api tarhi puruṣasya samīhām antareṇa phalaṃ niṣpadyeteti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5526: yadā na sampādayati tadā puruṣakarmāphalaṃ bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5527: tasmād īśvarakāritatvāt ahetuḥ puruṣakarmābhāve phalāniṣpatter iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5530: adharmamithyājñānapramādahānyā dharmajñānasamādhisampadā ca viśiṣṭam ātmāntaram īśvaraḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5533: saṅkalpānuvidhāyī cāsya dharmaḥ pratyātmavṛttīn dharmādharmasañcayān pṛthivyādīni ca bhūtāni pravartayati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5534: evaṃ ca svakṛtābhyāgamasyālopena nirmāṇaprākāmyam īśvarasya svakṛtakarmaphalaṃ veditavyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5535: āptakalpaś cāyam --- yathā pitāpatyānāṃ tathā pitṛbhūta īśvaro bhūtānām/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5537: na tāvad asya buddhiṃ vinā kaścid dharmo liṅgabhūtaḥ śakya upapādayitum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5538: āgamāc ca draṣṭā boddhā sarvajñātā īśvara iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5539: buddhyādibhiś cātmaliṅgair nirupākhyam īśvaraṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamaviṣayātītaṃ kaḥ śakta upapādayitum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5540: % liṅgair nirupākhyam īśvaraṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamaviṣayātītaṃ kaḥ śakta upapādayitum/] p.945
GSP29nysvbh1u:5541: svakṛtābhyāgamalopena ca pravartamānasyāsya yad uktaṃ pratiṣedhajātam akarmanimitte śarīrasarge tat sarvaṃ prasajyate iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5553: nirnimittaṃ ca upādānavac ca dṛṣṭaṃ tathā śarīrādisargo .pīti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5557: animittato bhāvotpattir ity ucyate yataś cotpadyate tannimittam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5563: anyad dhi nimittam anyac ca nimittapratyākhyānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5566: yathānudakaḥ kamaṇḍalur iti nodakapratiṣedha udakaṃ bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5567: sa khalv ayaṃ vādo 'karmanimittaḥ śarīrādisarga ity etasmān na bhidyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5576: utpattidharmakam anutpannaṃ nāsti vināśadharmakaṃ ca vinaṣṭaṃ nāsti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5588: athānityā tasyām avidyamānāyāṃ sarvaṃ nityam iti//26//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5594: katham? yathā agnir dāhyaṃ vināśyānuvinaśyati evaṃ sarvasyānityatā sarvaṃ vināśyānuvinaśyatīti//27//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5604: na ca paramasūkṣmāṇāṃ bhūtānām ākāśakāladigātmamanasāṃ tadguṇānāṃ ca keṣāñcit sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ cotpattivināśadharmakatvaṃ pramāṇata upalabhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5611: bhūtamātram idaṃ sarvaṃ tāni ca nityāni bhūtocchedānupapatter iti//29//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5623: bhūtalakṣaṇāvarodhād bhūtamātram idam ity ukto 'yaṃ pratiṣedha iti//31//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5632: upalabdhisāmarthyāt kāraṇena samānaguṇaṃ kāryam utpadyate ity anumīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5640: pañcabhūtanityatvāt tallakṣaṇāvarodhāc cety anena śabdakarmabuddhisukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnāś ca na vyāptāḥ tasmād anekāntaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5641: svapnaviṣayābhimānavan mithyopalabdhir iti cet bhūtopalabdhau tulyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5642: yathā svapne viṣayābhimāna evam utpattikāraṇābhimāna iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5643: evaṃ caitad bhūtopalabdhau tulyaṃ pṛthivyādyupalabdhir api svapnaviṣayābhimānavat prasajyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5645: pṛthivyādyabhāve sarvavyavahāravilopa iti cet tad itaratra samānam --- utpattivināśakāraṇopalabdhiviṣayasyāpy abhāve sarvavyavahāravilopa iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5646: so 'yaṃ nityānām atīndriyatvād aviṣayatvāc cotpattivināśayoḥ svapnaviṣayābhimānavad ity ahetur iti//32//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5649: avasthitasyopādānasya dharmamātraṃ nivartate dharmamātram upajāyate sa khalūtpattivināśayor viṣayaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5651: yac copajāyate tat prāg apy upajananād asti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5652: yac ca nivartate tan nivṛttam apy astīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5655: ayam upajanaḥ iyaṃ nivṛttir iti vyavasthā nopapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5657: ayaṃ dharma upajāto 'yaṃ nivṛtta iti sadbhāvāviśeṣād avyavasthā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5658: idānīm upajananivṛttī nedānīm iti kālavyavasthā nopapadyate sarvadā vidyamānatvāt asya dharmasyopajananivṛttī nāsyeti vyavasthānupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5663: avidyamānasyātmalābha upajano vidyamānasyātmahānaṃ nivṛttir ity etasmin sati naite doṣāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5664: tasmād yad uktaṃ prāg apy upajanād asti nivṛttaṃ cāsti tad ayuktam iti//33//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5669: sarvaṃ nānā na kaścid eko bhāvo vidyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5675: kumbha iti saṃjñāśabdo gandharasarūpasparśasamūhe budhnapārśvagrīvādisamūhe ca varttate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5681: gandhādibhiś ca guṇair budhnādibhiś cāvayavaiḥ sambaddha eko bhāvo niṣpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5689: na kaścid eko bhāva ity ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5691: yad iha lakṣaṇaṃ bhāvasya saṃjñāśabdabhūtaṃ tad ekasmin vyavasthitam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5692: yaṃ kumbham adrākṣaṃ taṃ spṛśāmi yam evāsprākṣaṃ taṃ paśyāmīti nāṇusamūho gṛhyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5693: aṇusamūhe cāgṛhyamāṇe yad gṛhyate tad ekam eveti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5694: athāpy etad anūktam nāsty eko bhāvo yasmāt samudāyaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5695: ekānupapatter nāsty eva samūhaḥ --- nāsty eko bhāvo yasmāt samūhe bhāvaśabdaprayogaḥ;
GSP29nysvbh1u:5698: samūho nopapadyate ekasamuccayo hi samūha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5699: vyāhatatvād anupapannaṃ --- nāsty eko bhāva iti yasya pratiṣedhaḥ pratijñāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5700: samūhe bhāvaśabdaprayogād iti hetuṃ bruvatā sa evābhyanujñāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5702: samūhe bhāvaśabdaprayogād iti ca samūham āśritya pratyekaṃ samūhipratiṣedho nāsty eko bhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5711: ``asan gaur aśvātmanā'' anaśvo gauḥ ``asann aśvo gavātmanā agaur aśvaḥ'' ity asatpratyayasya pratiṣedhasya ca bhāvaśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt sarvam abhāva iti//37//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5715: pratijñāvākye padayoḥ pratijñāhetvoś ca vyāghātād ayuktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5720: samupākhyāyamānaṃ kathaṃ nirupākhyam abhāvaḥ syād iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5721: na jātv abhāvo nirupākhyo 'nekatayāśeṣatayā śakyaḥ pratijñātum iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5722: sarvam etad abhāva iti cet --- yad idaṃ sarvam iti manyase tadabhāva iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5724: anekam aśeṣaṃ ceti nābhāve pratyayena śakyaṃ bhavitum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5727: pratijñāhetvoś ca vyāghātaḥ --- sarvam abhāva iti bhāvapratiṣedhaḥ pratijñā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5729: bhāveṣv itaretarābhāvam anujñāyāśritya ca itaretarābhāvasiddhyā sarvam abhāva ity ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5730: yadi sarvam abhāvo bhāveṣv itaretarābhāvasiddher iti nopapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5746: so 'yam abhāvasya nirupākhyatvāt sampratyāyako 'rthabhedo na syāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5749: atha vā na svabhāvasiddher bhāvānām iti svarūpasiddher iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5750: gaur iti prayujyamāne śabde jātiviśiṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5752: yadi ca sarvam abhāvaḥ gaur ity abhāvaḥ pratīyeta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5754: yasmāt tu gośabdaprayoge dravyaviśeṣaḥ pratīyate nābhāvas tasmād ayuktam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5756: asan gaur aśvātmaneti gavātmanā kasmān nocyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5758: anaśvo 'śva iti vā gaur agaur iti vā kasmān nocyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5759: avacanāt svena rūpeṇa vidyamānatā dravyasyeti vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5761: avyatirekapratiṣedhe ca bhāvena asatpratyayasāmānādhikaraṇyam bhāve saṃyogādisambandho vyatirekaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5762: atra avyatirekaḥ abhedākhyasambandhaḥ tatpratiṣedhe sadā ca asatpratyayasāmānādhikaraṇyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5764: asan gaur aśvātmanā anaśvo gaur iti ca gavāśvayor avyatirekaḥ pratiṣidhyate gavāśvayor ekatvaṃ nāstīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5765: tasmin pratiṣidhyamāne bhāvena gavā sāmānādhikaraṇyam asatpratyayasya asan gaur aśvātmaneti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5766: yathā na santi kuṇḍe badarāṇīti kuṇḍe badarasaṃyoge pratiṣidhyamāne sadbhir asatpratyayasya sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti//38//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5780: kim idānīm apekṣya hrasvam iti gṛhyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5783: evam itaretarāśrayayor ekābhāve anyatarābhāvād ubhayābhāva iti apekṣāvyavasthānupapannā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5784: % retarāśrayayor ekābhāve anyatarābhāvād ubhayābhāva iti apekṣāvyavasthānupapannā/] p.984
GSP29nysvbh1u:5785: svabhāvasiddhāv asatyāṃ samayoḥ parimaṇḍalayor vā dravyayor āpekṣike dīrghatvahrasvatve kasmān na bhavataḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5787: yāvatī dravye apekṣamāṇe tāvatī evānapekṣamāṇe nānyataratra bhedaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5788: āpekṣikatve tu saty anyataratra viśeṣopajanaḥ syād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5792: dve dravye paśyann ekatra vidyamānam atiśayaṃ gṛhṇāti tad dīrgham iti vyavasyati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5793: yac ca hīnaṃ gṛhṇāti tad dhrasvam iti vyavasyatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5802: sarvaṃ tredhā jñātā jñānaṃ jñeyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5803: sarvaṃ caturddhā pramātā pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ pramitir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5812: evam apy ekānto na sidhyati sādhanābhāvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5813: na hi hetum antareṇa kasyacit siddhir iti//41//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5826: kasmāt? sarvam ekam ity anapavargeṇa pratijñāya kasyacid ekatvam ucyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5830: te khalv ime saṅkhyaikāntā yadi viśeṣakāritasyārthabhedavistārasya pratyākhyānena varttante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5833: samānadharmakārito 'rthasaṃgraho viśeṣakāritaś cārthabheda iti evam ekāntatvaṃ jahatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5834: te khalv ete tattvajñānapravivekārtham ekāntāḥ parīkṣitā iti//43//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5839: NyS_4,1.44: sadyaḥ kālāntare ca phalaniṣpatteḥ saṃśayaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5844: asti ceyaṃ kriyā agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma iti etasyāḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5849: tac ca bhinne 'smin dehabhedād utpadyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5855: dhvastāyāṃ pravṛttau pravṛtteḥ phalaṃ na kāraṇam antareṇotpattum arhati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5856: na khalu vai vinaṣṭāt kāraṇāt kiñcid utpadyate iti//45//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5859: NyS_4,1.46: prāṅ niṣpatter vṛkṣaphalavat tat syāt //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5860: yathā phalārthinā vṛkṣamūle sekādi parikarma kriyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5861: tasmiṃś ca pradhvaste pṛthivīdhātur abdhātunā saṃgṛhīta āntareṇa tejasā pacyamāno rasadravyaṃ nirvartayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5862: sa dravyabhūto raso vṛkṣānugataḥ pākaviśiṣṭo vyūhaviśeṣeṇa sanniviśamānaḥ parṇādi phalaṃ nirvartayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5866: sa jāto nimittāntarānugṛhītaḥ kālāntare phalaṃ niṣpādayatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5872: NyS_4,1.47: nāsan na san na sadasat sadasator vaidharmyāt //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5875: kasyacid utpattaye kiñcid upādeyaṃ na sarvaṃ sarvasyety asadbhāve niyamo nopapadyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5876: na sat, prāṅ utpatter vidyamānasyotpattir anupapanneti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5881: etayor vyāghāto vaidharmyaṃ vyāghātād avyatirekānupapattir iti//47//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5884: prāg utpatter utpattidharmakam asad ity addhā/ kasmāat?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5887: yat punaruktaṃ prāg utpatteḥ kāryaṃ nāsad upādānaniyamād iti---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5891: idam asyotpattaye samarthaṃ na sarvam iti prāg utpatter niyatakāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ buddhyā
GSP29nysvbh1u:5894: tasmād upādānaniyamasyopapattiḥ sati tu kārye prāg utpatter utpattir eva nāstīti//49//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5901: phalaṃ cāmutra ity āśrayavyatirekād ahetur iti//50//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5913: ``grāmakāmo yajeta'' ``putrakāmo yajete''ti tatra yad uktaṃ prītiḥ phalam ity etad ayuktam iti//52//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5918: putrādisambandhāt phalaṃ prītilakṣaṇam utpadyate iti putrādiṣu phalavadupacāraḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5925: tat kim idaṃ pratyātmavedanīyasya sarvajantupratyakṣasya sukhasya pratyākhyānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5928: katham? na vai sarvalokasākṣikaṃ sukhaṃ śakyaṃ pratyākhyātum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5929: ayaṃ tu janmamaraṇaprabandhānubhavanimittād duḥkhān nirviṇṇasya duḥkhaṃ jihāsato duḥkhasaṃjñābhāvanopadeśo duḥkhahānārtha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5932: sarve khalu sattvanikāyāḥ sarvāṇy utpattisthānāni sarvaḥ punarbhavo bādhanānuṣakto duḥkhasāhacaryād bādhanālakṣaṇaṃ duḥkham ity uktam ṛṣibhiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5933: duḥkhasaṃjñābhāvanam upadiśyate atra ca hetur upādīyate---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5935: janma jāyate iti śarīrendriyabuddhayaḥ śarīrādīnāṃ ca saṃsthānaviśiṣṭānāṃ prādurbhāva utpattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5942: evaṃ sarvam utpattisthānaṃ vividhabādhanānuṣaktaṃ paśyataḥ sukhe tatsādhaneṣu ca śarīrendriyabuddhiṣu duḥkhasaṃjñā vyavatiṣṭhate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5947: yathā viṣayogāt payo viṣam iti budhyamāno nopādatte,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5951: duḥkhoddeśas tu na sukhasya pratyākhyānam, kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5953: na khalv ayaṃ duḥkhoddeśaḥ sukhasya pratyākhyānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5955: niṣpadyate khalu bādhanāntarāleṣu sukhaṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ śarīriṇām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5962: sukhasya, duḥkhoddeśeneti prakaraṇāt paryeṣaṇaṃ prārthanā viṣayārjanatṛṣṇā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5963: paryeṣaṇasya doṣo yad ayaṃ vedayamānaḥ prārthayate tac cāsya prārthitaṃ na sampadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5966: bahupratyanīkaṃ vā sampadyate iti etasmāt paryeṣaṇadoṣān nānāvidho mānasaḥ santāpo bhavati evaṃ vedayataḥ paryeṣaṇadoṣād bādhanāyā anivṛttiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5968: anena kāraṇena duḥkhaṃ janma na tu sukhasyābhāvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5972: athainam aparaḥ kāmaḥ kṣipram eva prabādhate//''
GSP29nysvbh1u:5973: ``api ced udanemi samantād bhūmim imāṃ labhate sagavāśvām/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5974: na sa tena dhanena dhanaiṣī tṛpyati kin nu sukhaṃ dhanakāme//'' iti//56//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5980: ayaṃ khalu sukhasaṃvedane vyavasthitaḥ sukhaṃ paramapuruṣārthaṃ manyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5981: na sukhād anyan niḥśreyasam asti sukhe prāpte caritārthaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyo bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5982: mithyāsaṅkalpāt sukhe tatsādhaneṣu ca viṣayeṣu saṃrajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5987: na duḥkham anāsādya śakyaṃ sukham avāptum,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5988: tādarthyāt sukham evedam iti sukhasaṃjñopahataprajño jāyasva ceti saṃdhāvatīti saṃsāraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5991: tad asyāḥ sukhasaṃjñāyāḥ pratipakṣo duḥkhasaṃjñābhāvanam upadiśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5996: yady evaṃ kasmād duḥkhaṃ janmeti nocyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5997: so 'yam evaṃ vācye yad evam āha duḥkham eva janmeti tena sukhābhāvaṃ jñāpayatīti janma vinigrahārthīyo vai khalv ayam evaśabdaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6000: evaṃ sukham apīti etad anenaiva nirvarttyate na tu duḥkham eva janmeti//57//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6007: ṛṇānubandhān nāsty apavargaḥ---``jāyamāno ha vai brāhmaṇas tribhir ṛṇair ṛṇavān jāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6008: brahmacaryeṇa ṛṣibhyo yajñena devebhyaḥ prajayā pitṛbhya'' iti ṛṇāni,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6010: karmasambandhavacanāt ``jarāmaryaṃ vā etat satraṃ yad agnihotraṃ darśapūrṇam āsau ca'' iti ``jarayā ha vā eṣa tasmāt satrād vimucyate mṛtyunā ha vā'' iti *ṛṇānubandhād (corr.;
GSP29nysvbh1u:6014: kleśānubandhān nāsty apavargaḥ kleśānubaddha evāyaṃ mriyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6015: kleśānubaddhaś ca jāyate nāsya kleśānubandhavicchedo gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6016: pravṛttyanubandhān nāsty apavargaḥ---janmaprabhṛty ayaṃ yāvat prāyaṇaṃ vāgbuddhiśarīrārambheṇāvimukto gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6017: tatra yad uktaṃ ``duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānānām uttarottarāpāye tadanantarābhāvād apavarga'' iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6022: yat tāvad ṛṇānubandhād iti ṛṇair iva ṛṇair iti---
GSP29nysvbh1u:6026: dvitīyaś ca pratideyaṃ gṛhṇāti tatrāsya dṛṣṭatvāt pradhānam ṛṇaśabdaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6029: guṇaśabdenāyam anuvāda ṛṇair iva ṛṇair iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6030: % nupapatteḥ guṇaśabdenāyam anuvāda ṛṇair iva ṛṇair iti/] p.1015
GSP29nysvbh1u:6031: prayuktopamaṃ caitad yathāgnir māṇavaka iti---anyatra dṛṣṭaś cāyam ṛṇaśabda iha prayujyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6036: karmānuṣṭhāne ca ṛṇīva ṛṇadānāt praśasyate sa evopamārtha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6039: jāyamāno ha vai brāhmaṇa iti ca guṇaśabdo gṛhasthaḥ sampadyamāno jāyamāna iti;
GSP29nysvbh1u:6040: yadāyaṃ gṛhastho jāyate tadā karmabhir adhikriyate mātṛto jāyamānasyānadhikārāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6041: yadā tu mātṛto jāyate kumāro na tadā karmabhir adhikriyate arthinaḥ śaktasya cādhikārāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6042: arthinaḥ karmabhir adhikāraḥ karmavidhau kāmasaṃyogas mṛteḥ ``agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma'' ity evamādi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6045: (4*) śaktaḥ khalu vihite karmaṇi pravarttate netara iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6047: mātṛto jāyamāne kumāre ubhayam arthitā śaktiś ca na bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6049: na bhidyate ca laukikād vākyād vaidikaṃ vākyaṃ prekṣāpūrvakāripuruṣapraṇītatvena/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6052: kumārakam evaṃ brūyād adhīṣva yajasva brahmacaryaṃ careti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6053: kuta evam ṛṣir upapannānavadyavādī upadeśārthena prayukta upadiśati?
GSP29nysvbh1u:6054: na khalu vai narttako 'ndheṣu pravarttate na gāyako badhireṣv iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6056: yaś copadiṣṭam arthaṃ vijānāti taṃ praty upadeśaḥ kriyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6059: yac ca mantrabrāhmaṇaṃ karma abhivadati tat patnīsambandhādinā gārhasthyaliṅgenopapannam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6063: yāvac cāsya phalenārthitvaṃ na vipariṇamate na nivartate tāvad anena karmānuṣṭheyam ity upapadyate jarāmaryavādas taṃ pratīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6064: jarayā ha vety āyuṣasü@turīyasya caturthasya pravrajyāyuktasya vacanaṃ ``jarayā ha vā eṣa etasmād vimucyate'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6065: āyuṣas turīyaṃ caturthaṃ pravrajyāyuktaṃ jarety ucyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6069: svayam aśaktasya bāhyāṃ śaktim āha---``antevāsī vā juhuyād brahmaṇā sa parikrītaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6070: kṣīrahotā vā jahuyād dhanena sa parikrīta'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6072: athāpi vihitaṃ vānūdyeta kāmād vārthaḥ parikalpyeta?
GSP29nysvbh1u:6074: ṛṇavān ivāsvatantro gṛhasthaḥ karmasu pravarttate ity upapannaṃ vākyasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:6077: phalasya hi sādhanāni prayatnaviṣayo na phalam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6081: tena yaḥ sambaddhyate so 'yaṃ jāyamāna iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6087: yadi cāśramāntaram abhaviṣyat tad api vyadhāsyata
GSP29nysvbh1u:6092: na pratiṣedho 'pi vai brāhmaṇena pratyakṣato vidhīyate --- na santy āśramāntarāṇi eka eva gṛhasthāśrama iti pratiṣedhasya pratyakṣato 'śravaṇād ayuktam etad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6094: yathā śāstrāntarāṇi sve sve 'dhikāre pratyakṣato vidhāyakāni nārthāntarābhāvād evam idaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gṛhasthaśāstraṃ sve 'dhikāre pratyakṣato vidhāyakaṃ nāśramāntarāṇām abhāvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6099: ``karmabhir mṛtyum ṛṣayo niṣeduḥ prajāvanto draviṇam icchamānāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6100: athāpare ṛṣayo manīṣiṇaḥ paraṃ karmabhyo 'mṛtatvam ānaśuḥ//''
GSP29nysvbh1u:6101: ``na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaike amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6102: pareṇa nākaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ vibhrājate yad yatayo viśanti//''
GSP29nysvbh1u:6103: ``vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6104: tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya//''
GSP29nysvbh1u:6106_0: ``trayo dharmaskandhāḥ ---yajño 'dhyayanaṃ dānam iti prathamas tapa eva dvitīyo brahmacāry
GSP29nysvbh1u:6106_1: ācāryakulavāsīti tṛtīyo 'tyantam ātmānam ācāryakule 'vasādayan sarve evaite puṇyalokā
GSP29nysvbh1u:6109: atho khalv āhuḥ kāmamaya evāyaṃ puruṣa iti sa yathākāmo bhavati tatkratur bhavati yatkratur bhavati tat karma kurute yat karma kurute tad abhisaṃpadyate/''
GSP29nysvbh1u:6110_0: iti karmabhiḥ saṃsaraṇam uktvā prakṛtam anyad upadiśanti ``iti nu kāmayamāno 'thākāmayamāno
GSP29nysvbh1u:6110_1: yo 'kāmo niṣkāma ātmakāma āptakāmo bhavati na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti ihaiva samavalīyante
GSP29nysvbh1u:6111: tatra yad uktam ṛṇānubandhād apavargābhāva ity etad ayuktam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6112: ``ye catvāraḥ pathayo devayānā'' iti ca cāturāśramyaśruter aikāśramyān upapattiḥ//59//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6115: phalārthinaś cedaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ``jarāmaryaṃ vā etat satraṃ yad agnihotram. darśapūrṇam āsau ceti'' katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:6118: ``prājāpatyām iṣṭaṃ nirūpya tasyāṃ sarvavedasaṃ hutvā ātmany agnīn samāropya brāhmaṇaḥ pravrajed'' iti *śrūyate (corr.; śrūyate, ed.)/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6119: tena vijānīmaḥ prajāvittalokaiṣaṇābhyo vyutthitasya nivṛtte phalārthitve samāropaṇaṃ vidhīyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6120: evaṃ ca brāhmaṇāni ``so 'nyad vratam upākariṣyamāṇo yājñavalkyo maitreyīm iti hovāca pravrajiṣyan vā are aham asmāt sthānād asmi hanta te 'nayā kātyāyanyā sahāntaṃ karavāṇīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6121: athāpy uktānuśāsanāsi maitreyi etāvad are khalv amṛtatvam iti hoktvā yājñavalkyaḥ pravavrājeti''
GSP29nysvbh1u:6126: jarāmarye ca karmaṇy aviśeṣeṇa kalpyamāne sarvasya pātracayāntāni karmāṇīti prasajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6128_0: ``etad dha sma vai tat pūrve brāhmaṇā anūcānā vidvāṃsaḥ prajāṃ na kāmayante kiṃ prajayā
GSP29nysvbh1u:6128_1: kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ no 'yam ātmāyaṃ loka iti te ha sma putraiṣaṇāyāś ca vittaiṣaṇāyāś
GSP29nysvbh1u:6128_2: ca lokaiṣaṇāyāś ca vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ carantīti'' /
GSP29nysvbh1u:6129: eṣaṇābhyaś ca vyutthitasya pātracayāntāni karmāṇi nopapadyante iti nāviśeṣeṇa karttuḥ prayojakaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6133_0: pramāṇena prāmāṇyābhyanujñānāt --- pramāṇena khalu brāhmaṇenetihāsapurāṇasya prāmāṇyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:6133_1: abhyanujñāyate ``te vā khalv ete atharvāṅgirasa etad itihāsapurāṇam abhyavadann itihāsapurāṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:6135: aprāmāṇye ca dharmaśāstrasya prāṇabhṛtāṃ vyavahāralopāl lokocchedaprasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6138: ye eva mantrabrāhmaṇasya draṣṭāraḥ pravaktāraś ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6145: tatraikena na sarvaṃ vyavasthāpyate iti yathāviṣayam etāni pramāṇānīndriyādivad iti//61//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6151: yathā suṣuptasya khalu svapnādarśane rāgānubandhaḥ sukhaduḥkhānubandhaś ca vicchidyate tathāpavarge 'pīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6152: etac ca brahmavido muktasyātmano rūpam udāharantīti//62//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6166: sarvāṇi pūrvakarmāṇi hy ante janmani pipacyanta iti//63//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6178: NyS_4,1.65: prāg utpatter abhāvānityatvavat svābhāvike 'py anityatvam //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6179: yathānādiḥ prāg utpatter abhāva utpannena bhāvena nivartyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6188: sataḥ khalu dharmo nityatvam anityatvaṃ ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6191: anutpattidharmakam anityam iti nātra hetur astīti//66//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6199: karma ca sattvanikāyanirvartakaṃ naiyamikān rāgadveṣamohān nirvarttayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6201: dṛśyate hi kaścit sattvanikāyo rāgabahulaḥ kaścid dveṣabahulaḥ kaścin mohabahula iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6203: mūḍho rajyati mūḍhaḥ kupyati rakto muhyati kupito muhyati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6205: sarvamithyāsaṅkalpānāṃ tattvajñānād anutpattiḥ kāraṇānutpātau ca kāryānutpatter iti rāgādīnām atyantam anutpattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6207: sarve ime khalv ādhyātmikā bhāvā anādinā prabandhena pravarttante śarīrādayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6208: na jātv atra kaścid anutpannapūrvaḥ prathamata utpadyate 'nyatra tattvajñānāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6209: na caivaṃ saty anutpattidharmakaṃ kiñcid avyayadharmakaṃ pratijñāyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6210: karma ca sattvanikāyanirvartakaṃ tattvajñānakṛtān mithyāsaṅkalpavighātān na rāgādyutpattinimittaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6216: kiṃ nu khalu bhoḥ yāvanto viṣayās tāvatsu pratyekaṃ tattvajñānam utpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6219: na tāvad ekaikatra yāvad viṣayam utpadyate jñeyānām ānantyāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6221: yatra notpadyate tatrānivṛtto moha iti mohaśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6222: na cānyaviṣayeṇa tattvajñānenānyaviṣayo mohaḥ śakyaḥ pratiṣeddhum iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6224: mithyājñānaṃ vai khalu moho na tattvajñānasyānutpattimātram/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6225: tac ca mithyājñānaṃ yatra viṣaye pravartamānaṃ saṃsārabījaṃ bhavati sa viṣayas tattvato jñeya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6229: anātmānaṃ khalv aham asmīti paśyato dṛṣṭir ahaṅkāra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6234: ayaṃ khalu śarīrādyarthajātam aham asmīti vyavasitaḥ taducchedenātmocchedaṃ manyamāno 'nucchedatṛṣṇāpariplutaḥ punaḥ punas tad upādatte,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6237: yas tu duḥkhaṃ duḥkhāyatanaṃ duḥkhānuṣaktaṃ sukhaṃ ca sarvam idaṃ duḥkham iti paśyati sa duḥkhaṃ parijānati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6238: parijñātaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhavaty anupādānāt saviṣānnavat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6239: evaṃ doṣān karma ca duḥkhahetur iti paśyati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6240: na cāprahīṇeṣu doṣeṣu duḥkhaprabandhocchedena śakyaṃ bhavitum iti doṣān jahāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6241: prahīṇeṣu ca doṣeṣu na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāyety uktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6242: pretyabhāvaphaladuḥkhāni ca jñeyāni vyavasthāpayati karma ca doṣāṃś ca praheyān/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6244: evaṃ catasṛbhir vidhābhiḥ prameyaṃ vibhaktam āsevamānasyābhyasyato bhāvayataḥ samyagdarśanaṃ yathābhūtāvabodhas tattvajñānam utpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6249: tad idaṃ tattvajñānaṃ tadviṣayam utpannam ahaṅkāraṃ nivartayati samānaviṣaye tayor virodhāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6250: evaṃ tattvajñānād ``duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānānām uttarottarāpāye tadanantarābhāvād apavarga'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6251: sa cāyaṃ śāstrārthasaṃgraho 'nūdyate nāpūrvo vidhīyate iti//1//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6260: tāṃś ca prasañcakṣāṇasya rūpādiviṣayo mithyāsaṅkalpo nivartate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6264: so 'yam adhyātmaṃ bahiś ca viviktacitto viharan mukta ity ucyate//2//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6267: ataḥ paraṃ kācit saṃjñā heyā kācid bhāvayitavyety upadiśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6271: sā ca khalu strīsaṃjñā sapariṣkārā puruṣasya,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6272: puruṣasaṃjñā ca striyāḥ sapariṣkārā nimittasaṃjñā anuvyañjanasaṃjñā ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6277: anuvyañjanasaṃjñā --- itthaṃ daṇḍā ittham oṣṭhāv iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6278: seyaṃ saṃjñā kāmaṃ vardhayati tadanuṣaktāṃś ca doṣān vivarjanīyān,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6284: saty eva ca dvividhe viṣaye kācit saṃjñā bhāvanīyā kācit parivarjanīyety upadiśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6297: athāpi nopalabhyate na kathañcana saṃśayān mucyata iti//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6303: kasmāt? pūrvoktahetūnām apratiṣedhād asti dravyāntarārambha iti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6308: vṛttyanupapatter api tarhi saṃśayānupapattir nāsty avayavīti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6316: na hy asyānye avayavā ekadeśabhūtāḥ santīti//7//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6325: tad evaṃ na yuktaḥ saṃśayo nāsty avayavīti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6331: na cāyaṃ pṛthag avayavebhyo vartate agrahaṇāt nityatvaprasaṅgāc ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6338: kasmāt? dharmamātrasya dharmibhir avayavaiḥ pūrvavat sambandhānupapatteḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6339: pṛthak cāvayavebhyo dharmibhyo dharmasyāgrahaṇād iti samānam//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6344: kiṃ pratyavayavaṃ kṛtsno 'vayavī vartate athaikadeśeneti nopapadyate praśnaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6348: tāv imau kṛtsnaikadeśaśabdau bhedaviṣayau naikasminn avayaviny uapapadyete bhedābhāvād iti//11//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6354: yady api ekadeśo 'vayavāntarabhūtaḥ syāt tathāpy avayave 'vayavāntaraṃ vartate nāvayavīti anyo 'vayavīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6356: anyāvayavabhāve 'py avṛtter avayavino naikadeśena vṛttir anyāvayavābhāvād ity ahetuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6361: na kāraṇadravyebhyo 'nyatra kāryadravyam ātmānaṃ labhate viparyayas tu kāraṇadravyeṣv iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6364: nityeṣu dravyeṣu katham āśrayāśrayibhāva iti cet?
GSP29nysvbh1u:6365: anityeṣu dravyaguṇeṣu darśanād āśrayāśritabhāvasya nityeṣu siddhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6369: yathā rūpādiṣu mithyāsaṅkalpo na rūpādaya iti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6373: sarvāgrahaṇam avayavyasiddher iti pratyavasthito 'py etad āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:6375: yathaikaikaḥ keśas taimirikeṇa nopalabhyate keśasamūhas tūpalabhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6380: NyS_4,2.14: svaviṣayān atikrameṇendiryasya paṭumandabhāvād viṣayagrahaṇasya tathābhāavo nāviṣaye pravṛttiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6381: yathāviṣayam indriyāṇāṃ paṭumandabhāvād viṣayagrahaṇānāṃ paṭumandabhāvo bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6382: cakṣuḥ khalu prakṛṣyamāṇaṃ nāviṣayaṃ gandhaṃ gṛhṇāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6384: so 'yaṃ taimirikaḥ kaścic cakṣur viṣayaṃkeśaṃ na gṛhṇāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6388: paramāṇavas tv atīndriyā indriyāviṣayabhūtā na kenacid indriyeṇa gṛhyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6391: na jātv arthāntaram aṇubhyo gṛhyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6392: te khalv ime paramāṇavaḥ sannihitā gṛhyamāṇā atīndriyatvaṃ jahati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6393: viyuktāś cāgṛhyamāṇā indriyaviṣayatvaṃ na labhanta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6394: so 'yaṃ dravyāntarānutpattāv atimahān vyāghāta ity upapadyate dravyāantaram yad grahaṇasya viṣaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6408: yaḥ khalv avayavino 'vayaveṣu vṛttipratiṣedhād abhāvaḥ so 'yam avayavasyāvayaveṣu prasajyamānaḥ sarvapralayāya vā kalpeta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6413: sa āśrayaṃ vyāghnan ātmaghātāya kalpata iti//15//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6419: avayavavibhāgam āśritya vṛttipratiṣedhād abhāvaḥ prasajyamāno niravayavāt paramāṇor nivartate na sarvapralayāya kalpate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6420: niravayavatvaṃ tu paramāṇor vibhāgair alpataraprasaṅgasya yato nālpīyas tatrāvasthānāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6421: loṣṭasya khalu pravibhajyamānāvayavasyālpataram alpatamam uttaram uttaraṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6422: sa cāyam alpataraprasaṅgaḥ yasmān nālpataram asti yaḥ paramo 'lpas tatra nivartate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6423: yataś ca nālpīyo 'sti taṃ parama'nuṃ pracakṣmahe iti//16\\
GSP29nysvbh1u:6432: athedānīm ānupalambhikaḥ sarvaṃ nāstīti manyamāna āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:6436: antar bahiś cāṇur ākāśena samāviṣṭo vyatibhinnaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6443: athaitan neṣyate --- paramāṇor antar nāsty ākāśam ity asarvagatatvaṃ prasajyata iti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6446: NyS_4,2.20: antar bahiś ca kāryadravyasya kāraṇāntaravacanād akārye tadabhāvaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6448: ``bahir'' iti ca vyavadhāyakam avyavahitaṃ kāraṇam evocyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6451: akārye hi paramāṇāv antar bahir ity asyābhāvaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6455: yato hi nālpataram asti sa paramāṇur iti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6460: yatra kvacid utpannāḥ śabdā vibhavanty ākāśe --- tadāśrayā bhavanti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6461: manobhiḥ paramāṇubhis tatkāryaiś ca saṃyogā vibhavanty ākāśe,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6470: sarpac ca pratighāti na viṣṭambhāti --- nāsya kriyāhetuṃ guṇaṃ pratibadhnāti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6473: viparyaye hi viṣṭambho dṛṣṭa iti sa bhavān sāvayave sparśavati dravye dṛṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ viparīte nāśāṅkitum arhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6488: paricchinnānāṃ hi sparśavatāṃ saṃsthānaṃ trikoṇaṃ caturasraṃ samaṃ parimaṇḍalam ity upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6494: madhye sann aṇuḥ pūrvāparābhyām aṇubhyām saṃyuktas tayor vyavadhānaṃ kurute/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6497: yau tau pūrvāparau bhāgau tāv asyāvayavau,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6498: evaṃ sarvataḥ saṃyujyamānasya sarvato bhāgā avayavā iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6499: yat tāvan ``mūrtimatāṃ saṃsthānopapatter avayavasadbhāva'' iti? atroktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6500: kim uktam? vibhāge 'lpataraprasaṅgasya yato nālpīyas tatra nivṛtter aṇavayavasya cāṇutaratvaprasaṅgād aṇukāryapratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6504: uktaṃ cātra sparśavān aṇuḥ sparśavator aṇvoḥ pratighātād vyavadhāyako na sāvayavatvāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6505: sparśavattvāc ca vyavadhāne saty aṇusaṃyogo nāśrayaṃ vyāpnotīti bhāgabhaktir bhavati bhāgavānn ivāyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6506: uktaṃ cātra vibhāge 'lpataraprasaṅgasya yato nālpīyas tatrāvasthānāt tadavayavasya cāṇutaratvaprasaṅgād aṇukāryapratiṣedha iti//24//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6509: mūrtimatāṃ ca saṃsthānopapatteḥ saṃyogopapatteś ca paramāṇūnāṃ sāvayavatvam iti hetvoḥ ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:6511: yāvan mūrtimad yāvac ca saṃyujyate tat sarvaṃ sāvayavam ity anavasthākāriṇāv imau hetū,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6516: vibhāgasya ca vibhajyamānahānir nopapadyate tasmāt pralayāntatā nopapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6518: anavasthāyāṃ ca pratyadhikaraṇaṃ dravyāvayavānām ānantyāt parimāṇabhedānāṃ gurutvasya cāgraḥaṇam samānaparimāṇatvaṃ cāvayavāvayavinoḥ paramaṇvavayavibhāgād ūrdhvam iti//25//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6522: yad idaṃ bhavān buddhīr āśritya buddhiviṣayāḥ santīti manyate mithyābuddhaya etāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6523: yadi hi tattvabuddhayaḥ syur buddhyā vivecane yāthātmyaṃ buddhiviṣayāṇām upalabhyeta ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:6524: NyS_4,2.26: buddhyā vivecanāt tu bhāvānāṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhis tantvapakarṣaṇe paṭasadbhāvānupalabdhivat tadanupalabdhiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6526: yathāyaṃ tantur ayaṃ tantur iti pratyekaṃ tantuṣu vivicyamāneṣu nārthāntaraṃ kiñcid upalabhyate --- yat paṭabuddher viṣayaḥ syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6527: yāthātmyānupalabdher asati viṣaye paṭabuddhir bhavantī mithyābuddhir bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6532: yadi buddhyā vivecanaṃ bhāvānāṃ na sarvabhāvānāṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6533: atha sarvabhāvānāṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhir na buddhyā vivecanam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6534: bhāvānāṃ buddhyā vivecanaṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhiś ceti vyāhanyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6536: tad uktam --- ``avayavāvayaviprasaṅgaś caivam ā pralayād'' iti// 27 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6540: kāryadravyaṃ kāraṇadravyāśritaṃ tat kāraṇebhyaḥ pṛthaṅ nopalabhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6544: buddhyā vivecanāt tu bhāvānāṃ pṛthaggrahaṇam atīndriyeṣv aṇuṣu,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6545: yad indriyeṇa gṛhyate tad etayā buddhyā vivicyamānam anyad iti// 28 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6550: yad asti yathā ca yan nāsti yathā ca tat sarvaṃ pramāṇata upalabdhyā sidhyati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6551: yā ca pramāṇata upaloabdhis tad buddhyā vivecanaṃ bhāvānām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6552: tena sarvaśāstrāṇi sarvakarmāṇi sarve ca śarīriṇāṃ vyavahārā vyāptāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6553: parīkṣamāṇo hi buddhyādhyavasyatīdam astīdaṃ nāstīti tatra na sarvabhāvānupapattiḥ// 29 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6558: evaṃ ca sati sarvaṃ nāstīti nopapadyate, kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:6565: sarvam astīty asya kathaṃ na siddhiḥ?// 30 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6569: yathā svapne na viṣayāḥ santy atha cābhimāno bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6570: evaṃ na pramāṇāni prameyāṇi ca santy atha ca pramāṇaprameyābhimāno bhavati// 31 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6578: svapnānte viṣayābhimānavat pramāṇaprameyābhimāno na punar jāgaritānte viṣayopalabdhivad ity atra hetur nāsti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6580: svapnānte cāsanto viṣayā upalabhyanta ity atrāpi hetvabhāvaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6584: yadi pratibodhe ṇupalambhāt svapne viṣayā na santīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6585: tarhi ya ime pratibuddhena viṣayā upalabhyanta upalambhāt santīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6587: upalambhāt sadbhāve saty anupalambhād abhāvaḥ siddhyati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6588: ubhayathā tv abhāve nānupalambhasya sāmarthyam asti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6593: svapnaviṣayābhimānavad iti bruvatā svapnāntavikalpe hetur vācyaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6604: yathā smṛtiś ca saṅkalpaś ca pūrvopalabdhaviṣayau na tasya pratyākhyānāya kalpete tathā svapne viṣayagrahaṇaṃ pūrvopalabdhaviṣayaṃ na tasya pratyākhyānāya kalpata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6607: yaḥ suptaḥ svapnaṃ paśyati sa eva jāgrat svapnadarśanāni pratisandhatta idam adrākṣam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6609: sati ca pratisandhāne yā jāgrato buddhivṛttis tadvaśād ayaṃ vyavasāyaḥ svapnaviṣayābhimāno mithyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6612: yasya svapnāntajāgaritāntayor aviśeṣas tasya svapnaviṣayābhimānavad iti sādhanam anarthakaṃ tadāśrayapratyākhyānāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6613: atasmiṃs tad iti ca vyavasāyaḥ pradhānāśrayaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6616: na khalu puruṣe 'nupalabdhe puruṣa ity apuruṣe vyavasāyo bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6617: evaṃ svapnaviṣayasya vyavasāyo hastinam adrākṣaṃ parvatam adrākṣam iti pradhānāśrayo bhavitum arhati// 34 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6623: sthāṇau pruṣo 'yam iti vyavasāyo mithyopalabdhiḥ atasmiṃs tad iti jñānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6627: yathā pratibodhe yā jñānavṛttis tayā svapnaviṣayābhimāno nivartyate nārtho viṣayasāmānyalakṣaṇaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6628: tathā māyāgandharvanagaramṛgatṛṣṇikāṇām api yā buddhayo 'tasmiṃs tad iti vyavasāyās tatrāpy anenaiva kalpena mithyopalabdhivināśas tattvajñānān nārthapratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6630: prajñāpanīyasarūpaṃ ca dravyam upādāya sādhanavān aparasya mithyādhyavasāyaṃ karoti sā māyā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6631: nīhāraprabhṛtīnāṃ nagarasarūpasanniveśe dūrān nagarabuddhir utpadyate viparyaye tadabhāvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6632: sūryamarīciṣu bhaumenoṣmaṇā saṃsṛṣṭeṣu spandamāneṣūdakabuddhir bhavati sāmānyagrahaṇāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6635: kvacit kadācit kasyacic ca bhāvān nānimittaṃ mithyājñānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6636: dṛṣṭaṃ ca buddhidvaitaṃ māyāprayoktuḥ parasya ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6639: tad etat sarvasyābhāve nirupākhyatāyāṃ nirātmakatve nopapadyata iti// 35 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6646: upalabhyate hi mithyābuddhinimittaṃ mithyābuddhiś ca pratyātmam utpannā gṛhyate saṃvedyatvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6654: tattvapradhānayor alopād bhedāt sthāṇau puruṣa iti mithyābuddhir utpadyate sāmānyagrahaṇāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6656: loṣṭe kapota iti na tu samāne viṣaye mithyābuddhīnāṃ samāveśaḥ sāmānyagrahaṇavyavasthānāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6657: yasya tu nirātmakaṃ nirupākhyaṃ sarvaṃ tasya samāveśaḥ prasajyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6659: gandhādau ca prameye gandhādibuddayo mithyābhimatās tattvapradhānayoḥ sāmānyagrahaṇasya cābhāvāt tattvabuddhaya eva bhavanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6666: sa tu pratyāhṛtasyendriyebhyo manaso dhārakeṇa prayatnena dhāryamāṇasyātmanā saṃyogas tattvabubhutsāviśiṣṭaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6668: sati hi tasminn indriyārtheṣu buddhayo notpadyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6672: yad uktaṃ ``sati hi tasminn indriyārtheṣu buddhayo notpadyanta'' ity etat ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:6682: kṣutpipāsābhyāṃ śītoṣṇābhyāṃ vyādhibhiś cānicchato 'pi buddhayaḥ pravartante tasmād aikāgryānupapattir iti// 40 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6685: astv etat samādhiṃ vihāya vyutthānaṃ vyutthānanimittaṃ samādhipratyanīkaṃ ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6698: pracayakāṣṭhāgate tattvajñānahetau dharme prakṛṣṭāyāṃ samādhibhāvanāyāṃ tattvajñānam utpadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6699: dṛṣṭaś ca samādhinārthaviśeṣaprābalyābhibhavaḥ ``nāham etad aśrauṣaṃ nāham etad ajñāsiṣam anyatra me mano 'bhūd'' ity āha laukika iti// 42 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6709: karmavaśān niṣpanne śarīre ceṣṭendriyārthāśraye nimittabhāvād avaśyambhāvī buddhīnām utpādaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6710: na ca prabalo 'pi san bāhyo ṛtha ātmano buddhyutpāde samartho bhavati tasyendriyeṇa saṃyogād buddhyutpāde sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭam iti// 44 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6716: tatra yad uktam ``apavarge 'py evaṃ prasaṅga'' iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6719: yasmāt sarvaduḥkhabījaṃ sarvaduḥkhāyatanaṃ cāpavarge vicchidyate tasmāt sarveṇa duḥkhena vimuktir apavargaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6720: na nirbījaṃ nirāyatanaṃ ca duḥkham utpadyata iti// 45 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6723: NyS_4,2.46: tadarthaṃ yamaniyamābhyām ātmasaṃskāro yogāc cādhyātmavidhyupāyaiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6729: sa punas tapaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ pratyāhāro dhyānaṃ dhāraṇeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6735: NyS_4,2.47: jñānagrahaṇābhyāsas tadvidyaiś ca saha saṃvādaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6737: jñāyate 'neneti jñānam ātmavidyāśāstraṃ tasya grahaṇam adhyayanadhāraṇe,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6739: tadvidyaiś ca saha saṃvāda iti prajñāparipākārtham,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6744: tadvidyaiś ca saha saṃvāda ity avibhaktārthaṃ vacanaṃ vibhajyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:6750: yadi ca manyeta pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahaḥ pratikūlaḥ parasyeti ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:6751: NyS_4,2.49: pratipakṣahīnam api vā prayojanārhtam arthitve //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6753: parataḥ prajñām upāditsamānas tattvabubhutsāprakāśanena svapakṣam anavasthāpayan svadarśanaṃ pariśodhayed iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6760: anutpannatattvajñānānām aprahīṇadoṣāṇāṃ tadarthaṃ ghaṭamānānām etad iti// 50 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6768: tad etad vidyāpālārthaṃ na lābhapūjākhyātyartham iti// 51 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6776: tad vistareṇa vibhajyate --- tāḥ khalv imā jātayaḥ sthāpanāhetau prayukte caturviṃśatiḥ pratiṣedhahetavaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6787: sādharmyeṇopasaṃhāre sādhyadharmaviparyayopapatteḥ sādharmyeṇaiva pratyavasthānam aviśiṣyamāṇaṃ sthāpanāhetutaḥ sādharmyasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6793: evam upasaṃhṛte paraḥ sādharmyeṇaiva pratyavatiṣṭhate niṣkriya ātmā vibhuno dravyasya niṣkriyatvād,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6798: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6801: atha vaidharmyasamaḥ --- kriyāhetuguṇayukto loṣṭaḥ paricchinno dṛṣṭo na ca tathātmā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6803: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na punaḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyād akriyeṇeti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6806: kriyāvad dravyam avibhu dṛṣṭaṃ yathā loṣṭaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6809: vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam --- niṣkriyaṃ dravyam ākāśaṃ kriyāhetuguṇarahitaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6812: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyān niṣkriyeṇa bhavitavyaṃ na punar akriyavaidharmyāt kriyāvateti viśeṣahetvabhāvād vaidharmyasamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6814: atha sādharmyasamaḥ --- kriyāvān loṣṭaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayukto dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6817: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyān niṣkriyo na punaḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvān iti viśeṣahetvabhāvāt sādharmyasamaḥ//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6822: sādharmyamātreṇa vaidharmyamātreṇa ca sādhyasādhane pratijñāyamāne syād avyavasthā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6830: pramāṇānām abhisambandhāc caikārthakāritvaṃ samānaṃ vākya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6848: tāv etau sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmau viparyasyato varṇyāvarṇyasamau bhavataḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6849: sādhanadharmayukte dṛṣṭānte dharmāntaravikalpāt sādhyadharmavikalpaṃ prasañjayato vikalpasamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6852: evaṃ kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiñcit kriyāvat syāt yathā loṣṭaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6858: prāptas tarhi yathātmā tathā loṣṭa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6859: sādhyaś cāyam ātmā kriyāvān iti kāmaṃ loṣṭo 'pi sādhyaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6868: siddhaṃ ca kiñcitsādharmyād upamānaṃ yathā gaus tathā gavaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6870: tatra na labhyo gogavayayor dharmavikalpaś codayitum/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6871: evaṃ sādhake dharme dṛṣṭāntādisāmarthyayukte na labhyaḥ sādhyadṛṣṭāntayor dharmavikalpād vaidharmyāt pratiṣedho vaktum iti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6876: evaṃ sādhyātideśād dṛṣṭānte upapadyamāne sādhyatvam anupapannam iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6880: NyS_5,1.7: prāpya sādhyam aprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyāviśiṣṭatvād aprāptyāsādhakatvāc ca prāptyaprāptisamau //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6881: hetuḥ prāpya vā sādhyaṃ sādhayed aprāpya vā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:6882: na tāvat prāpya prāptyām aviśiṣṭatvād asādhakaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6883: dvayor vidyamānayoḥ prāptau satyāṃ kiṃ kasya sādhakaṃ sādhyaṃ vā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:6893: ubhayathā khalv ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kartṛkaraṇādhikaraṇāni prāpya mṛdaṃ ghaṭādikāryaṃ niṣpādayanti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6894: abhicārāc ca pīḍane sati dṛṣṭam aprāpya sādhakatvam iti//8//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6898: NyS_5,1.9: dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇānapadeśāt pratyavasthānāc ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅgapratidṛṣṭāntasamau //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6899: sādhanasyāpi sādhanaṃ vaktavyam iti prasaṅgena pratyavasthānaṃ prasaṅgasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6900: kriyāhetuguṇayogī kriyāvān loṣṭa iti hetur nāpadiśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6901: na ca hetum antereṇa siddhir astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6904: kriyāvān ātmā kriyāhetuguṇayogād loṣṭavad ity ukte pratidṛṣṭānta upādīyate --- kriyāhetuguṇayuktam ākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dṛṣṭam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6913: idaṃ tāvad ayaṃ pṛṣṭo vaktum arhati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6917: atha pradīpaṃ didṛkṣamāṇāḥ pradīpāntaraṃ kasmān nopādadate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:6925: sa khalu ``laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭānta'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6933: --- anena prakāreṇa pratidṛṣṭānataḥ sādhako na dṛṣṭānta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6934: evaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntahetutve nāhetur dṛṣṭānta ity upapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6935: sa ca katham ahetur na syāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:6941: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte apara āha --- prāgutpatter anutpanne śabde prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatvakāraṇaṃ nāsti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6949: NyS_5,1.13: tathābhāvād utpannasya kāraṇopapatter na kāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6951: utpannaḥ khalv ayaṃ śabda iti bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6953: utpannasya śabdabhāvāc chabdasya sataḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatvakāraṇam upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6958: NyS_5,1.14: sāmānyadṛṣṭāntayor aindriyakatve samāne nityānityasādharmyāt saṃśayasamaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6959: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte hetau saṃśayena pratyavatiṣṭate --- sati prayatnānantarīyakatve asty evāsya nityena sāmānyena sādharmyam aindriyakatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6966: NyS_5,1.15: sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyād ubhayathā vā saṃśaye 'tyantasaṃśayaprasaṅgo nityatvānabhyupagamāc ca sāmānysyāpratiṣedhaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:6969: evaṃ vaidharmyād viśeṣāt prayatnānantarīyakatvād avadhāryamāṇe śabdasyānityatve nityānityasādharmyāt saṃśayo 'vakāśaṃ na labhate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6972: gṛhyamāṇe ca viśeṣe nityaṃ sādharmyaṃ saṃśayahetur iti nābhyupagamyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6973: na hi gṛhyamāṇe puruṣasya viśeṣe sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyaṃ saṃśayahetur bhavati//15//
GSP29nysvbh1u:6978: ubhayena nityena cānityena ca sādharmyāt pakṣapratipakṣayoḥ pravṛttiḥ prakriyā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6979: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ekaḥ pakṣaṃ pravarttayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6980: dvitīyaś ca nityasādharmyāt pratipakṣaṃ pravarttayati --- nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt śabdatvavad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6981: evaṃ ca sati prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti hetur anityasādharmyeṇa ucyamāno na prakaraṇam ativarttate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:6992: ubhayasādharmyāt prakriyāsiddhiṃ bruvatā pratipakṣāt prakriyāsiddhir uktā bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:6994: tatra ekataraḥ pratipakṣa ity evaṃ saty upapannaḥ pratipakṣo bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7006: tat sādhyāt pūrvaṃ paścāt saha vā bhavet/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7012: dvayor vidyamānayoḥ kiṃ kasya sādhanaṃ kiṃ kasya sādhyam iti hetur ahetunā na viśiṣyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7021: nirvartanīyasya nirvṛttir vijñeyasya vijñānam ubhayaṃ kāraṇato dṛśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7023: yat tu khalūktam asati sādhye kasya sādhanam iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:7024: yat tu nirvatyate yac ca vijñāpyate tasyeti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7028: pūrvaṃ paścād yugapad vā pratiṣedha iti nopapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7034: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad iti sthāpite pakṣe arthāpattyā pratipakṣaṃ sādhayato 'rthāpattisamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7035: yadi prayatnānantarīyakatvād anityasādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7037: asti cāsya nityena sādharmyam asparśatvam iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7042: NyS_5,1.22: anuktasyārthāpatteḥ pakṣahāner upapattir anuktatvād anaikānatikatvāc cārthāpatteḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:7043: anupapādya sāmarthyam anuktam arthād āpadyate iti bruvataḥ pakṣahāner upapattir anuktatvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7044: anityapakṣasiddhāv arthād āpannaṃ nityapakṣasya hānir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7048: yadi nityasādharmyād asparśatvād ākāśavac ca nityaḥ śabdaḥ arthād āpannam anityasādharmyāt prayatnānantarīyakatvād anitya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7050: na khalu vai ghaṇasya grāvṇaḥ patanam ity arthād āpadyate --- dravāṇām apāṃ patanābhāva iti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7053: NyS_5,1.23: ekadharmopapatter aviśeṣe sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅgāt sadbhāvaupapatter aviśeṣasamaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:7054: eko dharmaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ śabdaghaṭayor upapadyata ity aviśeṣe ubhayor anityatve,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7063: NyS_5,1.24: kvacit taddharmopapatteḥ kvacic cānupapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:7064: yathā sādhyadṛṣṭāntayor ekadharmasya prayatnānantarīyakatvasyopapatter anityatvaṃ dharmāntaram aviśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7067: atha matam anityatvam eva dharmānataraṃ sadbhāvopapattinimittaṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra syād iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7068: evaṃ khalu vai kalpyamāne anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ sadbhāvopapatter iti pakṣaḥ prāpnoti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7075: tasmāt sadbhāvopapatteḥ sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅga iti nirabhidheyam etad vākyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7076: sarvabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvopapatter anityatvam iti bruvatā 'nujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7082: yady anityatvakāraṇam upapadyate śabdasyety anityaḥ śabdo nityatvakāraṇam apy upapadyate 'syāsparśatvam iti nityatvam apy upapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7083: ubhayasyānityatvasya nityatvasya ca kāraṇopapattyā pratyavasthānam upapattisamaḥ//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7088: ubhayakāraṇopapatter iti bruvatā nānityatvakāraṇopapatter anityatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7095: ekasya nityatvānityatvaprasaṅgaṃ vyāhataṃ bruvatoktaṃ pratiṣedha iti cet?
GSP29nysvbh1u:7109: prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti bruvatā kāraṇata utpattir abhidhīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7111: yadi ca kāraṇāntarād apy utpadyamānasya śabdasya tad anityatvam upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7116: na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyānupalabdhiḥ, kasmāt ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:7119: gṛhyeta caitad asyāgrahaṇakāraṇam udakādivat, na gṛhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7121: NyS_5,1.29: tadanupalabdher anupalambhād abhāvasiddhau tadviparītopapatter anupalabdhisamaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:7124: abhāvasiddhau hetvabhāvāt tadviparītam astitvam āvaraṇādīnām avadhāryate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7125: tadviparītopapatter yatpratijñātaṃ ``na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyānupalabdhir ity'' etan na sidhyati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7126: so 'yaṃ hetur ``āvaraṇādyanupalabdher'' ity āvaraṇādiṣu cāvaraṇādyanupalabdhau ca samayānupalabdhyā pratyavasthito 'nupalabdhisamo bhavati//29//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7140: so 'yam āvaraṇādyanupalabheḥ anupalambha upalabdhyabhāve 'nupalabdhau svaviṣaye pravarttamāno na svaviṣayaṃ pratiṣedhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7146: tad upalabdheḥ svaviṣayapratipādikāyā abhāvād anupalambhād anupalabdher viṣayo gamyate --- na santy āvaraṇādīni śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇānīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7155: asti me saṃśayajñānaṃ nāsti me saṃśayajñānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7157: seyam āvaraṇāadyanupalabdhir upalabdhyabhāvaḥ svasaṃvedyaḥ --- nāsti me śabdasyāvaraṇādyupalabdhir iti nopalabhyante śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇāny āvaraṇādīnīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7158: tatra yad uktaṃ tad anupalabdher anupalambhād abhāvasiddhir iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7164: anityena ghaṭena sādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti bruvato 'sti ghaṭenānityena sarvabhāvānāṃ sādharmyam iti sarvasyānityatvam aniṣṭaṃ sampadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7178: NyS_5,1.34: dṛṣṭānte ca sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetutvāt tasya cobhayathābhāvān nāviśeṣaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:7179: dṛṣṭānte yaḥ khalu dharmaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7188: sādharmyamātraṃ vaidharmyamātraṃ cāśritya bhavān āha --- ``sādharmyāt tulyadharmopapatteḥ sarvānityatvaprasaṅgād anityasam'' iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7190: aviśeṣasamapratiṣedhe ca yad uktaṃ tad api veditavyam//34//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7194: NyS_5,1.35: nityam anityabhāvād anitye nityatvopapatter nityasamaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:7196: tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde nityam athānityam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:7198: dharmasya sadā bhāvād dharmiṇo 'pi sadā bhāva iti nityaḥ śabda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7206: NyS_5,1.36: pratiṣedhye nityam anityabhāvād anitye 'nityatvopapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:7207: pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anityatvasya bhāvād ity ucyamāne 'nujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7208: anityatvopapatteś ca ``nānityaḥ śabda'' iti pratiṣedho nopapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7210: nityam anityatvasya bhāvād iti hetur na bhavatīti hetvabhāvāt pratiṣedhānupapattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7214: yo 'yaṃ paripraśnaḥ --- tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde sarvadā bhavati atha neti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7216: kasmāt? utpannasya yo nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasya tad anityatvam;
GSP29nysvbh1u:7217: evaṃ ca saty adhikaraṇādheyavibhāgo vyāghātān nāstīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7219: nityatvam anityatvaṃ ca ekasya dharmiṇo dharmāv iti virudhyete,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7222: tatra yad uktaṃ --- nityam anityatvasya bhāvān nitya eva,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7228: yasya prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ tat khalv abhūtvā bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7230: anityam iti ca bhūtvā na bhavatīty etad vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7232: evam avasthite prayatnakāryānekatvād iti pratiṣedha ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7235: tat kiṃ prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ śabdasyāho 'bhivyaktir iti viśeṣo nāsti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7243: yatra prayatnānantaram abhivyaktis tatrānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ vyavadhānam upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7252: hetoś ced anaikāntikatvam upapadyate anaikātikatvād asādhakaḥ syād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7256: kiñcit pratiṣedhati kiñcin neti anaikāntikatvād asādhaka iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7257: atha vā śabdasyānityatvapakṣe prayatnānantaram utpādo nābhivyaktir iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7258: nityatvapakṣe 'pi prayatnānantaram abhivyaktir notpāda iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7259: so 'yam ubhayapakṣasamo viśeṣahetvabhāva ity ubhayam apy anaikātikam iti//39//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7264: sarveṣu sādharmyaprabhṛtiṣu pratiṣedhahetuṣu yatra yatrāviśeṣo dṛśyate tatrobhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samaḥ prasajyata iti//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7268: yo 'yaṃ pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvam āpadyate so 'yaṃ pratiṣedhasya vipratiṣedhe 'pi samānaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7270: tatrānityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti sādhanavādinaḥ sthāpanā prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7271: ``prayatnakāryānekatvāt kāryasama'' iti dūṣaṇavādinaḥ pratiṣedhahetunā dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7273: tasyāsya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ vipratiṣedha ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7274: tasmin pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvaṃ caturthaḥ pakṣaḥ//41//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7277: NyS_5,1.42: pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā //
GSP29nysvbh1u:7278_0: pratiṣedhaṃ dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya taduddhāram akṛtvānujñāya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe
GSP29nysvbh1u:7278_1: tṛtīyapakṣe samānam anaikāntikatvam iti samānaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ prasañjayato dūṣaṇavādino
GSP29nysvbh1u:7282: NyS_5,1.43: svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣopapattyupasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh1u:7283: sthāpanāpakṣe prayatnakāryānekatvād iti doṣaḥ sthāpanāhetuvādinaḥ svapakṣalakṣaṇo bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7285: so 'yaṃ svapakṣalakṣaṇaṃ doṣam apekṣamāṇo 'nuddhṛtyānujñāya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity upapadyamānaṃ doṣaṃ parapakṣe upasaṃharati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7286: itthaṃ cānaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedha iti hetuṃ nirdiśati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7287: tatra svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣayopapadyamānadoṣopasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe ca saty anena parapakṣadoṣo 'bhyupagato bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7290: tam anuddhṛtya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity āha/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7291: evaṃ sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayataḥ parapakṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣo bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7293: yathā parasya pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā prasajyata iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7294: tathāsyāpi sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayato matānujñā prasajyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7298: teṣāṃ sādhvasādhutāyāṃ mīmāṃsyamānāyāṃ caturthaṣaṣṭhayor arthāviśeṣāt punaruktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7299: caturthapakṣe samānadoṣatvaṃ parasyocyate --``pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe pratiṣedhadoṣavad doṣa'' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7300: ṣaṣṭhe 'pi ``parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣa'' iti samānadoṣatvam evocyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7303: tṛṭīyapakṣe 'pi ``pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa'' iti samānatvam abhyupagamyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7308: prathamadvitīyayor viśeṣahetvabhāva iti ṣaṭpakṣyām ubhayor asiddhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7310: yadā ``pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa'' ity evaṃ pravarttate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7312: yadā tu ``kāryānyatve prayatnāhetutvam anupalabdhikāraṇopapatter'' ity anena tṛṭīyapakṣo yujyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7315: nābhivyaktir'' iti siddhaḥ prathamapakṣo na ṣaṭpakṣī pravartata iti//43//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7322: nigrahasthānāni khalu parājayavastūny aparādhādhikaraṇāni prāyeṇa pratijñādyavayavāśrayāṇi tattvavādinam atattvavādinaṃ cābhisaṃplavante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7327_0: NyS_5,2.1: pratijñāhāniḥ pratijñāntaraṃ pratijñāvirodhaḥ pratijñāsannyāso hetvantaram
GSP29nysvbh1u:7327_1: arthāntaraṃ nirarthakam avijñātārtham apārthakam aprāptakālaṃ nyūnam adhikaṃ punaruktam
GSP29nysvbh1u:7327_2: ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaṃ niranuyojyānuyogo
GSP29nysvbh1u:7333: sādhyadharmapratyanīkena dharmeṇa pratyavasthite pratidraṣṭāntadharmaṃ svadṛṣṭānte 'bhyanujānan pratijñāṃ jahātīti pratjñāhāniḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7334: nidarśanam --- ``aindriyakatvād anityaḥ śabdo ghaṭavad'' ity kṛte apara āha -- dṛṣṭam aindriyakatvaṃ sāmānye nitye,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7335: kasmān na tathā śabda iti pratyavasthite idam āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:7337: yady aindriyakaṃ sāmānyaṃ nityaṃ kāmaṃ ghaṭo nityo 'stv iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7339: sa khalv ayaṃ sādhakasya dṛṣṭāntasya nityatvaṃ prasañjayan nigamanāntam eva pakṣaṃ jahāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7346: pratijñātārtho ``anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād ghaṭavad'' ity ukte yo 'sya pratiṣedhaḥ pratidṛṣṭāntena hetuvyabhicāraḥ --- sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ nityam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7348: ``dharmavikalpād'' iti dṛṣṭāntapratidṛṣṭāntayoḥ sādharmyayoge dharmabhedāt sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ sarvagatam aindriyakas tv asarvagato ghaṭa iti dharmavikalpāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7350: katham? yathā ghaṭo 'sarvagata evaṃ śabdo 'py asarvagato ghaṭavad evānitya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7372: guṇavyatiriktaṃ ca dravyaṃ rūpādibhyaś cārthāntarasyānupalabdhir iti virudhyate --- vyāhanyate na sambhavatīti//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7377: anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād ity ukte paro brūyāt sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ na cānityam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7379: evaṃ śabdo 'py aindriyako na cānitya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7380: evaṃ pratiṣiddhe pakṣe yadi brūyāt --- ``ka punar āhānityaḥ śabda'' iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7384: NyS_5,2.6: aviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchato hetvantaram //
GSP29nysvbh1u:7389: yāvān prakṛter vyūho bhavati tāvān vikāra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7391: asti cedaṃ parimāṇam prativyaktaṃ tadekaprakṛtīnāṃ vikārāṇāṃ parimāṇāt paśyāmo vyaktam idam ekaprakṛtīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7393: asya vyabhicāreṇa pratyavasthānaṃ --- nānāprakṛtīnām ekaprakṛtīnāṃ ca vikārāṇāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ parimāṇam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7394: evaṃ pratyavasthite āha --- ekaprakṛtisamanvaye sati śarāvādivikārāṇāṃ parimāṇadarśanāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7397: tad idam aviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣaṃ bruvato hetvantaraṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7398: sati ca hetvantarabhāve pūrvasya hetor asādhakatvān nigrahasthānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7399: hetvantaravacane sati yadi hetvarthanidarśano dṛṣṭānta upādīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7404: dṛṣṭānte hetvarthasyānidarśitasya sādhakabhāvānupapatter ānarthakyād dhetor anivṛttaṃ nigrahasthānam iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7411: hetutaḥ sādhyasiddhau prakṛtāyāṃ brūyāt --- nityaḥ śabdo 'sparśatvād iti hetuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7412: hetur nāma hinoter dhātos tuni pratyaye kṛdantaṃ padam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7429: abhidhānābhidheyabhāvānupapattau arthagater abhāvād varṇā eva krameṇa nirdiśyanta iti//8//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7432: NyS_5,2.9: pariṣatprativādibhyāṃ trir abhihitam apy avijñātam avijñātārtham //
GSP29nysvbh1u:7433: yad vākyaṃ pariṣadā prativādinā ca trir abhihitam api na vijñāyate śliṣṭaśabdam apratītaprayogam atidrutoccaritam ity evamādinā kāraṇena,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7435: tadavijñātam avijñātārtham asāmarthyasaṃvaraṇāya prayuktam iti nigrahasthānam iti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7439: yatrānekasya padasya vākyasya vā paurvāparyeṇānvayayogo nāstīty asambaddhārthatvagṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7452: tatrāvayavaviparyāsena vacanam aprāaptakālam asambaddhārthaṃ nigrahasthānam iti//11//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7457: pratijñādīnām avayavānām anyatamenāpy avayavena hīnaṃ nyūnaṃ nigrahasthānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7468: NyS_5,2.14: śabdārthayoḥ punar vacanaṃ punaruktam anyatrānuvādāt //
GSP29nysvbh1u:7470: nityaḥ śabdo nityaḥ śabda iti śabdapunaruktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7471: arthapunaruktam --- anityaḥ śabdo nirodhadharmako dhvanir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7473: yathā hetvapadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punar vacanaṃ nigamanam iti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7478: nidarśanam --- utpattidharmakatvād anityam ity uktvā arthād āpannasya yo 'bhidhāyakaḥ śabdas tena svaśabdena brūyād anutpattidharmakaṃ nityam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7488: prativādinā trir abhihitasya yad apratyauccāraṇaṃ tad ananubhāṣaṇaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7495: prativādinā trir abhihitasya yad avijñātaṃ tad ajñānaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7496: ayaṃ khalv avijñāya kasya pratiṣedhaṃ brūyād iti//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7501: tad yadā na pratipadyate tadā nigṛhīto bhavati//18//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7506: yatra kartavyaṃ vyāsajya kathāṃ vyavacchinatti --- idaṃ me karaṇīyaṃ vidyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7509: ekanigrahāvasānāyāṃ kathāyāṃ svayam eva kathāntaraṃ pratipadyata iti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7513: NyS_5,2.20: svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā //
GSP29nysvbh1u:7514: yaḥ pareṇa coditaṃ doṣaṃ svapakṣe 'bhyupagamyānuddhṛtya vadati --- bhavatpakṣe 'pi samāno doṣa iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7516: sa svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe doṣaṃ prasañjayan paramatam anujānātīti matānujñāṃ nāma nigrahasthānam āpadyata iti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7523: etac ca kasya parājaya ity anuyuktayā pariṣadā vacanīyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7524: na khalu nigrahaṃ prāptaḥ svakaupīnaṃ vivṛṇuyād iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7529: nigrahasthālakṣaṇasya mithyādhyavasāyād anigrahasthāne nigṛhīto 'sīti paraṃ bruvan niranuyojyānuyojgān nigṛhīto veditavya iti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7534: kasyacid arthasya tathābhāvaṃ pratijñāya pratijñātārthaviparyayād aniyamāt kathāṃ prasañjayato 'pasiddhānto veditavyaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7538: nāsad utpadyata iti siddhāntam abhyupetya svapakṣaṃ vyavasthāpayati --- ekaprakṛtīdaṃ vyaktaṃ vikārāṇām anvayadarśanāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7541: tasmāt samanvayadarśanāt sukhādibhir ekaprakṛtīdaṃ viśvam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7542: evam uktavān anuyujyate --- atha pratṛtir vikāra iti kathaṃ lakṣitavyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7545: yad dharmāntaraṃ pravartate nivartate vā sa vikāra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7550: sadasatoś ca tirobhāvāvirbhāvam antareṇa na kasyacit pravṛttiḥ pravṛttyuparamaś ca bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7551: mṛdi khalv avasthitāyāṃ bhaviṣyati śarāvādilakṣaṇaṃ dharmāntaram iti pravṛttir bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7553: tad etad mṛddharmāṇām api na syāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7554: evaṃ pratyavasthito yadi sataś cātmahānam asataś cātmalābham abhyupaiti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:7563: kiṃ punar lakṣaṇāntarayogād hetvābhāsā nigrahasthānatvam āpannāḥ yathā pramāṇāni prameyatvam ity ata āha --- yathoktā iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:7566: ta ime pramāṇādayaḥ padārthā uddiṣṭā lakṣitāḥ parīkṣitāś ceti//24//
GSP29nysvbh1u:7567: yo 'kṣapādam ṛṣiṃ nyāyaḥ pratyabhād vadatāṃ varam/
